output: vus.at-e-sa.i-e-karam dekh ki sar-tƒÅ-sar-e-·∏≥hƒÅk guzre hai ƒÅbla-pƒÅ abr-e-guhar-bƒÅr hun≈´z yak-qalam kƒÅƒ°haz-e-ƒÅtish-zada hai safha-e-dasht naqsh-e-pƒÅ me√± hai tab-e-garmƒ´-e-raftƒÅr hun≈´z dƒÅƒ°h-e-atfƒÅl hai dƒ´vƒÅna ba-kohsƒÅr hun≈´z ·∏≥halvat-e-sa√±g me√± hai naala talab-gƒÅr hun≈´z ·∏≥hƒÅna hai sail se ·∏≥h≈´-karda-e-dƒ´dƒÅr hun≈´z d≈´rbƒ´√± dar-zada hai ra·∏≥hna-e-dƒ´vƒÅr hun≈´z aa.ƒ´ yak-umr se ma.az≈´r-e-tamƒÅsha nargis chashm-e-shabnam me√± na TuuTƒÅ mizha-e-·∏≥hƒÅr hun≈´z kyuu√± huƒÅ thƒÅ taraf-e-ƒÅbla-e-pƒÅ yƒÅ-rab jaada hai vƒÅ-shudan-e-pechish-e-t≈´mƒÅr hun≈´z ho√± ·∏≥hamoshƒ´-e-chaman hasrat-e-dƒ´dƒÅr 'asad' mizha hai shƒÅna-kash-e-turra-e-guftƒÅr hun≈´z wusat-e-sai-e-karam dekh ki sar-ta-sar-e-KHak guzre hai aabla-pa abr-e-guhar-bar hunuz yak-qalam kaghaz-e-atish-zada hai safha-e-dasht naqsh-e-pa mein hai tab-e-garmi-e-raftar hunuz dagh-e-atfal hai diwana ba-kohsar hunuz KHalwat-e-sang mein hai nala talab-gar hunuz KHana hai sail se KHu-karda-e-didar hunuz durbin dar-zada hai raKHna-e-diwar hunuz aai yak-umr se mazur-e-tamasha nargis chashm-e-shabnam mein na TuTa mizha-e-KHar hunuz kyun hua tha taraf-e-abla-e-pa ya-rab jada hai wa-shudan-e-pechish-e-tumar hunuz hon KHamoshi-e-chaman hasrat-e-didar 'asad' mizha hai shana-kash-e-turra-e-guftar hunuz

instruction: you are an urdu/hindi shayar/kavi/poet and you have to complete the following shayari/kavita, respond only in romanized urdu/hindi, make sure you are creative and talk about something profound and beautiful
input: jada-e-rah KHur ko waqt-e-sham hai tar-e-shuaa
output: jƒÅda-e-rah ·∏≥hur ko vaqt-e-shƒÅm hai tƒÅr-e-shuƒÅ.a char·∏≥h vƒÅ kartƒÅ hai mƒÅh-e-nau se ƒÅƒ°hosh-e-vidƒÅ.a sham.a se hai bazm-e-a√±gusht-e-tahayyur dar dahan sho.ala-e-ƒÅvƒÅz-e-·∏≥h≈´bƒÅ√± par ba-ha√±gƒÅm-e-simƒÅ.a juu√± par-e-tƒÅ.≈´s jauhar ta·∏≥hta mashq-e-ra√±g hai bas-ki hai vo qibla-e-ƒÅ.ƒ´na mahv-e-i·∏≥htirƒÅ.a ranjish-e-hairat-sarishtƒÅ√± sƒ´na-sƒÅfƒ´ peshkash jauhar-e-ƒÅ.ƒ´na hai yaa√± gard-e-maidƒÅn-e-nazƒÅ.a chaar s≈´-e-dahr me√± bƒÅzƒÅr-e-ƒ°haflat garm hai aql ke nuqsƒÅ√± se uThtƒÅ hai ·∏≥hayƒÅl-e-intifƒÅ.a ƒÅshnƒÅ 'ƒ°hƒÅlib' nahƒ´√± hai√± dard-e-dil ke ƒÅshnƒÅ varna kis ko mere afsƒÅne kƒ´ tƒÅb-e-istimƒÅ.a jada-e-rah KHur ko waqt-e-sham hai tar-e-shuaa charKH wa karta hai mah-e-nau se aaghosh-e-widaa shama se hai bazm-e-angusht-e-tahayyur dar dahan shoala-e-awaz-e-KHuban par ba-hangam-e-simaa jun par-e-taus jauhar taKHta mashq-e-rang hai bas-ki hai wo qibla-e-aina mahw-e-iKHtiraa ranjish-e-hairat-sarishtan sina-safi peshkash jauhar-e-aina hai yan gard-e-maidan-e-nazaa chaar su-e-dahr mein bazar-e-ghaflat garm hai aql ke nuqsan se uThta hai KHayal-e-intifaa aashna 'ghaalib' nahin hain dard-e-dil ke aashna warna kis ko mere afsane ki tab-e-istimaa

output: zamƒÅna sa·∏≥ht kam-ƒÅzƒÅr hai ba-jƒÅn-e-asad vagarna ham to tavaqqo.a ziyƒÅda rakhte hai√± tan-e-ba-band-e-havas dar nadƒÅda rakhte hai√± dil-e-z-kƒÅr-e-jahƒÅ√± ≈´ftƒÅda rakhte hai√± tamƒ´z-e-zishti-o-nekƒ´ me√± laakh bƒÅte√± hai√± ba-aks-e-ƒÅ.ina yak-fard-e-sƒÅda rakhte hai√± ba-ra√±g-e-sƒÅya hame√± bandagƒ´ me√± hai taslƒ´m ki dƒÅƒ°h-e-dil ba-jabƒ´n-e-kushƒÅda rakhte hai√± ba-zƒÅhidƒÅ√± rag-e-gardan hai rishta-e-zunnƒÅr sar-e-ba-pƒÅ-e-but-e-nƒÅ-nihƒÅda rakhte hai√± muƒÅf-e-be-h≈´da-goƒ´ hai√± nƒÅsehƒÅn-e-azƒ´z dil-e-ba-dast-e-nigƒÅre nadƒÅda rakhte hai√± ba-ra√±g-e-sabza azƒ´zƒÅn-e-bad-zabƒÅ√± yak-dast hazƒÅr teƒ°h-e-ba-zahr-ƒÅb-dƒÅda rakhte hai√± adab ne sau√±pƒ´ hame√± surma-sƒÅ.i-e-hairat z-ban-e-basta-o-chashm-e-kushƒÅda rakhte hai√± zamana saKHt kam-azar hai ba-jaan-e-asad wagarna hum to tawaqqoa ziyaada rakhte hain tan-e-ba-band-e-hawas dar nadada rakhte hain dil-e-z-kar-e-jahan uftada rakhte hain tamiz-e-zishti-o-neki mein lakh baaten hain ba-aks-e-aina yak-fard-e-sada rakhte hain ba-rang-e-saya hamein bandagi mein hai taslim ki dagh-e-dil ba-jabin-e-kushada rakhte hain ba-zahidan rag-e-gardan hai rishta-e-zunnar sar-e-ba-pa-e-but-e-na-nihada rakhte hain muaf-e-be-huda-goi hain nasehan-e-aziz dil-e-ba-dast-e-nigare nadada rakhte hain ba-rang-e-sabza azizan-e-bad-zaban yak-dast hazar tegh-e-ba-zahr-ab-dada rakhte hain adab ne saunpi hamein surma-sai-e-hairat z-ban-e-basta-o-chashm-e-kushada rakhte hain

output: sarƒÅpƒÅ rehn-e-ishq-o-nƒÅ-guzƒ´r-e-ulfat-e-hastƒ´ ibƒÅdat barq kƒ´ kartƒÅ huu√± aur afsos hƒÅsil kƒÅ ba-qadr-e-zarf hai saaqƒ´ ·∏≥humƒÅr-e-tishna-kƒÅmƒ´ bhƒ´ jo t≈´ dariyƒÅ-e-mai hai to mai√± ·∏≥hamyƒÅza huu√± sƒÅhil kƒÅ zi-bas ·∏≥h≈´√±-gashta-e-rashk-e-vafƒÅ thƒÅ vahm bismil kƒÅ churƒÅyƒÅ za·∏≥hm-hƒÅ-e-dil ne paanƒ´ teƒ°h-e-qƒÅtil kƒÅ nigƒÅh-e-chashm-e-hƒÅsid vaam le ai zauq-e-·∏≥hud-bƒ´nƒ´ tamƒÅshƒÅ.ƒ´ huu√± vahdat-·∏≥hƒÅna-e-ƒÅ.ƒ´na-e-dil kƒÅ sharar-fursat nigah sƒÅmƒÅn-e-yak-ƒÅlam charƒÅƒ°hƒÅ√± hai ba-qadr-e-ra√±g yaa√± gardish me√± hai paimƒÅna mahfil kƒÅ sarƒÅsar tƒÅ·∏≥htan ko shash-jihat yak-arsa jaulƒÅ√± thƒÅ huƒÅ vƒÅmƒÅ√±dgƒ´ se rah-ravƒÅ√± kƒ´ farq manzil kƒÅ mujhe rƒÅh-e-su·∏≥han me√± ·∏≥hauf-e-gum-rƒÅhƒ´ nahƒ´√± ƒ°hƒÅlib asƒÅ-e-·∏≥hizr-e-sahrƒÅ-e-su·∏≥han hai ·∏≥hƒÅma be-dil kƒÅ sarapa rehn-e-ishq-o-na-guzir-e-ulfat-e-hasti ibaadat barq ki karta hun aur afsos hasil ka ba-qadr-e-zarf hai saqi KHumar-e-tishna-kaami bhi jo tu dariya-e-mai hai to main KHamyaza hun sahil ka zi-bas KHun-gashta-e-rashk-e-wafa tha wahm bismil ka churaya zaKHm-ha-e-dil ne pani tegh-e-qatil ka nigah-e-chashm-e-hasid wam le ai zauq-e-KHud-bini tamashai hun wahdat-KHana-e-aina-e-dil ka sharar-fursat nigah saman-e-yak-alam charaghan hai ba-qadr-e-rang yan gardish mein hai paimana mahfil ka sarasar taKHtan ko shash-jihat yak-arsa jaulan tha hua wamandgi se rah-rawan ki farq manzil ka mujhe rah-e-suKHan mein KHauf-e-gum-rahi nahin ghaalib asa-e-KHizr-e-sahra-e-suKHan hai KHama be-dil ka

output: mat mardumak-e-dƒ´da me√± samjho ye nigƒÅhe√± hai√± jam.a suvaidƒÅ-e-dil-e-chashm me√± aahe√± kis dil pe hai azm-e-saf-e-mizhgƒÅn-e-·∏≥hud-ƒÅrƒÅ ƒÅ.ƒ´ne ke pƒÅyƒÅb se utrƒ´ hai√± sipƒÅhe√± dair-o-haram ƒÅ.ƒ´na-e-takrƒÅr-e-tamannƒÅ vƒÅmƒÅ√±dagƒ´-e-shauq tarƒÅshe hai panƒÅhe√± juu√± mardumak-e-chashm se ho√± jam.a nigƒÅhe√± ·∏≥hvƒÅbƒ´da ba-hairat-kada-e-dƒÅƒ°h hai√± aahe√± phir halqa-e-kƒÅkul me√± pa·∏åƒ´√± diid kƒ´ rƒÅhe√± juu√± duud farƒÅham huii√± rauzan me√± nigƒÅhe√± paayƒÅ sar-e-har-zarra jigar-gosha-e-vahshat hai√± daaƒ°h se ma.am≈´r shaqƒÅ.iq kƒ´ kulƒÅhe√± ye matl.a 'asad' jauhar-e-afs≈´n-e-su·∏≥han ho gar arz-e-tapƒÅk-e-jigar-e-so·∏≥hta chƒÅhe√± hairat-kash-e-yak-jalva-e-ma.anƒ´ hai√± nigƒÅhe√± khƒ´√±ch≈´√± huu√± suvaidƒÅ-e-dil-e-chashm se aa.he√± mat mardumak-e-dida mein samjho ye nigahen hain jama suwaida-e-dil-e-chashm mein aahen kis dil pe hai azm-e-saf-e-mizhgan-e-KHud-ara aaine ke payab se utri hain sipahen dair-o-haram aaina-e-takrar-e-tamanna wamandagi-e-shauq tarashe hai panahen jun mardumak-e-chashm se hon jama nigahen KHwabida ba-hairat-kada-e-dagh hain aahen phir halqa-e-kakul mein paDin did ki rahen jun dud faraham huin rauzan mein nigahen paya sar-e-har-zarra jigar-gosha-e-wahshat hain dagh se mamur shaqaiq ki kulahen ye matla 'asad' jauhar-e-afsun-e-suKHan ho gar arz-e-tapak-e-jigar-e-soKHta chahen hairat-kash-e-yak-jalwa-e-mani hain nigahen khinchun hun suwaida-e-dil-e-chashm se aahen

output: hasad se dil agar afsurda hai garm-e-tamƒÅshƒÅ ho ki chashm-e-ta√±g shƒÅyad kasrat-e-nazzƒÅra se vƒÅ ho ba-qadr-e-hasrat-e-dil chƒÅhiye zauq-e-ma.ƒÅsƒ´ bhƒ´ bhar≈´√± yak-gosha-e-dƒÅman gar ƒÅb-e-haft-dariyƒÅ ho InterestingInterestingagar vo sarv-qad garm-e-·∏≥hirƒÅm-e-nƒÅz aa jaave kaf-e-har-·∏≥hƒÅk-e-gulshan shakl-e-qamrƒ´ nƒÅla-farsƒÅ ho baham bƒÅlƒ´dan-e-sa√±g-o-gul-e-sahrƒÅ ye chƒÅhe hai ki tƒÅr-e-jƒÅda bhƒ´ kohsƒÅr ko zunnƒÅr-e-mƒ´nƒÅ ho Interestingharƒ´f-e-vahshat-e-nƒÅz-e-nasƒ´m-e-ishq jab aa.uu√± ki misl-e-ƒ°huncha sƒÅz-e-yak-gulistƒÅ√± dil muhayyƒÅ ho bajƒÅ.e daana ·∏≥hirman yak-bayƒÅbƒÅ√± baiza-e-qumrƒ´ mirƒÅ hƒÅsil vo nus·∏≥ha hai ki jis se ·∏≥haak paidƒÅ ho kare kyƒÅ sƒÅz-e-bƒ´nish vo shahƒ´d-e-dard-ƒÅgƒÅhƒ´ jise m≈´-e-dimƒÅƒ°h-e-be-·∏≥hudƒ´ ·∏≥hvƒÅb-e-zule·∏≥hƒÅ ho dil-e-j≈´√±-sham.a bahr-e-dƒÅvat-e-nazzƒÅra lƒÅya.anƒ´ nigah labrez-e-ashk o siina ma.am≈´r-e-tamannƒÅ ho na dekhe√± r≈´-e-yak-dil sard ƒ°hair-az sham-e-kaf≈´rƒ´ ·∏≥hudƒÅyƒÅ is qadar bazm-e-'asad' garm-e-tamƒÅshƒÅ ho hasad se dil agar afsurda hai garm-e-tamasha ho ki chashm-e-tang shayad kasrat-e-nazzara se wa ho ba-qadr-e-hasrat-e-dil chahiye zauq-e-maasi bhi bharun yak-gosha-e-daman gar aab-e-haft-dariya ho InterestingInterestingagar wo sarw-qad garm-e-KHiram-e-naz aa jawe kaf-e-har-KHak-e-gulshan shakl-e-qamri nala-farsa ho baham baalidan-e-sang-o-gul-e-sahra ye chahe hai ki tar-e-jada bhi kohsar ko zunnar-e-mina ho Interestingharif-e-wahshat-e-naz-e-nasim-e-ishq jab aaun ki misl-e-ghuncha saz-e-yak-gulistan dil muhayya ho bajae dana KHirman yak-bayaban baiza-e-qumri mera hasil wo nusKHa hai ki jis se KHak paida ho kare kya saz-e-binish wo shahid-e-dard-agahi jise mu-e-dimagh-e-be-KHudi KHwab-e-zuleKHa ho dil-e-jun-shama bahr-e-dawat-e-nazzara layani nigah labrez-e-ashk o sina mamur-e-tamanna ho na dekhen ru-e-yak-dil sard ghair-az sham-e-kafuri KHudaya is qadar bazm-e-'asad' garm-e-tamasha ho

output: gulshan me√± bandobast ba-ra√±g-e-digar hai aaj qumrƒ´ kƒÅ tauq halqa-e-bair≈´n-e-dar hai aaj aatƒÅ hai ek pƒÅra-e-dil har fuƒ°hƒÅ√± ke saath tƒÅr-e-nafas kamand-e-shikƒÅr-e-asar hai aaj InterestingInterestingai ƒÅfiyat kinƒÅra kar ai intizƒÅm chal sailƒÅb-e-girya darpai-e-dƒ´vƒÅr-o-dar hai aaj ma.az≈´lƒ´-e-tapish huƒ´ ifrƒÅt-e-intizƒÅr chashm-e-kushƒÅda halqa-e-bair≈´n-e-dar hai aaj Interestinghairat-farosh-e-sad-nigarƒÅnƒ´ hai iztirƒÅr sar-rishta chƒÅk-e-jeb kƒÅ tƒÅr-e-nazar hai aaj huu√± dƒÅƒ°h-e-nƒ´m-ra√±gƒ´-e-shƒÅm-e-visƒÅl-e-yƒÅr n≈´r-e-charƒÅƒ°h-e-bazm se josh-e-sahar hai aaj kartƒ´ hai ƒÅjizƒ´-e-safar so·∏≥htan tamƒÅm pairƒÅhan-e-·∏≥hasak me√± ƒ°hubƒÅr-e-sharar hai aaj tƒÅ-sub.h hai ba-manzil-e-maqsad rasƒ´danƒ´ d≈´d-e-charƒÅƒ°h-e-·∏≥hƒÅna ƒ°hubƒÅr-e-safar hai aaj d≈´r-≈´ftƒÅda-e-chaman-e-fikr hai 'asad' murƒ°h-e-·∏≥hayƒÅl bulbul-e-be-bƒÅl-o-par hai aaj gulshan mein bandobast ba-rang-e-digar hai aaj qumri ka tauq halqa-e-bairun-e-dar hai aaj aata hai ek para-e-dil har fughan ke sath tar-e-nafas kamand-e-shikar-e-asar hai aaj InterestingInterestingai aafiyat kinara kar ai intizam chal sailab-e-girya darpai-e-diwar-o-dar hai aaj mazuli-e-tapish hui ifraat-e-intizar chashm-e-kushada halqa-e-bairun-e-dar hai aaj Interestinghairat-farosh-e-sad-nigarani hai iztirar sar-rishta chaak-e-jeb ka tar-e-nazar hai aaj hun dagh-e-nim-rangi-e-sham-e-visal-e-yar nur-e-charagh-e-bazm se josh-e-sahar hai aaj karti hai aajizi-e-safar soKHtan tamam pairahan-e-KHasak mein ghubar-e-sharar hai aaj ta-subh hai ba-manzil-e-maqsad rasidani dud-e-charagh-e-KHana ghubar-e-safar hai aaj dur-uftada-e-chaman-e-fikr hai 'asad' murgh-e-KHayal bulbul-e-be-baal-o-par hai aaj

output: qatra-e-mai bas-ki hairat se nafas-parvar huƒÅ ·∏≥hatt-e-jƒÅm-e-mai sarƒÅsar rishta-e-gauhar huƒÅ e'tibƒÅr-e-ishq kƒ´ ·∏≥hƒÅna-·∏≥harƒÅbƒ´ dekhnƒÅ ƒ°hair ne kƒ´ aah lekin vo ·∏≥hafƒÅ mujh par huƒÅ Interestinggarmƒ´-e-daulat hui ƒÅtish-zan-e-nƒÅm-e-niko ·∏≥hƒÅna-e-·∏≥hƒÅtim me√± yƒÅq≈´t-e-nagƒ´√± a·∏≥htar huƒÅ nashsha me√± gum-karda-rƒÅh aayƒÅ vo mast-e-fitna-·∏≥h≈´ aaj ra√±g-rafta daur-e-gardish-e-sƒÅƒ°har huƒÅ dard se dar-parda dƒ´ mizhgƒÅ√±-siyƒÅhƒÅ√± ne shikast reza reza ustu·∏≥hƒÅ√± kƒÅ post me√± nashtar huƒÅ zohd gardƒ´dan hai gard-e-·∏≥hƒÅna-hƒÅ-e-mun.imƒÅ√± dƒÅna-e-tasbƒ´h se mai√± mohra-dar-shashdar huƒÅ ai ba-zabt-e-hƒÅl-e-nƒÅ-afsurdagƒÅ√± josh-e-jun≈´√± nashsha-e-mai hai agar yak-parda nƒÅzuk-tar huƒÅ is chaman me√± resha-dƒÅrƒ´ jis ne sar khe√±chƒÅ 'asad' tar zabƒÅn-e-lutf-e-ƒÅm-e-sƒÅqƒ´-e-kausar huƒÅ qatra-e-mai bas-ki hairat se nafas-parwar hua KHatt-e-jam-e-mai sarasar rishta-e-gauhar hua e'tibar-e-ishq ki KHana-KHarabi dekhna ghair ne ki aah lekin wo KHafa mujh par hua Interestinggarmi-e-daulat hui aatish-zan-e-nam-e-niko KHana-e-KHatim mein yaqut-e-nagin aKHtar hua nashsha mein gum-karda-rah aaya wo mast-e-fitna-KHu aaj rang-rafta daur-e-gardish-e-saghar hua dard se dar-parda di mizhgan-siyahan ne shikast reza reza ustuKHan ka post mein nashtar hua zohd gardidan hai gard-e-KHana-ha-e-muniman dana-e-tasbih se main mohra-dar-shashdar hua ai ba-zabt-e-haal-e-na-afsurdagan josh-e-junun nashsha-e-mai hai agar yak-parda nazuk-tar hua is chaman mein resha-dari jis ne sar khencha 'asad' tar zaban-e-lutf-e-am-e-saqi-e-kausar hua

aah-e-sahar-gah kar-e-baad-e-subh karti hai ki hoti hai ziyaada sard-mehri shama-ruyan ki mujhe apne junun ki be-takalluf parda-dari thi wa-lekin kya karun aawe jo ruswai gareban ki hunar paida kiya hai main ne hairat-azmai mein ki jauhar aaine ka har palak hai chashm-e-hairan ki KHudaya kis qadar ahl-e-nazar ne KHak chhani hai ki hain sad-raKHna jun ghirbaal diwaren gulistan ki hua sharm-e-tahi-dasti se se wo bhi sar-nigun aaKHir bas ai zaKHm-e-jigar ab dekh le shorish namak-dan ki bayaad-e-garmi-e-sohbat ba-rang-e-shoala dahke hai chhupaun kyunki 'ghaalib' sozishen dagh-e-numayan ki junun tohmat-kash-e-taskin na ho gar shadmani ki namak-pash-e-KHarash-e-dil hai lazzat zindagani ki kashakash-ha-e-hasti se kare kya sai-e-azadi hui zanjir-e-mauj-e-ab ko fursat rawani ki na khinch ai sai-e-dast-e-na-rasa zulf-e-tamanna ko pareshan-tar hai mu-e-KHama se tadbir mani ki kahan hum bhi rag-o-pai rakhte hain insaf bahattar hai na khinche taqat-e-KHamyaza tohmat na-tawani ki takalluf-bartaraf farhad aur itni subukdasti KHayal aasan tha lekin KHwab-e-KHusraw ne girani ki pas-az-murdan bhi diwana ziyarat-gah-e-tiflan hai sharar-e-sang ne turbat pe meri gul-fishani ki 'asad' ko boriye mein dhar ke phunka mauj-e-hasti ne faqiri mein bhi baqi hai shararat naujawani ki

output: az-mehr tƒÅ-ba-zarra dil-o-dil hai aa.ina tuutƒ´ ko shash-jihat se muqƒÅbil hai aa.ina hairat huj≈´m-e-lazzat-e-ƒ°haltƒÅnƒ´-e-tapish sƒ´mƒÅb-e-bƒÅlish o kamar-e-dil hai aa.ina ƒ°haflat ba-bƒÅl-e-jauhar-e-shamshƒ´r par-fishƒÅ√± yaa√± pusht-e-chashm-e-sho·∏≥hƒ´-e-qƒÅtil hai aa.ina hairat-nigƒÅh-e-barq-e-tamƒÅshƒÅ bahƒÅr-e-sho·∏≥h dar-parda-e-havƒÅ par-e-bismil hai aa.ina yaa√± rah ga.e hai√± nƒÅ·∏≥hun-e-tadbƒ´r TuuT kar jauhar-tilism-e-uqda-e-mushkil hai aa.ina ham-zƒÅn≈´-e-ta.ammul o ham-jalva-gƒÅh-e-gul ƒÅ.ƒ´na-band ·∏≥halvat-o-mahfil hai aa.ina dil kƒÅr-gƒÅh-e-fikr o 'asad' be-navƒÅ-e-dil yaa√± sa√±g-e-ƒÅstƒÅna-e-'bedil' hai aa.ina az-mehr ta-ba-zarra dil-o-dil hai aaina tuti ko shash-jihat se muqabil hai aaina hairat hujum-e-lazzat-e-ghaltani-e-tapish simab-e-baalish o kamar-e-dil hai aaina ghaflat ba-baal-e-jauhar-e-shamshir par-fishan yan pusht-e-chashm-e-shoKHi-e-qatil hai aaina hairat-nigah-e-barq-e-tamasha bahaar-e-shoKH dar-parda-e-hawa par-e-bismil hai aaina yan rah gae hain naKHun-e-tadbir TuT kar jauhar-tilism-e-uqda-e-mushkil hai aaina ham-zanu-e-tammul o ham-jalwa-gah-e-gul aaina-band KHalwat-o-mahfil hai aaina dil kar-gah-e-fikr o 'asad' be-nawa-e-dil yan sang-e-astana-e-'bedil' hai aaina

ru·∏≥hsat-e-andƒÅz-e-ravƒÅnƒ´ mƒÅ√±ge Interestingra√±g ne gul se dam-e-arz-e-pareshƒÅnƒ´-e-bazm barg-e-gul reza-e-mƒ´nƒÅ kƒ´ nishƒÅnƒ´ mƒÅ√±ge zulf tahrƒ´r-e-pareshƒÅn-e-taqƒÅzƒÅ hai magar ki jahƒÅ√± ·∏≥hvƒÅb sayyƒÅd se parvƒÅz-e-girƒÅnƒ´ mƒÅ√±ge chashm parvƒÅz o nafas ·∏≥hufta magar zo.af-e-umƒ´d shahpar-e-kƒÅh pa.e-muzhda-risƒÅnƒ´ mƒÅ√±ge vahshat-e-shor-e-tamƒÅshƒÅ hai ki juu√± dam-e-arz-e-pareshƒÅnƒ´-e-bazm barg-e-gul reza-e-mƒ´nƒÅ kƒ´ nishƒÅnƒ´ mƒÅ√±ge naqsh-e-naz-e-but-e-tannaz ba-aghosh-e-raqib pa-e-taus pae-KHama-e-mani mange tu wo bad-KHu ki tahayyur ko tamasha jaane parwaz o nafas KHufta magar zoaf-e-umid shahpar-e-kah pae-muzhda-risani mange wahshat-e-shor-e-tamasha hai ki jun nikhat-e-gul namak-e-zaKHm-e-jigar baal-fishani mange gar mile hazrat-e-'bedil' ka ·∏≥hayƒÅl dil ba-soz-e-ƒÅtish-e-dƒÅƒ°h-e-tamannƒÅ jal gayƒÅ hai 'asad' begƒÅna-e-afsurdagƒ´ ai bekasƒ´ dil z-andƒÅz-e-tapƒÅk-e-ahl-e-duniyƒÅ jal gayƒÅ duud merƒÅ sumbulistƒÅ√± se kare hai ham-sarƒ´ bas-ki shauq-e-ƒÅtish-e-gul se sarƒÅpƒÅ jal gayƒÅ sham.a-r≈´yƒÅ√± kƒ´ sar-a√±gusht-e-hinƒÅ.ƒ´ dekh kar ƒ°huncha-e-gul par-fishƒÅ√± parvƒÅna-ƒÅsƒÅ jal gayƒÅ dil mera soz-e-nihan se be-muhaba jal gaya aatish-e-KHamosh ki manind goya jal gaya dil mein zauq-e-wasl o yaad-e-yar tak baqi nahin aag is ghar mein lagi aisi ki jo tha jal gaya Interestingmain adam se bhi pare hun warna ghafil bar-ha meri pursish us ke hijr me√± be-takalluf dost ho jaise koƒ´ ƒ°ham-·∏≥hvƒÅr-e-dost taaki mai√± jƒÅn≈´√± ki hai us kƒ´ rasƒÅ.ƒ´ vaa√± talak mujh ko detƒÅ hai payƒÅm-e-vƒÅda-e-dƒ´dƒÅr-e-dost jab ki mai√± kartƒÅ huu√± apnƒÅ shikva-e-zof-e-dimƒÅƒ°h sar kare hai vo hadƒ´s-e-zulf-e-ambar-bƒÅr-e-dost chupke chupke mujh ko rote dekh paatƒÅ hai agar ha√±s ke kartƒÅ hai bayƒÅn-e-sho·∏≥hƒ´-e-guftƒÅr-e-dost mehrbƒÅnƒ´-hƒÅ-e-dushman kƒ´ shikƒÅyat kƒ´jiye tƒÅ bayƒÅ√± kiije sipƒÅs-e-lazzat-e-ƒÅzƒÅr-e-dost ye ƒ°hazal apnƒ´ mujhe jƒ´ se pasand aatƒ´ hai aap hai radƒ´f-e-sher me√± 'ƒ°hƒÅlib' zi-bas takrƒÅr-e-dost chashm-e-band-e-·∏≥halq juz timsƒÅl-e-·∏≥hud-bƒ´nƒ´ nahƒ´√± aa.ina hai qƒÅlib-e-·∏≥hisht-e-dar-o-dƒ´vƒÅr-e-dost barq-e-·∏≥hirman-zƒÅr gauhar hai nigƒÅh-e-tez yaa√± ashk ho jaate hai√± ·∏≥hushk az-garmƒ´-e-raftƒÅr-e-dost hai savƒÅ neze pe us ke qƒÅmat-e-nau-·∏≥hez se ƒÅftƒÅb-e-sub.h-e-mahshar hai gul-e-dastƒÅr-e-dost ai ad≈´-e-maslahat chand ba-zabt afsurda rah kardanƒ´ hai jam.a tƒÅb-e-sho·∏≥hƒ´-e-dƒ´dƒÅr-e-dost laƒ°hzish-e-mastƒÅna o josh-e-tamƒÅshƒÅ hai 'asad' ƒÅtish-e-mai se bahƒÅr-e-garmƒ´-e-bƒÅzƒÅr-e-dost aamad-e-KHat se hua hai sard jo bazar-e-dost dud-e-sham'-e-kushta tha shayad KHat-e-ruKHsar-e-dost ai dil-e-na-aqibat-andesh zabt-e-shauq kar kaun la sakta hai tab-e-jalwa-e-didar-e-dost InterestingKHana-viran-sazi-e-hairat tamasha kijiye surat-e-naqsh-e-qadam hun rafta-e-raftar-e-dost ishq mein bedad-e-rashk-e-ghair ne mara mujhe kushta-e-dushman hun aaKHir garche tha bimar-e-dost chashm-e-ma raushan ki us bedard ka dil shad hai dida-e-pur-KHun hamara saghar-e-sarshaar-e-dost ghair yun karta hai meri pursish us ke hijr mein be-takalluf dost ho jaise koi gham-KHwar-e-dost taki main jaanun ki hai us ki rasai wan talak mujh ko deta hai payam-e-wada-e-didar-e-dost jab ki main karta hun apna shikwa-e-zof-e-dimagh sar kare hai wo hadis-e-zulf-e-ambar-bar-e-dost chupke chupke mujh ko rote dekh pata hai agar hans ke karta hai bayan-e-shoKHi-e-guftar-e-dost mehrbani-ha-e-dushman ki shikayat kijiye ta bayan kije sipas-e-lazzat-e-azar-e-dost ye ghazal apni mujhe ji se pasand aati hai aap hai radif-e-sher mein 'ghaalib' zi-bas takrar-e-dost chashm-e-band-e-KHalq juz timsal-e-KHud-bini nahin aaina hai qalib-e-KHisht-e-dar-o-diwar-e-dost barq-e-KHirman-zar gauhar hai nigah-e-tez yan ashk ho jate hain KHushk az-garmi-e-raftar-e-dost hai sawa neze pe us ke qamat-e-nau-KHez se aaftab-e-subh-e-mahshar hai gul-e-dastar-e-dost ai adu-e-maslahat chand ba-zabt afsurda rah kardani hai jama tab-e-shoKHi-e-didar-e-dost laghzish-e-mastana o josh-e-tamasha hai 'asad' aatish-e-mai se bahaar-e-garmi-e-bazar-e-dost

output: jahƒÅ√± terƒÅ naqsh-e-qadam dekhte hai√± ·∏≥hayƒÅbƒÅ√± ·∏≥hayƒÅbƒÅ√± iram dekhte hai√± dil-ƒÅshuftagƒÅ√± ·∏≥hƒÅl-e-kunj-e-dahan ke suvaidƒÅ me√± sair-e-adam dekhte hai√± tire sarv-qƒÅmat se ik qadd-e-ƒÅdam qayƒÅmat ke fitne ko kam dekhte hai√± tamƒÅshƒÅ ki ai mahv-e-ƒÅ.ƒ´na-dƒÅrƒ´ tujhe kis tamannƒÅ se ham dekhte hai√± surƒÅƒ°h-e-taf-e-nƒÅla le dƒÅƒ°h-e-dil se ki shab-rau kƒÅ naqsh-e-qadam dekhte hai√± banƒÅ kar faqƒ´ro√± kƒÅ ham bhes 'ƒ°hƒÅlib' tamƒÅshƒÅ-e-ahl-e-karam dekhte hai√± kis≈´ ko za-·∏≥hud rasta kam dekhte hai√± ki aah≈´ ko pƒÅband-e-ram dekhte hai√± ·∏≥hat-e-la·∏≥ht-e-dil yak-qalam dekhte hai√± mizha ko javƒÅhar raqam dekhte hai√± jahan tera naqsh-e-qadam dekhte hain KHayaban KHayaban iram dekhte hain dil-ashuftagan KHal-e-kunj-e-dahan ke suwaida mein sair-e-adam dekhte hain tere sarw-qamat se ek qadd-e-adam qayamat ke fitne ko kam dekhte hain tamasha ki ai mahw-e-aina-dari tujhe kis tamanna se hum dekhte hain suragh-e-taf-e-nala le dagh-e-dil se ki shab-rau ka naqsh-e-qadam dekhte hain bana kar faqiron ka hum bhes 'ghaalib' tamasha-e-ahl-e-karam dekhte hain kisu ko za-KHud rasta kam dekhte hain ki aahu ko paband-e-ram dekhte hain KHat-e-laKHt-e-dil yak-qalam dekhte hain mizha ko jawahar raqam dekhte hain

t≈´ti-e-shƒ´rƒ´√±-su·∏≥han vale ƒÅ.ƒ´na aah mere muqƒÅbil nahƒ´√± rahƒÅ jƒÅ√±-dƒÅd-gƒÅ√± kƒÅ hausla fursat-gudƒÅz hai yaa√± arsa-e-tapƒ´dan-e-bismil nahƒ´√± rahƒÅ huu√± qatra-zan ba-vƒÅdƒ´-e-hasrat shabƒÅna roz juz tƒÅr-e-ashk jƒÅda-e-manzil nahƒ´√± rahƒÅ ai aah merƒ´ ·∏≥hƒÅtir-e-vƒÅbasta ke sivƒÅ duniyƒÅ me√± koƒ´ uqda-e-mushkil nahƒ´√± rahƒÅ andƒÅz-e-nƒÅla yaad hai√± sab mujh ko par 'asad' jis dil pe naaz thƒÅ mujhe vo dil nahƒ´√± rahƒÅ arz-e-niyaz-e-ishq ke qabil nahin raha jis dil pe naz tha mujhe wo dil nahin raha jata hun dagh-e-hasrat-e-hasti liye hue hun sham-e-kushta dar-KHur-e-mahfil nahin raha marne ki ai dil aur hi tadbir kar ki main shayan-e-dast-o-bazu-e-qatil nahin raha bar-ru-e-shash-jahat dar-e-aina baz hai yan imtiyaz-e-naqis-o-kaamil nahin raha wa kar diye hain shauq ne band-e-naqab-e-husn ghair-az-nigah ab koi hail nahin raha go main raha rahin-e-sitam-ha-e-rozgar lekin tere KHayal se ghafil nahin raha dil se hawa-e-kisht-e-wafa miT gai ki wan hasil siwae hasrat-e-hasil nahin raha bedad-e-ishq se nahin Darta magar 'asad' jis dil pe naz tha mujhe wo dil nahin raha har-chand main hun tuti-e-shirin-suKHan wale aaina aah mere muqabil nahin raha jaan-dad-gan ka hausla fursat-gudaz hai yan arsa-e-tapidan-e-bismil nahin raha hun qatra-zan ba-wadi-e-hasrat shabana roz juz tar-e-ashk jada-e-manzil nahin raha ai aah meri KHatir-e-wabasta ke siwa duniya mein koi uqda-e-mushkil nahin raha andaz-e-nala yaad hain sab mujh ko par 'asad' jis dil pe naz tha mujhe wo dil nahin raha

input: naqsh fariyaadi hai kis ki shoKHi-e-tahrir ka

input: aaina kyun na dun ki tamasha kahen jise
output: ƒÅ.ƒ´na kyuu√± na duu√± ki tamƒÅshƒÅ kahe√± jise aisƒÅ kahƒÅ√± se lƒÅ.≈´√± ki tujh sƒÅ kahe√± jise hasrat ne lƒÅ rakhƒÅ tirƒ´ bazm-e-·∏≥hayƒÅl me√± gul-dasta-e-nigƒÅh suvaidƒÅ kahe√± jise ph≈´√±kƒÅ hai kis ne gosh-e-mohabbat me√± ai ·∏≥hudƒÅ afs≈´n-e-intizƒÅr tamannƒÅ kahe√± jise sar par huj≈´m-e-dard-e-ƒ°harƒ´bƒ´ se DƒÅliye vo ek musht-e-·∏≥hƒÅk ki sahrƒÅ kahe√± jise hai chashm-e-tar me√± hasrat-e-dƒ´dƒÅr se nihƒÅ√± shauq-e-inƒÅ√± guse·∏≥hta dariyƒÅ kahe√± jise darkƒÅr hai shaguftan-e-gul-hƒÅ-e-aish ko sub.h-e-bahƒÅr pumba-e-mƒ´nƒÅ kahe√± jise 'ƒ°hƒÅlib' burƒÅ na maan jo vaa.iz burƒÅ kahe aisƒÅ bhƒ´ koƒ´ hai ki sab achchhƒÅ kahe√± jise yƒÅ rab hame√± to ·∏≥hvƒÅb me√± bhƒ´ mat dikhƒÅ.iyo ye mahshar-e-·∏≥hayƒÅl ki duniyƒÅ kahe√± jise hai intizƒÅr se sharar ƒÅbƒÅd rusta·∏≥hez mizhgƒÅn-e-koh-kan rag-e-·∏≥hƒÅrƒÅ kahe√± jise kis fursat-e-visƒÅl pe hai gul ko andalƒ´b za·∏≥hm-e-firƒÅq ·∏≥handa-e-be-jƒÅ kahe√± jise aaina kyun na dun ki tamasha kahen jise aisa kahan se laun ki tujh sa kahen jise hasrat ne la rakha teri bazm-e-KHayal mein gul-dasta-e-nigah suwaida kahen jise phunka hai kis ne gosh-e-mohabbat mein ai KHuda afsun-e-intizar tamanna kahen jise sar par hujum-e-dard-e-gharibi se Daliye wo ek musht-e-KHak ki sahra kahen jise hai chashm-e-tar mein hasrat-e-didar se nihan shauq-e-inan guseKHta dariya kahen jise darkar hai shaguftan-e-gul-ha-e-aish ko subh-e-bahaar pumba-e-mina kahen jise 'ghaalib' bura na man jo waiz bura kahe aisa bhi koi hai ki sab achchha kahen jise ya rab hamein to KHwab mein bhi mat dikhaiyo ye mahshar-e-KHayal ki duniya kahen jise hai intizar se sharar aabaad rustaKHez mizhgan-e-koh-kan rag-e-KHara kahen jise kis fursat-e-visal pe hai gul ko andalib zaKHm-e-firaq KHanda-e-be-ja kahen jise

instruction: you are an urdu/hindi shayar/kavi/poet and you have to complete the following shayari/kavita, respond only in romanized urdu/hindi, make sure you are creative and talk about something profound and beautiful
input: raftar-e-umr qat-e-rah-e-iztirab hai
output: raftƒÅr-e-umr qat-e-rah-e-iztirƒÅb hai is saal ke hisƒÅb ko barq ƒÅftƒÅb hai mƒ´nƒÅ-e-mai hai sarv nashƒÅt-e-bahƒÅr se bƒÅl-e-tadrrav jalva-e-mauj-e-sharƒÅb hai za·∏≥hmƒ´ huƒÅ hai pƒÅshna pƒÅ-e-sabƒÅt kƒÅ ne bhƒÅgne kƒ´ guu√± na iqƒÅmat kƒ´ taab hai jƒÅdƒÅd-e-bƒÅda-noshƒ´-e-rindƒÅ√± hai shash-jihat ƒ°hƒÅfil gumƒÅ√± kare hai ki getƒ´ ·∏≥harƒÅb hai nazzƒÅra kyƒÅ harƒ´f ho us barq-e-husn kƒÅ josh-e-bahƒÅr jalve ko jis ke naqƒÅb hai mai√± nƒÅ-murƒÅd dil kƒ´ tasallƒ´ ko kyƒÅ kar≈´√± maanƒÅ ki tere ru·∏≥h se nigah kƒÅmyƒÅb hai guzrƒÅ 'asad' masarrat-e-paiƒ°hƒÅm-e-yƒÅr se qƒÅsid pe mujh ko rashk-e-savƒÅl-o-javƒÅb hai zƒÅhir hai tarz-e-qaid se sayyƒÅd kƒ´ ƒ°haraz jo daana daam me√± hai so ashk-e-kabƒÅb hai be-chashm-e-dil na kar havas-e-sair-e-lƒÅla-zƒÅr ya.anƒ´ ye har varaq varaq-e-inti·∏≥hƒÅb hai raftar-e-umr qat-e-rah-e-iztirab hai is sal ke hisab ko barq aaftab hai mina-e-mai hai sarw nashat-e-bahaar se baal-e-tadrraw jalwa-e-mauj-e-sharab hai zaKHmi hua hai pashna pa-e-sabaat ka ne bhagne ki gun na iqamat ki tab hai jadad-e-baada-noshi-e-rindan hai shash-jihat ghafil guman kare hai ki geti KHarab hai nazzara kya harif ho us barq-e-husn ka josh-e-bahaar jalwe ko jis ke naqab hai main na-murad dil ki tasalli ko kya karun mana ki tere ruKH se nigah kaamyab hai guzra 'asad' masarrat-e-paigham-e-yar se qasid pe mujh ko rashk-e-sawal-o-jawab hai zahir hai tarz-e-qaid se sayyaad ki gharaz jo dana dam mein hai so ashk-e-kabab hai be-chashm-e-dil na kar hawas-e-sair-e-lala-zar yani ye har waraq waraq-e-intiKHab hai

output: jis jƒÅ nasƒ´m shƒÅnƒÅ-kash-e-zulf-e-yƒÅr hai naafƒÅ dimƒÅƒ°h-e-ƒÅhu-e-dasht-e-tatƒÅr hai kis kƒÅ surƒÅƒ°h jalva hai hairat ko ai ·∏≥hudƒÅ ƒÅ.ƒ´na farsh-e-shash-jahat-e-intizƒÅr hai hai zarra zarra ta√±gi-e-jƒÅ se ƒ°hubƒÅr-e-shauq gar daam ye hai vus.at-e-sahrƒÅ shikƒÅr hai dil mudda.ƒ´ o diida banƒÅ mudda.ƒÅ-alaih nazzƒÅre kƒÅ muqaddama phir r≈´-ba-kƒÅr hai chhi·∏åke hai shabnam ƒÅ.ƒ´na-e-barg-e-gul par aab ai andalƒ´b vaqt-e-vadƒÅ-e-bahƒÅr hai pach aa pa·∏åƒ´ hai vƒÅda-e-dil-dƒÅr kƒ´ mujhe vo aa.e yƒÅ na aa.e pe yaa√± intizƒÅr hai be-parda s≈´-e-vƒÅdi-e-majn≈´√± guzar na kar har zarra ke naqƒÅb me√± dil be-qarƒÅr hai ai andalƒ´b yak kaf-e-·∏≥has bahr-e-ƒÅshyƒÅ√± t≈´fƒÅn-e-ƒÅmad ƒÅmad-e-fasl-e-bahƒÅr hai dil mat ga√±vƒÅ ·∏≥habar na sahƒ´ sair hƒ´ sahƒ´ ai be-dimƒÅƒ°h ƒÅ.ƒ´na timsƒÅl-dƒÅr hai ƒ°haflat kafƒ´l-e-umr o 'asad' zƒÅmin-e-nashƒÅt ai marg-e-nƒÅ-gahƒÅ√± tujhe kyƒÅ intizƒÅr hai jis ja nasim shana-kash-e-zulf-e-yar hai nafa dimagh-e-ahu-e-dasht-e-tatar hai kis ka suragh jalwa hai hairat ko ai KHuda aaina farsh-e-shash-jahat-e-intizar hai hai zarra zarra tangi-e-ja se ghubar-e-shauq gar dam ye hai wusat-e-sahra shikar hai dil muddai o dida bana muddaa-alaih nazzare ka muqaddama phir ru-ba-kar hai chhiDke hai shabnam aaina-e-barg-e-gul par aab ai andalib waqt-e-wada-e-bahaar hai pach aa paDi hai wada-e-dil-dar ki mujhe wo aae ya na aae pe yan intizar hai be-parda su-e-wadi-e-majnun guzar na kar har zarra ke naqab mein dil be-qarar hai ai andalib yak kaf-e-KHas bahr-e-ashyan tufan-e-amad aamad-e-fasl-e-bahaar hai dil mat ganwa KHabar na sahi sair hi sahi ai be-dimagh aaina timsal-dar hai ghaflat kafil-e-umr o 'asad' zamin-e-nashat ai marg-e-na-gahan tujhe kya intizar hai

output: hai bazm-e-butƒÅ√± me√± su·∏≥han ƒÅzurda-labo√± se ta√±g aa.e hai√± ham aise ·∏≥hushƒÅmad-talabo√± se hai daur-e-qadah vaj.h-e-pareshƒÅnƒ´-e-sahbƒÅ yak-bƒÅr lagƒÅ do ·∏≥hum-e-mai mere labo√± se rindƒÅn-e-dar-e-mai-kada gustƒÅ·∏≥h hai√± zƒÅhid zinhƒÅr na honƒÅ taraf in be-adabo√± se bedƒÅd-e-vafƒÅ dekh ki jaatƒ´ rahƒ´ ƒÅ·∏≥hir har-chand mirƒ´ jaan ko thƒÅ rabt labo√± se kyƒÅ p≈´chhe hai bar-·∏≥hud ƒ°halatƒ´-hƒÅ-e-azƒ´zƒÅ√± ·∏≥hvƒÅrƒ´ ko bhƒ´ ik aar hai a.ƒÅlƒ´-nasabo√± se go tum ko razƒÅ-j≈´ƒ´-e-aƒ°hyƒÅr hai lekin jaatƒ´ hai mulƒÅqƒÅt kab aise sababo√± se mat p≈´chh 'asad' va.ada-e-kam-fursatƒ´-e-zƒ´st do din bhƒ´ jo kaaTe t≈´ qayƒÅmat ta.abo√± se hai bazm-e-butan mein suKHan aazurda-labon se tang aae hain hum aise KHushamad-talabon se hai daur-e-qadah wajh-e-pareshani-e-sahba yak-bar laga do KHum-e-mai mere labon se rindan-e-dar-e-mai-kada gustaKH hain zahid zinhaar na hona taraf in be-adabon se bedad-e-wafa dekh ki jati rahi aaKHir har-chand meri jaan ko tha rabt labon se kya puchhe hai bar-KHud ghalati-ha-e-azizan KHwari ko bhi ek aar hai aaali-nasabon se go tum ko raza-jui-e-aghyar hai lekin jati hai mulaqat kab aise sababon se mat puchh 'asad' wada-e-kam-fursati-e-zist do din bhi jo kaTe tu qayamat tabon se

instruction: you are an urdu/hindi shayar/kavi/poet and you have to complete the following shayari/kavita, respond only in romanized urdu/hindi, make sure you are creative and talk about something profound and beautiful
input: hasil se hath dho baiTh ai aarzu-KHirami
output: hƒÅsil se haath dho baiTh ai ƒÅrz≈´-·∏≥hirƒÅmƒ´ dil josh-e-girya me√± hai Duubƒ´ huƒ´ asƒÅmƒ´ us sham.a kƒ´ tarah se jis ko koƒ´ bujhƒÅ de mai√± bhƒ´ jale-huo√± me√± huu√± dƒÅƒ°h-e-nƒÅ-tamƒÅmƒ´ karte ho shikva kis kƒÅ tum aur bevafƒÅ.ƒ´ sar pƒ´Tte hai√± apnƒÅ ham aur nek-nƒÅmƒ´ sad-ra√±g-e-gul katarnƒÅ dar-parda qatl karnƒÅ teƒ°h-e-adƒÅ nahƒ´√± hai pƒÅband-e-be-niyƒÅmƒ´ tarf-e-su·∏≥han nahƒ´√± hai mujh se ·∏≥hudƒÅ-na-karda hai nƒÅma-bar ko us se dƒÅvƒÅ-e-ham-kalƒÅmƒ´ tƒÅqat fasƒÅna-e-bƒÅd andesha sho.ala-ƒ´jƒÅd ai ƒ°ham hun≈´z ƒÅtish ai dil hun≈´z ·∏≥hƒÅmƒ´ har chand umr guzrƒ´ ƒÅzurdagƒ´ me√± lekin hai sharh-e-shauq ko bhƒ´ juu√± shikva nƒÅ-tamƒÅmƒ´ hai yaas me√± 'asad' ko saaqƒ´ se bhƒ´ farƒÅƒ°hat dariyƒÅ se ·∏≥hushk guzre masto√± kƒ´ tishna-kƒÅmƒ´ hasil se hath dho baiTh ai aarzu-KHirami dil josh-e-girya mein hai Dubi hui asami us shama ki tarah se jis ko koi bujha de main bhi jale-huon mein hun dagh-e-na-tamami karte ho shikwa kis ka tum aur bewafai sar piTte hain apna hum aur nek-nami sad-rang-e-gul katarna dar-parda qatl karna tegh-e-ada nahin hai paband-e-be-niyami tarf-e-suKHan nahin hai mujh se KHuda-na-karda hai nama-bar ko us se dawa-e-ham-kalami taqat fasana-e-baad andesha shoala-ijad ai gham hunuz aatish ai dil hunuz KHami har chand umr guzri aazurdagi mein lekin hai sharh-e-shauq ko bhi jun shikwa na-tamami hai yas mein 'asad' ko saqi se bhi faraghat dariya se KHushk guzre maston ki tishna-kaami

instruction: you are an urdu/hindi shayar/kavi/poet and you have to complete the following shayari/kavita, respond only in romanized urdu/hindi, make sure you are creative and talk about something profound and beautiful
input: na hoga yak-bayaban mandgi se zauq kam mera
output: na hogƒÅ yak-bayƒÅbƒÅ√± mƒÅ√±dgƒ´ se zauq kam merƒÅ habƒÅb-e-mauja-e-raftƒÅr hai naqsh-e-qadam merƒÅ mohabbat thƒ´ chaman se lekin ab ye be-dimƒÅƒ°hƒ´ hai ki mauj-e-b≈´-e-gul se naak me√± aatƒÅ hai dam merƒÅ rah-e-·∏≥hvƒÅbƒ´da thƒ´ gardan-kash-e-yak-dars-e-ƒÅgƒÅhƒ´ zamƒ´√± ko saili-e-ustƒÅd hai naqsh-e-qadam merƒÅ surƒÅƒ°h-ƒÅvƒÅra-e-arz-e-do-ƒÅlam shor-e-mahshar huu√± par-afshƒÅ√± hai ƒ°hubƒÅr aa√± s≈´-e-sahrƒÅ-e-adam merƒÅ havƒÅ-e-sub.h yak-ƒÅlam garebƒÅ√± chƒÅkƒ´-e-gul hai dahƒÅn-e-za·∏≥hm paidƒÅ kar agar khƒÅtƒÅ hai ƒ°ham merƒÅ na ho vahshat-kash-e-dars-e-sarƒÅb-e-satr-e-ƒÅgƒÅhƒ´ mai√± gard-e-rƒÅh huu√± be-mudda.ƒÅ hai pech-o-·∏≥ham merƒÅ 'asad' vahshat-parast-e-gosha-e-tanhƒÅ.i-e-dil hai ba-ra√±g-e-mauj-e-mai ·∏≥hamyƒÅza-e-sƒÅƒ°har hai ram merƒÅ na hoga yak-bayaban mandgi se zauq kam mera habab-e-mauja-e-raftar hai naqsh-e-qadam mera mohabbat thi chaman se lekin ab ye be-dimaghi hai ki mauj-e-bu-e-gul se nak mein aata hai dam mera rah-e-KHwabida thi gardan-kash-e-yak-dars-e-agahi zamin ko saili-e-ustad hai naqsh-e-qadam mera suragh-awara-e-arz-e-do-alam shor-e-mahshar hun par-afshan hai ghubar aan su-e-sahra-e-adam mera hawa-e-subh yak-alam gareban chaaki-e-gul hai dahan-e-zaKHm paida kar agar khata hai gham mera na ho wahshat-kash-e-dars-e-sarab-e-satr-e-agahi main gard-e-rah hun be-muddaa hai pech-o-KHam mera 'asad' wahshat-parast-e-gosha-e-tanhai-e-dil hai ba-rang-e-mauj-e-mai KHamyaza-e-saghar hai ram mera

instruction: you are an urdu/hindi shayar/kavi/poet and you have to complete the following shayari/kavita, respond only in romanized urdu/hindi, make sure you are creative and talk about something profound and beautiful
input: wo meri chin-e-jabin se gham-e-pinhan samjha
output: vo mirƒ´ chƒ´n-e-jabƒ´√± se ƒ°ham-e-pinhƒÅ√± samjhƒÅ rƒÅz-e-makt≈´b ba-be-rabti-e-unvƒÅ√± samjhƒÅ yak alif besh nahƒ´√± saiqal-e-ƒÅ.ƒ´na han≈´z chaak kartƒÅ huu√± mai√± jab se ki garebƒÅ√± samjhƒÅ sharh-e-asbƒÅb-e-giriftƒÅrƒ´-e-·∏≥hƒÅtir mat p≈´chh is qadar ta√±g huƒÅ dil ki mai√± zindƒÅ√± samjhƒÅ bad-gumƒÅnƒ´ ne na chƒÅhƒÅ use sargarm-e-·∏≥hirƒÅm ru·∏≥h pe har qatra araq dƒ´da-e-hairƒÅ√± samjhƒÅ ijz se apne ye jaanƒÅ ki vo bad-·∏≥h≈´ hogƒÅ nabz-e-·∏≥has se tapish-e-shola-e-sozƒÅ√± samjhƒÅ safar-e-ishq me√± kƒ´ zo.af ne rƒÅhat-talabƒ´ har qadam saa.e ko mai√± apne shabistƒÅ√± samjhƒÅ thƒÅ gurezƒÅ√± mizha-e-yƒÅr se dil tƒÅ dam-e-marg daf-e-paikƒÅn-e-qazƒÅ is qadar ƒÅsƒÅ√± samjhƒÅ dil diyƒÅ jaan ke kyuu√± us ko vafƒÅdƒÅr 'asad' ƒ°halatƒ´ kƒ´ ki jo kƒÅfir ko musalmƒÅ√± samjhƒÅ ham ne vahshat-kada-e-bazm-e-jahƒÅ√± me√± juu√± sham.a sho.ala-e-ishq ko apnƒÅ sar-o-sƒÅmƒÅ√± samjhƒÅ wo meri chin-e-jabin se gham-e-pinhan samjha raaz-e-maktub ba-be-rabti-e-unwan samjha yak alif besh nahin saiqal-e-aina hanuz chaak karta hun main jab se ki gareban samjha sharh-e-asbab-e-giriftari-e-KHatir mat puchh is qadar tang hua dil ki main zindan samjha bad-gumani ne na chaha use sargarm-e-KHiram ruKH pe har qatra araq dida-e-hairan samjha ijz se apne ye jaana ki wo bad-KHu hoga nabz-e-KHas se tapish-e-shola-e-sozan samjha safar-e-ishq mein ki zoaf ne rahat-talabi har qadam sae ko main apne shabistan samjha tha gurezan mizha-e-yar se dil ta dam-e-marg daf-e-paikan-e-qaza is qadar aasan samjha dil diya jaan ke kyun us ko wafadar 'asad' ghalati ki ki jo kafir ko musalman samjha hum ne wahshat-kada-e-bazm-e-jahan mein jun shama shoala-e-ishq ko apna sar-o-saman samjha

instruction: you are an urdu/hindi shayar/kavi/poet and you have to complete the following shayari/kavita, respond only in romanized urdu/hindi, make sure you are creative and talk about something profound and beautiful
input: harif-e-matlab-e-mushkil nahin fusun-e-niyaz
output: harƒ´f-e-matlab-e-mushkil nahƒ´√± fus≈´n-e-niyƒÅz duƒÅ qub≈´l ho yƒÅ rab ki umr-e-·∏≥hizr darƒÅz na ho ba-harzah bayƒÅbƒÅ√±-navard-e-vahm-e-vaj≈´d han≈´z tere tasavvur me√± hai nasheb-o-farƒÅz visƒÅl jalva tamƒÅshƒÅ hai par dimƒÅƒ°h kahƒÅ√± ki diije ƒÅ.ina-e-intizƒÅr ko pardƒÅz har ek zarra-e-ƒÅshiq hai ƒÅftƒÅb-parast ga.ƒ´ na ·∏≥haak hue par havƒÅ-e-jalva-e-nƒÅz na p≈´chh vus.at-e-mai-·∏≥hƒÅna-e-jun≈´√± 'ƒ°hƒÅlib' jahƒÅ√± ye kƒÅsa-e-gard≈´√± hai ek ·∏≥hƒÅk-andƒÅz fareb-e-san.at-e-ƒ´jƒÅd kƒÅ tamƒÅshƒÅ dekh nigƒÅh aks-farosh o ·∏≥hayƒÅl ƒÅ.ina-sƒÅz zi-bas-ki jalva-e-sayyƒÅd hairat-ƒÅrƒÅ hai u·∏åƒ´ hai safha-e-·∏≥hƒÅtir se s≈´rat-e-parvƒÅz huj≈´m-e-fikr se dil misl-e-mauj larze hai ki shƒ´sha nƒÅzuk o sahbƒÅ-e-ƒÅbgƒ´na-gudƒÅz 'asad' se tark-e-vafƒÅ kƒÅ gumƒÅ√± vo ma.anƒ´ hai ki khƒ´√±chiye par-e-tƒÅ.ir se s≈´rat-e-parvƒÅz han≈´z ai asar-e-dƒ´d na√±g-e-rusvƒÅ.ƒ´ nigƒÅh fitna-·∏≥hirƒÅm o dar-e-do-ƒÅlam baaz harif-e-matlab-e-mushkil nahin fusun-e-niyaz dua qubul ho ya rab ki umr-e-KHizr daraaz na ho ba-harzah bayaban-naward-e-wahm-e-wajud hanuz tere tasawwur mein hai nasheb-o-faraaz visal jalwa tamasha hai par dimagh kahan ki dije aaina-e-intizar ko pardaz har ek zarra-e-ashiq hai aaftab-parast gai na KHak hue par hawa-e-jalwa-e-naz na puchh wusat-e-mai-KHana-e-junun 'ghaalib' jahan ye kasa-e-gardun hai ek KHak-andaz fareb-e-sanat-e-ijad ka tamasha dekh nigah aks-farosh o KHayal aaina-saz zi-bas-ki jalwa-e-sayyaad hairat-ara hai uDi hai safha-e-KHatir se surat-e-parwaz hujum-e-fikr se dil misl-e-mauj larze hai ki shisha nazuk o sahba-e-abgina-gudaz 'asad' se tark-e-wafa ka guman wo mani hai ki khinchiye par-e-tair se surat-e-parwaz hanuz ai asar-e-did nang-e-ruswai nigah fitna-KHiram o dar-e-do-alam baz

instruction: you are an urdu/hindi shayar/kavi/poet and you have to complete the following shayari/kavita, respond only in romanized urdu/hindi, make sure you are creative and talk about something profound and beautiful
input: taghaful-dost hun mera dimagh-e-ajz aali hai
output: taƒ°hƒÅful-dost huu√± merƒÅ dimƒÅƒ°h-e-ajz aalƒ´ hai agar pahl≈´-tahƒ´ kiije to jƒÅ merƒ´ bhƒ´ ·∏≥hƒÅlƒ´ hai rahƒÅ ƒÅbƒÅd aalam ahl-e-himmat ke na hone se bhare hai√± jis qadar jƒÅm-o-sub≈´ mai-·∏≥hƒÅna ·∏≥hƒÅlƒ´ hai taghaful-dost hun mera dimagh-e-ajz aali hai agar pahlu-tahi kije to ja meri bhi KHali hai raha aabaad aalam ahl-e-himmat ke na hone se bhare hain jis qadar jam-o-subu mai-KHana KHali hai

instruction: you are an urdu/hindi shayar/kavi/poet and you have to complete the following shayari/kavita, respond only in romanized urdu/hindi, make sure you are creative and talk about something profound and beautiful
input: jab ba-taqrib-e-safar yar ne mahmil bandha
output: jab ba-taqrƒ´b-e-safar yaar ne mahmil bƒÅ√±dhƒÅ tapish-e-shauq ne har zarre pe ik dil bƒÅ√±dhƒÅ ahl-e-bƒ´nash ne ba-hairat-kada-e-sho·∏≥hi-e-nƒÅz jauhar-e-ƒÅ.ina ko t≈´ti-e-bismil bƒÅ√±dhƒÅ yaas o ummƒ´d ne yak-arbada maidƒÅ√± mƒÅ√±gƒÅ ijz-e-himmat ne tilism-e-dil-e-sƒÅ.il bƒÅ√±dhƒÅ na ba√±dhe tishnagi-e-zauq ke mazm≈´√± 'ƒ°hƒÅlib' garche dil khol ke dariyƒÅ ko bhƒ´ sƒÅhil bƒÅ√±dhƒÅ istilƒÅhƒÅt-e-asƒ´rƒÅn-e-taƒ°hƒÅful mat p≈´chh jo girah aap na kholƒ´ use mushkil bƒÅ√±dhƒÅ yaar ne tishnagƒ´-e-shauq ke mazm≈´√± chƒÅhe ham ne dil khol ke dariyƒÅ ko bhƒ´ sƒÅhil bƒÅ√±dhƒÅ tapish-e-ƒÅ.ƒ´na parvƒÅz-e-tamannƒÅ laa.ƒ´ nƒÅma-e-shauq ba-hƒÅl-e-dil-e-bismil bƒÅ√±dhƒÅ diida tƒÅ-dil hai yƒÅk-ƒÅ.ƒ´na charƒÅƒ°hƒÅ√± kis ne ·∏≥halvat-e-nƒÅz pe pairƒÅya-e-mahfil bƒÅ√±dhƒÅ nƒÅ-umƒ´dƒ´ ne ba-taqrƒ´b-e-mazƒÅmƒ´n-e-·∏≥humƒÅr k≈´cha-e-mauj ko ·∏≥hamyƒÅza-e-sƒÅhil bƒÅ√±dhƒÅ mutrib-e-dil ne mire tƒÅr-e-nafas se 'ƒ°hƒÅlib' saaz par rishta pa.e naƒ°hma-e-'bedil' bƒÅ√±dhƒÅ jab ba-taqrib-e-safar yar ne mahmil bandha tapish-e-shauq ne har zarre pe ek dil bandha ahl-e-binash ne ba-hairat-kada-e-shoKHi-e-naz jauhar-e-aina ko tuti-e-bismil bandha yas o ummid ne yak-arbada maidan manga ijz-e-himmat ne tilism-e-dil-e-sail bandha na bandhe tishnagi-e-zauq ke mazmun 'ghaalib' garche dil khol ke dariya ko bhi sahil bandha istilahat-e-asiran-e-taghaful mat puchh jo girah aap na kholi use mushkil bandha yar ne tishnagi-e-shauq ke mazmun chahe hum ne dil khol ke dariya ko bhi sahil bandha tapish-e-aina parwaz-e-tamanna lai nama-e-shauq ba-haal-e-dil-e-bismil bandha dida ta-dil hai yak-aina charaghan kis ne KHalwat-e-naz pe pairaya-e-mahfil bandha na-umidi ne ba-taqrib-e-mazamin-e-KHumar kucha-e-mauj ko KHamyaza-e-sahil bandha mutrib-e-dil ne mere tar-e-nafas se 'ghaalib' saz par rishta pae naghma-e-'bedil' bandha

instruction: you are an urdu/hindi shayar/kavi/poet and you have to complete the following shayari/kavita, respond only in romanized urdu/hindi, make sure you are creative and talk about something profound and beautiful
input: tere tausan ko saba bandhte hain
output: tere tausan ko sabƒÅ bƒÅ√±dhte hai√± ham bhƒ´ mazm≈´√± kƒ´ havƒÅ bƒÅ√±dhte hai√± aah kƒÅ kis ne asar dekhƒÅ hai ham bhƒ´ ek apnƒ´ havƒÅ bƒÅ√±dhte hai√± terƒ´ fursat ke muqƒÅbil ai umr barq ko pa-ba-hinƒÅ bƒÅ√±dhte hai√± qaid-e-hastƒ´ se rihƒÅ.ƒ´ mƒÅ'l≈´m ashk ko be-sar-o-pƒÅ bƒÅ√±dhte hai√± nashsha-e-ra√±g se hai vƒÅshud-e-gul mast kab band-e-qabƒÅ bƒÅ√±dhte hai√± ƒ°halatƒ´-hƒÅ-e-mazƒÅmƒ´√± mat p≈´chh log naale ko rasƒÅ bƒÅ√±dhte hai√± ahl-e-tadbƒ´r kƒ´ vƒÅmƒÅndgiyƒÅ√± ƒÅblo√± par bhƒ´ hinƒÅ bƒÅ√±dhte hai√± saada purkƒÅr hai√± ·∏≥h≈´bƒÅ√± 'ƒ°hƒÅlib' ham se paimƒÅn-e-vafƒÅ bƒÅ√±dhte hai√± paa√±v me√± jab vo hinƒÅ bƒÅ√±dhte hai√± mere hƒÅtho√± ko judƒÅ bƒÅ√±dhte hai√± Interestinghusn-e-afsurda-dilƒ´-hƒÅ-rangƒ´√± shauq ko pƒÅ-ba-hinƒÅ bƒÅ√±dhte hai√± qaid me√± bhƒ´ hai asƒ´rƒ´ ƒÅzƒÅd chashm-e-zanjƒ´r ko vƒÅ bƒÅ√±dhte hai√± shai·∏≥h-jƒ´ ka.abe kƒÅ jaanƒÅ mƒÅ'l≈´m aap masjid me√± gadhƒÅ bƒÅ√±dhte hai√± kis kƒÅ dil zulf se bhƒÅgƒÅ ki 'asad' dast-e-shƒÅna ba-qazƒÅ bƒÅ√±dhte hai√± tere bƒ´mƒÅr pe hai√± fariyƒÅdƒ´ vo jo kƒÅƒ°haz me√± davƒÅ bƒÅ√±dhte hai√± tere tausan ko saba bandhte hain hum bhi mazmun ki hawa bandhte hain aah ka kis ne asar dekha hai hum bhi ek apni hawa bandhte hain teri fursat ke muqabil ai umr barq ko pa-ba-hina bandhte hain qaid-e-hasti se rihai ma'lum ashk ko be-sar-o-pa bandhte hain nashsha-e-rang se hai washud-e-gul mast kab band-e-qaba bandhte hain ghalati-ha-e-mazamin mat puchh log nale ko rasa bandhte hain ahl-e-tadbir ki wamandgiyan aablon par bhi hina bandhte hain sada purkar hain KHuban 'ghaalib' hum se paiman-e-wafa bandhte hain panw mein jab wo hina bandhte hain mere hathon ko juda bandhte hain Interestinghusn-e-afsurda-dili-ha-rangin shauq ko pa-ba-hina bandhte hain qaid mein bhi hai asiri aazad chashm-e-zanjir ko wa bandhte hain shaiKH-ji kabe ka jaana ma'lum aap masjid mein gadha bandhte hain kis ka dil zulf se bhaga ki 'asad' dast-e-shana ba-qaza bandhte hain tere bimar pe hain fariyaadi wo jo kaghaz mein dawa bandhte hain

instruction: you are an urdu/hindi shayar/kavi/poet and you have to complete the following shayari/kavita, respond only in romanized urdu/hindi, make sure you are creative and talk about something profound and beautiful
input: larazta hai mera dil zahmat-e-mehr-e-daraKHshan par
output: laraztƒÅ hai mirƒÅ dil zahmat-e-mehr-e-dara·∏≥hshƒÅ√± par mai√± huu√± vo qatra-e-shabnam ki ho ·∏≥hƒÅr-e-bayƒÅbƒÅ√± par na chho·∏åƒ´ hazrat-e-y≈´suf ne yaa√± bhƒ´ ·∏≥hƒÅna-ƒÅrƒÅ.ƒ´ safedƒ´ dƒ´da-e-yƒÅq≈´b kƒ´ phirtƒ´ hai zindƒÅ√± par fanƒÅ tƒÅlƒ´m-e-dars-e-be-·∏≥hudƒ´ huu√± us zamƒÅne se ki majn≈´√± laam alif likhtƒÅ thƒÅ dƒ´vƒÅr-e-dabistƒÅ√± par InterestingfarƒÅƒ°hat kis qadar rahtƒ´ mujhe tashvƒ´sh-e-marham se baham gar sulh karte pƒÅra-hƒÅ-e-dil namak-dƒÅ√± par nahƒ´√± iqlƒ´m-e-ulfat me√± koƒ´ t≈´mƒÅr-e-nƒÅz aisƒÅ ki pusht-e-chashm se jis kƒ´ na hove mohr unvƒÅ√± par mujhe ab dekh kar abr-e-shafaq-ƒÅl≈´da yaad aayƒÅ ki furqat me√± tirƒ´ ƒÅtish barastƒ´ thƒ´ gulistƒÅ√± par ba-juz parvƒÅz-e-shauq-e-nƒÅz kyƒÅ baaqƒ´ rahƒÅ hogƒÅ qayƒÅmat ik havƒÅ-e-tund hai ·∏≥hƒÅk-e-shahƒ´dƒÅ√± par na la·∏å nƒÅseh se 'ƒ°hƒÅlib' kyƒÅ huƒÅ gar us ne shiddat kƒ´ hamƒÅrƒÅ bhƒ´ to ƒÅ·∏≥hir zor chaltƒÅ hai garebƒÅ√± par dil-e-·∏≥h≈´nƒ´√±-jigar be-sabr-o-faiz-e-ishq-e-mustaƒ°hnƒ´ ilƒÅhƒ´ yak qayƒÅmat ·∏≥hƒÅvar aa TuuTe bada·∏≥hshƒÅ√± par 'asad' ai be-tahammul arbada be-jƒÅ hai nƒÅseh se ki ƒÅ·∏≥hir be-kaso√± kƒÅ zor chaltƒÅ hai garebƒÅ√± par larazta hai mera dil zahmat-e-mehr-e-daraKHshan par main hun wo qatra-e-shabnam ki ho KHar-e-bayaban par na chhoDi hazrat-e-yusuf ne yan bhi KHana-arai safedi dida-e-yaqub ki phirti hai zindan par fana talim-e-dars-e-be-KHudi hun us zamane se ki majnun lam alif likhta tha diwar-e-dabistan par Interestingfaraghat kis qadar rahti mujhe tashwish-e-marham se baham gar sulh karte para-ha-e-dil namak-dan par nahin iqlim-e-ulfat mein koi tumar-e-naz aisa ki pusht-e-chashm se jis ki na howe mohr unwan par mujhe ab dekh kar abr-e-shafaq-aluda yaad aaya ki furqat mein teri aatish barasti thi gulistan par ba-juz parwaz-e-shauq-e-naz kya baqi raha hoga qayamat ek hawa-e-tund hai KHak-e-shahidan par na laD naseh se 'ghaalib' kya hua gar us ne shiddat ki hamara bhi to aaKHir zor chalta hai gareban par dil-e-KHunin-jigar be-sabr-o-faiz-e-ishq-e-mustaghni ilahi yak qayamat KHawar aa TuTe badaKHshan par 'asad' ai be-tahammul arbada be-ja hai naseh se ki aaKHir be-kason ka zor chalta hai gareban par

instruction: you are an urdu/hindi shayar/kavi/poet and you have to complete the following shayari/kavita, respond only in romanized urdu/hindi, make sure you are creative and talk about something profound and beautiful
input: nafas na anjuman-e-arzu se bahar khinch

instruction: you are an urdu/hindi shayar/kavi/poet and you have to complete the following shayari/kavita, respond only in romanized urdu/hindi, make sure you are creative and talk about something profound and beautiful
input: gila hai shauq ko dil mein bhi tangi-e-ja ka
output: gila hai shauq ko dil me√± bhƒ´ ta√±gi-e-jƒÅ kƒÅ guhar me√± mahv huƒÅ iztirƒÅb dariyƒÅ kƒÅ ye jƒÅntƒÅ huu√± ki t≈´ aur pƒÅsu·∏≥h-e-makt≈´b magar sitam-zada huu√± zauq-e-·∏≥hƒÅma-farsƒÅ kƒÅ hinƒÅ-e-pƒÅ-e-·∏≥hizƒÅ√± hai bahƒÅr agar hai yahƒ´ davƒÅm-e-kulfat-e-·∏≥hƒÅtir hai aish duniyƒÅ kƒÅ Interestingƒ°ham-e-firƒÅq me√± taklƒ´f-e-sair-e-bƒÅƒ°h na do mujhe dimƒÅƒ°h nahƒ´√± ·∏≥handa-hƒÅ-e-bejƒÅ kƒÅ Interestinghan≈´z mahrami-e-husn ko tarastƒÅ huu√± kare hai har-bun-e-m≈´ kaam chashm-e-bƒ´nƒÅ kƒÅ dil us ko pahle hƒ´ nƒÅz-o-adƒÅ se de baiThe hame√± dimƒÅƒ°h kahƒÅ√± husn ke taqƒÅzƒÅ kƒÅ na kah ki girya ba-miqdƒÅr-e-hasrat-e-dil hai mirƒ´ nigƒÅh me√± hai jam-o-·∏≥harch dariyƒÅ kƒÅ falak ko dekh ke kartƒÅ huu√± us ko yaad 'asad' jafƒÅ me√± us kƒ´ hai andƒÅz kƒÅr-farmƒÅ kƒÅ mirƒÅ shum≈´l har ik dil ke pech-o-tƒÅb me√± hai mai√± mudda.ƒÅ huu√± tapish-nƒÅma-e-tamannƒÅ kƒÅ milƒ´ na vus.at-e-jaulƒÅn yak jun≈´√± ham ko adam ko le ga.e dil me√± ƒ°hubƒÅr sahrƒÅ kƒÅ gila hai shauq ko dil mein bhi tangi-e-ja ka guhar mein mahw hua iztirab dariya ka ye jaanta hun ki tu aur pasuKH-e-maktub magar sitam-zada hun zauq-e-KHama-farsa ka hina-e-pa-e-KHizan hai bahaar agar hai yahi dawam-e-kulfat-e-KHatir hai aish duniya ka Interestinggham-e-firaq mein taklif-e-sair-e-bagh na do mujhe dimagh nahin KHanda-ha-e-beja ka Interestinghanuz mahrami-e-husn ko tarasta hun kare hai har-bun-e-mu kaam chashm-e-bina ka dil us ko pahle hi naz-o-ada se de baiThe hamein dimagh kahan husn ke taqaza ka na kah ki girya ba-miqdar-e-hasrat-e-dil hai meri nigah mein hai jam-o-KHarch dariya ka falak ko dekh ke karta hun us ko yaad 'asad' jafa mein us ki hai andaz kar-farma ka mera shumul har ek dil ke pech-o-tab mein hai main muddaa hun tapish-nama-e-tamanna ka mili na wusat-e-jaulan yak junun hum ko adam ko le gae dil mein ghubar sahra ka

input: bisat-e-ijz mein tha ek dil yak qatra KHun wo bhi
output: bisƒÅt-e-ijz me√± thƒÅ ek dil yak qatra ·∏≥huu√± vo bhƒ´ so rahtƒÅ hai ba-andƒÅz-e-chakƒ´dan sar-nig≈´√± vo bhƒ´ rahe us sho·∏≥h se ƒÅzurda ham chande takalluf se takalluf bartaraf thƒÅ ek andƒÅz-e-jun≈´√± vo bhƒ´ ·∏≥hayƒÅl-e-marg kab taskƒ´√± dil-e-ƒÅzurda ko ba·∏≥hshe mire dƒÅm-e-tamannƒÅ me√± hai ik said-e-zab≈´√± vo bhƒ´ na kartƒÅ kaash naala mujh ko kyƒÅ mƒÅl≈´m thƒÅ hamdam ki hogƒÅ bƒÅ.is-e-afzƒÅ.ish-e-dard-e-dar≈´√± vo bhƒ´ na itnƒÅ burrish-e-teƒ°h-e-jafƒÅ par naaz farmƒÅo mire dariyƒÅ-e-be-tƒÅbƒ´ me√± hai ik mauj-e-·∏≥h≈´√± vo bhƒ´ mai-e-ishrat kƒ´ ·∏≥hvƒÅhish sƒÅqi-e-gard≈´√± se kyƒÅ kiije liye baiThƒÅ hai ik do chaar jƒÅm-e-vƒÅzh-g≈´√± vo bhƒ´ mire dil me√± hai 'ƒ°hƒÅlib' shauq-e-vasl o shikva-e-hijrƒÅ√± ·∏≥hudƒÅ vo din kare jo us se mai√± ye bhƒ´ kah≈´√± vo bhƒ´ mujhe ma.al≈´m hai jo t≈´ ne mere haq me√± sochƒÅ hai kahƒ´√± ho jaa.e jald ai gardish-e-gard≈´n-e-d≈´√± vo bhƒ´ Interestingnazar rƒÅhat pe merƒ´ kar na va.ada shab ke aane kƒÅ ki merƒ´ ·∏≥hvƒÅb-bandƒ´ ke liye hogƒÅ fus≈´√± vo bhƒ´ bisat-e-ijz mein tha ek dil yak qatra KHun wo bhi so rahta hai ba-andaz-e-chakidan sar-nigun wo bhi rahe us shoKH se aazurda hum chande takalluf se takalluf bartaraf tha ek andaz-e-junun wo bhi KHayal-e-marg kab taskin dil-e-azurda ko baKHshe mere dam-e-tamanna mein hai ek said-e-zabun wo bhi na karta kash nala mujh ko kya malum tha hamdam ki hoga bais-e-afzaish-e-dard-e-darun wo bhi na itna burrish-e-tegh-e-jafa par naz farmao mere dariya-e-be-tabi mein hai ek mauj-e-KHun wo bhi mai-e-ishrat ki KHwahish saqi-e-gardun se kya kije liye baiTha hai ek do chaar jam-e-wazh-gun wo bhi mere dil mein hai 'ghaalib' shauq-e-wasl o shikwa-e-hijran KHuda wo din kare jo us se main ye bhi kahun wo bhi mujhe malum hai jo tu ne mere haq mein socha hai kahin ho jae jald ai gardish-e-gardun-e-dun wo bhi Interestingnazar rahat pe meri kar na wada shab ke aane ka ki meri KHwab-bandi ke liye hoga fusun wo bhi

afsurdagƒ´ nahƒ´√± tarab-inshƒÅ-e-iltifƒÅt haa√± dard ban ke dil me√± magar jƒÅ kare koƒ´ rone se ai nadƒ´m malƒÅmat na kar mujhe ƒÅ·∏≥hir kabhƒ´ to uqda-e-dil vƒÅ kare koƒ´ chƒÅk-e-jigar se jab rah-e-pursish na vƒÅ huƒ´ kyƒÅ fƒÅ.eda ki jaib ko rusvƒÅ kare koƒ´ la·∏≥ht-e-jigar se hai rag-e-har-·∏≥hƒÅr shƒÅ·∏≥h-e-gul tƒÅ chand bƒÅƒ°h-bƒÅni-e-sahrƒÅ kare koƒ´ nƒÅkƒÅmi-e-nigƒÅh hai se umr fursat kahƒÅ√± ki terƒ´ tamannƒÅ kare koƒ´ hai vahshat-e-tabƒ´.at-e-ƒ´jƒÅd yƒÅs-·∏≥hez ye dard vo nahƒ´√± ki na paidƒÅ kare koƒ´ bekƒÅri-e-jun≈´√± ko hai sar pƒ´Tne kƒÅ shuƒ°hl jab haath TuuT jaa.e√± to phir kyƒÅ kare koƒ´ husn-e-faroƒ°h-e-shamma-e-su·∏≥han duur hai 'asad' pahle Dil-e-gudƒÅ·∏≥hta paidƒÅ kare koƒ´ vahshat kahƒÅ√± ki be-·∏≥hudƒ´ inshƒÅ kare koƒ´ hastƒ´ ko dƒÅvat-e-dariyƒÅ kare koƒ´ vo sho·∏≥h apne husn pe maƒ°hr≈´r hai 'asad' dikhlƒÅ ke us ko aa.ina to·∏åƒÅ kare koƒ´ jab tak dahan-e-zaKHm na paida kare koi mushkil ki tujh se rah-e-suKHan wa kare koi aalam ghubar-e-wahshat-e-majnun hai sar-ba-sar kab tak KHayal-e-turra-e-laila kare koi afsurdagi nahin tarab-insha-e-iltifat han dard ban ke dil mein magar ja kare koi rone se ai nadim malamat na kar mujhe aaKHir kabhi to uqda-e-dil wa kare koi chaak-e-jigar se jab rah-e-pursish na wa hui kya faeda ki jaib ko ruswa kare koi laKHt-e-jigar se hai rag-e-har-KHar shaKH-e-gul ta chand bagh-bani-e-sahra mahw-e-shoKHi-e-abru-e-yar hai aankhon ko rakh ke taq pe dekha kare koi arz-e-sarishk par hai faza-e-zamana tang sahra kahan ki dawat-e-dariya kare koi wo shoKH apne husn pe maghrur hai 'asad' dikhla ke us ko aaina toDa kare koi

asar-e-ƒÅbla se jƒÅda-e-sahrƒÅ-e-jun≈´√± s≈´rat-e-rishta-e-gauhar hai charƒÅƒ°hƒÅ√± mujh se be-·∏≥hudƒ´ bistar-e-tamhƒ´d-e-farƒÅƒ°hat ho jo pur hai saa.e kƒ´ tarah merƒÅ shabistƒÅ√± mujh se shauq-e-dƒ´dƒÅr me√± gar t≈´ mujhe gardan maare ho nigah misl-e-gul-e-shamƒÅ pareshƒÅ√± mujh se bekasƒ´-hƒÅ-e-shab-e-hijr kƒ´ vahshat hai hai saaya ·∏≥hurshƒ´d-e-qayƒÅmat me√± hai pinhƒÅ√± mujh se gardish-e-sƒÅƒ°har-e-sad-jalva-e-ra√±gƒ´√± tujh se ƒÅ.ina-dƒÅrƒ´-e-yak-dƒ´da-e-hairƒÅ√± mujh se nigah-e-garm se ek aag Tapaktƒ´ hai 'asad' hai charƒÅƒ°hƒÅ√± ·∏≥has-o-·∏≥hƒÅshƒÅk-e-gulistƒÅ√± mujh se bastan-e-ahd-e-mohabbat hama nƒÅ-dƒÅnƒ´ thƒÅ chashm-e-nakush≈´da rahƒÅ uqda-e-paimƒÅ√± mujh se ƒÅtish-afrozi-e-yak-shola-e-ƒ´mƒÅ tujh se chashmak-ƒÅrƒÅ.i-e-sad-shahr charƒÅƒ°hƒÅ√± mujh se har qadam duri-e-manzil hai numayan mujh se meri raftar se bhage hai bayaban mujh se dars-e-unwan-e-tamasha ba-taghaful KHush-tar hai nigah rishta-e-shiraaza-e-mizhgan mujh se wahshat-e-atish-e-dil se shab-e-tanhai mein surat-e-dud raha saya gurezan mujh se gham-e-ushshaq na ho sadgi-amoz-e-butan kis qadar KHana-e-aina hai viran mujh se asar-e-abla se jada-e-sahra-e-junun surat-e-rishta-e-gauhar hai charaghan mujh se be-KHudi bistar-e-tamhid-e-faraghat ho jo pur hai sae ki tarah mera shabistan mujh se shauq-e-didar mein gar tu mujhe gardan mare ho nigah misl-e-gul-e-shama pareshan mujh se bekasi-ha-e-shab-e-hijr ki wahshat hai hai saya KHurshid-e-qayamat mein hai pinhan mujh se gardish-e-saghar-e-sad-jalwa-e-rangin tujh se aaina-dari-e-yak-dida-e-hairan mujh se nigah-e-garm se ek aag Tapakti hai 'asad' hai charaghan KHas-o-KHashak-e-gulistan mujh se bastan-e-ahd-e-mohabbat hama na-dani tha chashm-e-nakushuda raha uqda-e-paiman mujh se aatish-afrozi-e-yak-shola-e-ima tujh se chashmak-arai-e-sad-shahr charaghan mujh se

instruction: you are an urdu/hindi shayar/kavi/poet and you have to complete the following shayari/kavita, respond only in romanized urdu/hindi, make sure you are creative and talk about something profound and beautiful
input: zaKHm par chhiDken kahan tiflan-e-be-parwa namak
output: za·∏≥hm par chhi·∏åke√± kahƒÅ√± tiflƒÅn-e-be-parvƒÅ namak kyƒÅ maza hotƒÅ agar patthar me√± bhƒ´ hotƒÅ namak gard-e-rƒÅh-e-yƒÅr hai sƒÅmƒÅn-e-nƒÅz-e-za·∏≥hm-e-dil varna hotƒÅ hai jahƒÅ√± me√± kis qadar paidƒÅ namak Interestingmujh ko arzƒÅnƒ´ rahe tujh ko mubƒÅrak hojiyo nƒÅla-e-bulbul kƒÅ dard aur ·∏≥handa-e-gul kƒÅ namak shor-e-jaulƒÅ√± thƒÅ kanƒÅr-e-bahr par kis kƒÅ ki aaj gard-e-sƒÅhil hai ba-za·∏≥hm-e-mauja-e-dariyƒÅ namak daad detƒÅ hai mire za·∏≥hm-e-jigar kƒ´ vaah vaah yaad kartƒÅ hai mujhe dekhe hai vo jis jƒÅ namak chho·∏å kar jaanƒÅ tan-e-majr≈´h-e-ƒÅshiq haif hai dil talab kartƒÅ hai za·∏≥hm aur mƒÅ√±ge hai√± a.azƒÅ namak ƒ°hair kƒ´ minnat na khƒ´√±ch≈´√±gƒÅ pai-e-taufƒ´r-e-dard za·∏≥hm misl-e-·∏≥handa-e-qƒÅtil hai sar-tƒÅ-pƒÅ namak yaad hai√± 'ƒ°hƒÅlib' tujhe vo din ki vajd-e-zauq me√± za·∏≥hm se girtƒÅ to mai√± palko√± se chuntƒÅ thƒÅ namak is amal me√± aish kƒ´ lazzat nahƒ´√± miltƒ´ 'asad' zor nisbat mai se rakhtƒÅ hai azƒÅrƒÅ kƒÅ namak zaKHm par chhiDken kahan tiflan-e-be-parwa namak kya maza hota agar patthar mein bhi hota namak gard-e-rah-e-yar hai saman-e-naz-e-zaKHm-e-dil warna hota hai jahan mein kis qadar paida namak Interestingmujh ko arzani rahe tujh ko mubarak hojiyo nala-e-bulbul ka dard aur KHanda-e-gul ka namak shor-e-jaulan tha kanar-e-bahr par kis ka ki aaj gard-e-sahil hai ba-zaKHm-e-mauja-e-dariya namak dad deta hai mere zaKHm-e-jigar ki wah wah yaad karta hai mujhe dekhe hai wo jis ja namak chhoD kar jaana tan-e-majruh-e-ashiq haif hai dil talab karta hai zaKHm aur mange hain aaza namak ghair ki minnat na khinchunga pai-e-taufir-e-dard zaKHm misl-e-KHanda-e-qatil hai sar-ta-pa namak yaad hain 'ghaalib' tujhe wo din ki wajd-e-zauq mein zaKHm se girta to main palkon se chunta tha namak is amal mein aish ki lazzat nahin milti 'asad' zor nisbat mai se rakhta hai azara ka namak

input: jis zaKHm ki ho sakti ho tadbir rafu ki

output: kyƒÅ ta√±g ham sitam-zadagƒÅ√± kƒÅ jahƒÅn hai jis me√± ki ek baiza-e-mor ƒÅsmƒÅn hai hai kƒÅ.enƒÅt ko harakat tere zauq se partav se ƒÅftƒÅb ke zarre me√± jaan hai hƒÅlƒÅ√±ki hai ye sƒ´li-e-·∏≥hƒÅrƒÅ se laala ra√±g ƒ°hƒÅfil ko mere shƒ´she pe mai kƒÅ gumƒÅn hai kƒ´ us ne garm sƒ´na-e-ahl-e-havas me√± jƒÅ aave na kyuu√± pasand ki ThanDƒÅ makƒÅn hai kyƒÅ ·∏≥huub tum ne ƒ°hair ko bosa nahƒ´√± diyƒÅ bas chup raho hamƒÅre bhƒ´ mu√±h me√± zabƒÅn hai baiThƒÅ hai jo ki sƒÅya-e-dƒ´vƒÅr-e-yƒÅr me√± farmƒÅ√±-ravƒÅ-e-kishvar-e-hind≈´stƒÅn hai hastƒ´ kƒÅ e'tibƒÅr bhƒ´ ƒ°ham ne miTƒÅ diyƒÅ kis se kah≈´√± ki daaƒ°h jigar kƒÅ nishƒÅn hai hai baare e'timƒÅd-e-vafƒÅ-dƒÅrƒ´ is qadar 'ƒ°hƒÅlib' ham is me√± ·∏≥hush hai√± ki nƒÅ-mehrbƒÅn hai dehlƒ´ ke rahne vaalo 'asad' ko satƒÅo mat be-chƒÅra chand roz kƒÅ yaa√± mehmƒÅn hai Interestingkya tang hum sitam-zadagan ka jahan hai jis mein ki ek baiza-e-mor aasman hai hai kaenat ko harakat tere zauq se partaw se aaftab ke zarre mein jaan hai haalanki hai ye sili-e-KHara se lala rang ghafil ko mere shishe pe mai ka guman hai ki us ne garm sina-e-ahl-e-hawas mein ja aawe na kyun pasand ki ThanDa makan hai kya KHub tum ne ghair ko bosa nahin diya bas chup raho hamare bhi munh mein zaban hai baiTha hai jo ki saya-e-diwar-e-yar mein farman-rawa-e-kishwar-e-hindustan hai hasti ka e'tibar bhi gham ne miTa diya kis se kahun ki dagh jigar ka nishan hai hai bare e'timad-e-wafa-dari is qadar 'ghaalib' hum is mein KHush hain ki na-mehrban hai dehli ke rahne walo 'asad' ko satao mat be-chaara chand roz ka yan mehman hai Interesting

output: t≈´ dost kas≈´ kƒÅ bhƒ´ sitamgar na huƒÅ thƒÅ auro√± pe hai vo zulm ki mujh par na huƒÅ thƒÅ chho·∏åƒÅ mah-e-na·∏≥hshab kƒ´ tarah dast-e-qazƒÅ ne ·∏≥hurshƒ´d hun≈´z us ke barƒÅbar na huƒÅ thƒÅ taufƒ´q ba-andƒÅza-e-himmat hai azal se ƒÅ√±kho√± me√± hai vo qatra ki gauhar na huƒÅ thƒÅ jab tak ki na dekhƒÅ thƒÅ qad-e-yƒÅr kƒÅ aalam mai√± mo'taqid-e-fitna-e-mahshar na huƒÅ thƒÅ mai√± sƒÅda-dil ƒÅzurdagi-e-yƒÅr se ·∏≥hush huu√± ya.anƒ´ sabaq-e-shauq mukarrar na huƒÅ thƒÅ dariyƒÅ-e-ma.ƒÅsƒ´ tunuk-ƒÅbƒ´ se huƒÅ ·∏≥hushk merƒÅ sar-e-dƒÅman bhƒ´ abhƒ´ tar na huƒÅ thƒÅ jaarƒ´ thƒ´ 'asad' dƒÅƒ°h-e-jigar se mirƒ´ tahsƒ´l ƒÅtish-kada jƒÅgƒ´r-e-samundar na huƒÅ thƒÅ tu dost kasu ka bhi sitamgar na hua tha auron pe hai wo zulm ki mujh par na hua tha chhoDa mah-e-naKHshab ki tarah dast-e-qaza ne KHurshid hunuz us ke barabar na hua tha taufiq ba-andaza-e-himmat hai azal se aankhon mein hai wo qatra ki gauhar na hua tha jab tak ki na dekha tha qad-e-yar ka aalam main mo'taqid-e-fitna-e-mahshar na hua tha main sada-dil aazurdagi-e-yar se KHush hun yani sabaq-e-shauq mukarrar na hua tha dariya-e-maasi tunuk-abi se hua KHushk mera sar-e-daman bhi abhi tar na hua tha jari thi 'asad' dagh-e-jigar se meri tahsil aatish-kada jagir-e-samundar na hua tha

instruction: you are an urdu/hindi shayar/kavi/poet and you have to complete the following shayari/kavita, respond only in romanized urdu/hindi, make sure you are creative and talk about something profound and beautiful
input: warasta us se hain ki mohabbat hi kyun na ho
output: vƒÅrasta us se hai√± ki mohabbat hƒ´ kyuu√± na ho kiije hamƒÅre saath adƒÅvat hƒ´ kyuu√± na ho chho·∏åƒÅ na mujh me√± zo.af ne ra√±g i·∏≥htilƒÅt kƒÅ hai dil pe baar naqsh-e-mohabbat hƒ´ kyuu√± na ho hai mujh ko tujh se tazkira-e-ƒ°hair kƒÅ gila har-chand bar-sabƒ´l-e-shikƒÅyat hƒ´ kyuu√± na ho paidƒÅ huƒ´ hai kahte hai√± har dard kƒ´ davƒÅ yuu√± ho to chƒÅra-e-ƒ°ham-e-ulfat hƒ´ kyuu√± na ho DaalƒÅ na be-kasƒ´ ne kisƒ´ se muƒÅmla apne se khƒ´√±chtƒÅ huu√± ·∏≥hajƒÅlat hƒ´ kyuu√± na ho hai aadmƒ´ bajƒÅ.e ·∏≥hud ik mahshar-e-·∏≥hayƒÅl ham anjuman samajhte hai√± ·∏≥halvat hƒ´ kyuu√± na ho ha√±gƒÅma-e-zab≈´ni-e-himmat hai infi.ƒÅl hƒÅsil na kiije dahr se ibrat hƒ´ kyuu√± na ho vƒÅrastagƒ´ bahƒÅna-e-begƒÅngƒ´ nahƒ´√± apne se kar na ƒ°hair se vahshat hƒ´ kyuu√± na ho miTtƒÅ hai faut-e-fursat-e-hastƒ´ kƒÅ ƒ°ham koƒ´ umr-e-azƒ´z sarf-e-ibƒÅdat hƒ´ kyuu√± na ho us fitna-·∏≥h≈´ ke dar se ab uThte nahƒ´√± 'asad' us me√± hamƒÅre sar pe qayƒÅmat hƒ´ kyuu√± na ho warasta us se hain ki mohabbat hi kyun na ho kije hamare sath adawat hi kyun na ho chhoDa na mujh mein zoaf ne rang iKHtilat ka hai dil pe bar naqsh-e-mohabbat hi kyun na ho hai mujh ko tujh se tazkira-e-ghair ka gila har-chand bar-sabil-e-shikayat hi kyun na ho paida hui hai kahte hain har dard ki dawa yun ho to chaara-e-gham-e-ulfat hi kyun na ho Dala na be-kasi ne kisi se muamla apne se khinchta hun KHajalat hi kyun na ho hai aadmi bajae KHud ek mahshar-e-KHayal hum anjuman samajhte hain KHalwat hi kyun na ho hangama-e-zabuni-e-himmat hai infial hasil na kije dahr se ibrat hi kyun na ho warastagi bahana-e-begangi nahin apne se kar na ghair se wahshat hi kyun na ho miTta hai faut-e-fursat-e-hasti ka gham koi umr-e-aziz sarf-e-ibaadat hi kyun na ho us fitna-KHu ke dar se ab uThte nahin 'asad' us mein hamare sar pe qayamat hi kyun na ho

thƒ´ ƒÅ.ina-dƒÅr ban ga.ƒ´ hairat-e-naqsh-e-pƒÅ ki yuu√± gar tire dil me√± ho ·∏≥hayƒÅl vasl me√± shauq kƒÅ zavƒÅl mauj muhƒ´t-e-ƒÅb me√± maare hai dast-o-pƒÅ ki yuu√± jo ye kahe ki re·∏≥hta ky≈´√±ke ho rashk-e-fƒÅrsƒ´ gufta-e-'ƒ°hƒÅlib' ek baar pa·∏åh ke use sunƒÅ ki yuu√± ghuncha-e-na-shagufta ko dur se mat dikha ki yun bose ko puchhta hun main munh se mujhe bata ki yun pursish-e-tarz-e-dilbari kijiye kya ki bin kahe us ke har ek ishaare se nikle hai ye ada ki yun raat ke waqt mai piye sath raqib ko liye aae wo yan KHuda kare par na kare KHuda ki yun ghair se raat kya bani ye jo kaha to dekhiye samne aan baiThna aur ye dekhna ki yun bazm mein us ke ru-ba-ru kyun na KHamosh baiThiye us ki to KHamushi mein bhi hai yahi muddaa ki yun main ne kaha ki bazm-e-naz chahiye ghair se tahi sun ke sitam-zarif ne mujh ko uTha diya ki yun mujh se kaha jo yar ne jate hain hosh kis tarah dekh ke meri be-KHudi chalne lagi hawa ki yun kab mujhe ku-e-yar mein rahne ki waza yaad thi aaina-dar ban gai hairat-e-naqsh-e-pa ki yun gar tere dil mein ho KHayal wasl mein shauq ka zawal mauj muhit-e-ab mein mare hai dast-o-pa ki yun jo ye kahe ki reKHta kyunke ho rashk-e-farsi gufta-e-'ghaalib' ek bar paDh ke use suna ki yun

output: ƒ°ham-e-duniyƒÅ se gar paa.ƒ´ bhƒ´ fursat sar uThƒÅne kƒ´ falak kƒÅ dekhnƒÅ taqrƒ´b tere yaad aane kƒ´ khulegƒÅ kis tarah mazm≈´√± mire makt≈´b kƒÅ yƒÅ-rab qasam khaa.ƒ´ hai us kƒÅfir ne kƒÅƒ°haz ke jalƒÅne kƒ´ lipaTnƒÅ parniyƒÅ√± me√± shola-e-ƒÅtish kƒÅ pinhƒÅ√± hai vale mushkil hai hikmat dil me√± soz-e-ƒ°ham chhupƒÅne kƒ´ unhe√± manz≈´r apne za·∏≥hmiyo√± kƒÅ dekh aanƒÅ thƒÅ uThe the sair-e-gul ko dekhnƒÅ sho·∏≥hƒ´ bahƒÅne kƒ´ hamƒÅrƒ´ sƒÅdgƒ´ thƒ´ iltifƒÅt-e-nƒÅz par marnƒÅ tirƒÅ aanƒÅ na thƒÅ zƒÅlim magar tamhƒ´d jaane kƒ´ lakad k≈´b-e-havƒÅdis kƒÅ tahammul kar nahƒ´√± saktƒ´ mirƒ´ tƒÅqat ki zƒÅmin thƒ´ buto√± kƒ´ naaz uThƒÅne kƒ´ kah≈´√± kyƒÅ ·∏≥h≈´bi-e-auzƒÅ-e-abnƒÅ-e-zamƒÅ√± 'ƒ°hƒÅlib' badƒ´ kƒ´ us ne jis se ham ne kƒ´ thƒ´ bƒÅr-hƒÅ nekƒ´ Interestinggham-e-duniya se gar pai bhi fursat sar uThane ki falak ka dekhna taqrib tere yaad aane ki khulega kis tarah mazmun mere maktub ka ya-rab qasam khai hai us kafir ne kaghaz ke jalane ki lipaTna parniyan mein shola-e-atish ka pinhan hai wale mushkil hai hikmat dil mein soz-e-gham chhupane ki unhen manzur apne zaKHmiyon ka dekh aana tha uThe the sair-e-gul ko dekhna shoKHi bahane ki hamari sadgi thi iltifat-e-naz par marna tera aana na tha zalim magar tamhid jaane ki lakad kub-e-hawadis ka tahammul kar nahin sakti meri taqat ki zamin thi buton ki naz uThane ki kahun kya KHubi-e-auza-e-abna-e-zaman 'ghaalib' badi ki us ne jis se hum ne ki thi bar-ha neki Interesting

input: be-etidaliyon se subuk sab mein hum hue
output: be-e'tidƒÅliyo√± se subuk sab me√± ham hue jitne ziyƒÅda ho ga.e utne hƒ´ kam hue pinhƒÅ√± thƒÅ daam sa·∏≥ht qarƒ´b ƒÅshiyƒÅn ke u·∏åne na paa.e the ki giraftƒÅr ham hue hastƒ´ hamƒÅrƒ´ apnƒ´ fanƒÅ par dalƒ´l hai yaa√± tak miTe ki aap ham apnƒ´ qasam hue sa·∏≥htƒ´ kashƒÅn-e-ishq kƒ´ p≈´chhe hai kyƒÅ ·∏≥habar vo log rafta rafta sarƒÅpƒÅ alam hue terƒ´ vafƒÅ se kyƒÅ ho talƒÅfƒ´ ki dahr me√± tere sivƒÅ bhƒ´ ham pe bahut se sitam hue likhte rahe jun≈´√± kƒ´ hikƒÅyƒÅt-e-·∏≥h≈´√±-chakƒÅ√± har-chand is me√± haath hamƒÅre qalam hue allƒÅh re terƒ´ tundi-e-·∏≥h≈´ jis ke biim se ajzƒÅ-e-nƒÅla dil me√± mire rizq-e-ham hue ahl-e-havas kƒ´ fat.h hai tark-e-nabard-e-ishq jo paa√±v uTh ga.e vahƒ´ un ke alam hue naale adam me√± chand hamƒÅre supurd the jo vaa√± na khi√±ch sake so vo yaa√± aa ke dam hue chho·∏åƒ´ 'asad' na ham ne gadƒÅ.ƒ´ me√± dil-lagƒ´ saa.il hue to ƒÅshiq-e-ahl-e-karam hue be-e'tidaliyon se subuk sab mein hum hue jitne ziyaada ho gae utne hi kam hue pinhan tha dam saKHt qarib aashiyan ke uDne na pae the ki giraftar hum hue hasti hamari apni fana par dalil hai yan tak miTe ki aap hum apni qasam hue saKHti kashan-e-ishq ki puchhe hai kya KHabar wo log rafta rafta sarapa alam hue teri wafa se kya ho talafi ki dahr mein tere siwa bhi hum pe bahut se sitam hue likhte rahe junun ki hikayat-e-KHun-chakan har-chand is mein hath hamare qalam hue allah re teri tundi-e-KHu jis ke bim se ajza-e-nala dil mein mere rizq-e-ham hue ahl-e-hawas ki fath hai tark-e-nabard-e-ishq jo panw uTh gae wahi un ke alam hue nale adam mein chand hamare supurd the jo wan na khinch sake so wo yan aa ke dam hue chhoDi 'asad' na hum ne gadai mein dil-lagi sail hue to aashiq-e-ahl-e-karam hue

input: husn ghamze ki kashakash se chhuTa mere baad
output: husn ƒ°hamze kƒ´ kashƒÅkash se chhuTƒÅ mere ba.ad baare ƒÅrƒÅm se hai√± ahl-e-jafƒÅ mere ba.ad mansab-e-sheftagƒ´ ke koƒ´ qƒÅbil na rahƒÅ huƒ´ mƒÅz≈´li-e-andƒÅz-o-adƒÅ mere ba.ad sham.a bujhtƒ´ hai to us me√± se dhuƒÅ√± uThtƒÅ hai sho.ala-e-ishq siyah-posh huƒÅ mere ba.ad ·∏≥huu√± hai dil ·∏≥haak me√± ahvƒÅl-e-butƒÅ√± par ya.anƒ´ un ke nƒÅ·∏≥hun hue mohatƒÅj-e-hinƒÅ mere ba.ad dar-·∏≥hur-e-arz nahƒ´√± jauhar-e-bedƒÅd ko jƒÅ nigah-e-nƒÅz hai surme se ·∏≥hafƒÅ mere ba.ad hai jun≈´√± ahl-e-jun≈´√± ke liye ƒÅƒ°hosh-e-vidƒÅ.a chaak hotƒÅ hai garebƒÅ√± se judƒÅ mere ba.ad kaun hotƒÅ hai harƒ´f-e-mai-e-mard-afgan-e-ishq hai mukarrar lab-e-sƒÅqƒ´ pe salƒÅ mere ba.ad ƒ°ham se martƒÅ huu√± ki itnƒÅ nahƒ´√± duniyƒÅ me√± koƒ´ ki kare tƒÅzƒ´yat-e-mehr-o-vafƒÅ mere ba.ad aa.e hai bekasƒ´-e-ishq pe ronƒÅ 'ƒ°hƒÅlib' kis ke ghar jƒÅ.egƒÅ sailƒÅb-e-balƒÅ mere ba.ad thƒ´ nigah merƒ´ nihƒÅ√±-·∏≥hƒÅna-e-dil kƒ´ naqqƒÅb be-·∏≥hatar jiite hai√± arbƒÅb-e-riyƒÅ mere ba.ad thƒÅ mai√± guldasta-e-ahbƒÅb kƒ´ bandish kƒ´ giyƒÅh mutafarriq hue mere rufaqƒÅ mere ba.ad husn ghamze ki kashakash se chhuTa mere baad bare aaram se hain ahl-e-jafa mere baad mansab-e-sheftagi ke koi qabil na raha hui mazuli-e-andaz-o-ada mere baad shama bujhti hai to us mein se dhuan uThta hai shoala-e-ishq siyah-posh hua mere baad KHun hai dil KHak mein ahwal-e-butan par yani un ke naKHun hue mohataj-e-hina mere baad dar-KHur-e-arz nahin jauhar-e-bedad ko ja nigah-e-naz hai surme se KHafa mere baad hai junun ahl-e-junun ke liye aaghosh-e-widaa chaak hota hai gareban se juda mere baad kaun hota hai harif-e-mai-e-mard-afgan-e-ishq hai mukarrar lab-e-saqi pe sala mere baad gham se marta hun ki itna nahin duniya mein koi ki kare taziyat-e-mehr-o-wafa mere baad aae hai bekasi-e-ishq pe rona 'ghaalib' kis ke ghar jaega sailab-e-bala mere baad thi nigah meri nihan-KHana-e-dil ki naqqab be-KHatar jite hain arbab-e-riya mere baad tha main guldasta-e-ahbab ki bandish ki giyah mutafarriq hue mere rufaqa mere baad

b≈´-e-gul nƒÅla-e-dil d≈´d-e-charƒÅƒ°h-e-mahfil jo tirƒ´ bazm se niklƒÅ so pareshƒÅ√± niklƒÅ dil-e-hasrat-zada thƒÅ mƒÅ.ida-e-lazzat-e-dard kaam yƒÅro√± kƒÅ ba-qadr-e-lab-o-dandƒÅ√± niklƒÅ suvaidƒÅ-e-bayƒÅbƒÅ√± niklƒÅ shor-e-rusvƒÅ.i-e-dil dekh ki yak-nƒÅla-e-shauq laakh parde me√± chhupƒÅ par vahƒ´ uryƒÅ√± niklƒÅ sho·∏≥hƒ´-e-ra√±g-e-hinƒÅ ·∏≥h≈´n-e-vafƒÅ se kab tak ƒÅ·∏≥hir ai ·∏≥hƒÅna-·∏≥harƒÅb peshvƒÅ lene mujhe ghar se bayƒÅbƒÅ√± niklƒÅ Interestingshauq har rang raqib-e-sar-o-saman nikla qais taswir ke parde mein bhi uryan nikla zaKHm ne dad na di tangi-e-dil ki ya rab tir bhi sina-e-bismil se par-afshan nikla bu-e-gul nala-e-dil dud-e-charagh-e-mahfil jo teri bazm se nikla so pareshan nikla dil-e-hasrat-zada tha maida-e-lazzat-e-dard kaam yaron ka ba-qadr-e-lab-o-dandan nikla Interestingthi nau-amuz-e-fana himmat-e-dushwar-pasand saKHt mushkil hai ki ye kaam bhi aasan nikla dil mein phir girye ne ek shor uThaya 'ghaalib' aah jo qatra na nikla tha mere sine mein lekin aaKHir jis ko dil kahte the so tir ka paikan nikla kis qadar KHak hua hai dil-e-majnun ya rab naqsh-e-har-zarra suwaida-e-bayaban nikla shor-e-ruswai-e-dil dekh ki yak-nala-e-shauq lakh parde mein chhupa par wahi uryan nikla shoKHi-e-rang-e-hina KHun-e-wafa se kab tak aaKHir ai ahd-shikan tu bhi pasheman nikla jauhar-ijad-e-KHat-e-sabz hai KHud-bini-e-husn jo na dekha tha so aaine mein pinhan nikla main bhi mazur-e-junun hun 'asad' ai KHana-KHarab peshwa lene mujhe ghar se bayaban nikla Interesting

output: bas-ki dushvƒÅr hai har kaam kƒÅ ƒÅsƒÅ√± honƒÅ aadmƒ´ ko bhƒ´ mayassar nahƒ´√± insƒÅ√± honƒÅ girya chƒÅhe hai ·∏≥harƒÅbƒ´ mire kƒÅshƒÅne kƒ´ dar o dƒ´vƒÅr se Tapke hai bayƒÅbƒÅ√± honƒÅ vƒÅ-e-dƒ´vƒÅngi-e-shauq ki har dam mujh ko aap jaanƒÅ udhar aur aap hƒ´ hairƒÅ√± honƒÅ jalva az-bas-ki taqƒÅzƒÅ-e-nigah kartƒÅ hai jauhar-e-ƒÅ.ina bhƒ´ chƒÅhe hai mizhgƒÅ√± honƒÅ ishrat-e-qatl-gah-e-ahl-e-tamannƒÅ mat p≈´chh ƒ´d-e-nazzƒÅra hai shamshƒ´r kƒÅ uryƒÅ√± honƒÅ le ga.e ·∏≥haak me√± ham dƒÅƒ°h-e-tamannƒÅ-e-nashƒÅt t≈´ ho aur aap ba-sad-ra√±g-e-gulistƒÅ√± honƒÅ ishrat-e-pƒÅra-e-dil za·∏≥hm-e-tamannƒÅ khƒÅnƒÅ lazzat-e-rƒ´sh-e-jigar ƒ°harq-e-namak-dƒÅ√± honƒÅ kƒ´ mire qatl ke ba.ad us ne jafƒÅ se tauba haa.e us z≈´d-pashƒ´mƒÅ√± kƒÅ pashemƒÅ√± honƒÅ haif us chaar girah kap·∏åe kƒ´ qismat 'ƒ°hƒÅlib' jis kƒ´ qismat me√± ho ƒÅshiq kƒÅ garebƒÅ√± honƒÅ bas-ki dushwar hai har kaam ka aasan hona aadmi ko bhi mayassar nahin insan hona girya chahe hai KHarabi mere kashane ki dar o diwar se Tapke hai bayaban hona wa-e-diwangi-e-shauq ki har dam mujh ko aap jaana udhar aur aap hi hairan hona jalwa az-bas-ki taqaza-e-nigah karta hai jauhar-e-aina bhi chahe hai mizhgan hona ishrat-e-qatl-gah-e-ahl-e-tamanna mat puchh id-e-nazzara hai shamshir ka uryan hona le gae KHak mein hum dagh-e-tamanna-e-nashat tu ho aur aap ba-sad-rang-e-gulistan hona ishrat-e-para-e-dil zaKHm-e-tamanna khana lazzat-e-rish-e-jigar gharq-e-namak-dan hona ki mere qatl ke baad us ne jafa se tauba hae us zud-pashiman ka pasheman hona haif us chaar girah kapDe ki qismat 'ghaalib' jis ki qismat mein ho aashiq ka gareban hona

output: rashk kahtƒÅ hai ki us kƒÅ ƒ°hair se i·∏≥hlƒÅs haif aql kahtƒ´ hai ki vo be-mehr kis kƒÅ ƒÅshnƒÅ zarra zarra sƒÅƒ°har-e-mai-·∏≥hƒÅna-e-nai-ra√±g hai gardish-e-majn≈´√± ba-chashmak-hƒÅ-e-lailƒÅ ƒÅshnƒÅ shauq hai sƒÅmƒÅ√±-tarƒÅz-e-nƒÅzish-e-arbƒÅb-e-ajz zarra sahrƒÅ-dast-gƒÅh o qatra dariyƒÅ-ƒÅshnƒÅ mai√± aur ek aafat kƒÅ Tuk·∏åƒÅ vo dil-e-vahshƒ´ ki hai ƒÅfiyat kƒÅ dushman aur ƒÅvƒÅrgƒ´ kƒÅ ƒÅshnƒÅ shikva-sa√±j-e-rashk-e-ham-dƒ´gar na rahnƒÅ chƒÅhiye merƒÅ zaan≈´ monis aur ƒÅ.ƒ´na terƒÅ ƒÅshnƒÅ kohkan naqqƒÅsh-e-yak-timsƒÅl-e-shƒ´rƒ´√± thƒÅ 'asad' sa√±g se sar maar kar hove na paidƒÅ ƒÅshnƒÅ ·∏≥hud-parastƒ´ se rahe bƒÅham-digar nƒÅ-ƒÅshnƒÅ bekasƒ´ merƒ´ sharƒ´k ƒÅ.ƒ´na terƒÅ ƒÅshnƒÅ ƒÅtish-e-m≈´-e-dimƒÅƒ°h-e-shauq hai terƒÅ tapƒÅk varna ham kis ke hai√± ai dƒÅƒ°h-e-tamannƒÅ ƒÅshnƒÅ jauhar-e-ƒÅ.ƒ´na juz ramz-e-sar-e-mizhgƒÅ√± nahƒ´√± ƒÅshnƒÅ kƒ´ ham-digar samjhe hai iimƒÅ ƒÅshnƒÅ rabt-e-yak-shƒ´rƒÅza-e-vahshat hai√± ajzƒÅ-e-bahƒÅr sabza begƒÅna sabƒÅ ƒÅvƒÅra gul nƒÅ-ƒÅshnƒÅ be-dimƒÅƒ°hƒ´ shikva-sa√±j-e-rashk-e-ham-dƒ´gar nahƒ´√± yaar terƒÅ jƒÅm-e-mai ·∏≥hamyƒÅza merƒÅ ƒÅshnƒÅ rashk kahta hai ki us ka ghair se iKHlas haif aql kahti hai ki wo be-mehr kis ka aashna zarra zarra saghar-e-mai-KHana-e-nai-rang hai gardish-e-majnun ba-chashmak-ha-e-laila aashna shauq hai saman-taraaz-e-nazish-e-arbab-e-ajz zarra sahra-dast-gah o qatra dariya-ashna main aur ek aafat ka TukDa wo dil-e-wahshi ki hai aafiyat ka dushman aur aawargi ka aashna shikwa-sanj-e-rashk-e-ham-digar na rahna chahiye mera zanu monis aur aaina tera aashna kohkan naqqash-e-yak-timsal-e-shirin tha 'asad' sang se sar mar kar howe na paida aashna KHud-parasti se rahe baham-digar na-ashna bekasi meri sharik aaina tera aashna aatish-e-mu-e-dimagh-e-shauq hai tera tapak warna hum kis ke hain ai dagh-e-tamanna aashna jauhar-e-aina juz ramz-e-sar-e-mizhgan nahin aashna ki ham-digar samjhe hai ima aashna rabt-e-yak-shiraaza-e-wahshat hain ajza-e-bahaar sabza begana saba aawara gul na-ashna be-dimaghi shikwa-sanj-e-rashk-e-ham-digar nahin yar tera jam-e-mai KHamyaza mera aashna

instruction: you are an urdu/hindi shayar/kavi/poet and you have to complete the following shayari/kavita, respond only in romanized urdu/hindi, make sure you are creative and talk about something profound and beautiful
input: phir hua waqt ki ho baal-kusha mauj-e-sharab
output: phir huƒÅ vaqt ki ho bƒÅl-kushƒÅ mauj-e-sharƒÅb de bat-e-mai ko dil-o-dast-e-shanƒÅ mauj-e-sharƒÅb p≈´chh mat vaj.h-e-siyah-mastƒ´-e-arbƒÅb-e-chaman sƒÅya-e-tƒÅk me√± hotƒ´ hai havƒÅ mauj-e-sharƒÅb jo huƒÅ ƒ°harqa-e-mai ba·∏≥ht-e-rasƒÅ rakhtƒÅ hai sar se guzre pe bhƒ´ hai bƒÅl-e-humƒÅ mauj-e-sharƒÅb hai ye barsƒÅt vo mausam ki ajab kyƒÅ hai agar mauj-e-hastƒ´ ko kare faiz-e-havƒÅ mauj-e-sharƒÅb chaar mauj uThtƒ´ hai t≈´fƒÅn-e-tarab se har s≈´ mauj-e-gul mauj-e-shafaq mauj-e-sabƒÅ mauj-e-sharƒÅb jis qadar r≈´h-e-nabƒÅtƒ´ hai jigar tishna-e-nƒÅz de hai taskƒ´√± ba-dam-e-ƒÅb-e-baqƒÅ mauj-e-sharƒÅb bas-ki dau·∏åe hai rag-e-tƒÅk me√± ·∏≥huu√± ho ho kar shahpar-e-ra√±g se hai bƒÅl-kushƒÅ mauj-e-sharƒÅb mauja-e-gul se charƒÅƒ°hƒÅ√± hai guzar-gƒÅh-e-·∏≥hayƒÅl hai tasavvur me√± zi-bas jalva-numƒÅ mauj-e-sharƒÅb nashshe ke parde me√± hai mahv-e-tamƒÅshƒÅ-e-dimƒÅƒ°h bas-ki rakhtƒ´ hai sar-e-nash-o-numƒÅ mauj-e-sharƒÅb ek aalam pe hai√± t≈´fƒÅni-e-kaifiyat-e-fasl mauja-e-sabza-e-nau-·∏≥hez se tƒÅ mauj-e-sharƒÅb sharh-e-ha√±gƒÅma-e-hastƒ´ hai zahe mausam-e-gul rah-bar-e-qatrƒÅ-ba-dariyƒÅ hai ·∏≥hoshƒÅ mauj-e-sharƒÅb hosh u·∏åte hai√± mire jalva-e-gul dekh 'asad' phir huƒÅ vaqt ki ho bƒÅl-kushƒÅ mauj-e-sharƒÅb phir hua waqt ki ho baal-kusha mauj-e-sharab de bat-e-mai ko dil-o-dast-e-shana mauj-e-sharab puchh mat wajh-e-siyah-masti-e-arbab-e-chaman saya-e-tak mein hoti hai hawa mauj-e-sharab jo hua gharqa-e-mai baKHt-e-rasa rakhta hai sar se guzre pe bhi hai baal-e-huma mauj-e-sharab hai ye barsat wo mausam ki ajab kya hai agar mauj-e-hasti ko kare faiz-e-hawa mauj-e-sharab chaar mauj uThti hai tufan-e-tarab se har su mauj-e-gul mauj-e-shafaq mauj-e-saba mauj-e-sharab jis qadar ruh-e-nabaati hai jigar tishna-e-naz de hai taskin ba-dam-e-ab-e-baqa mauj-e-sharab bas-ki dauDe hai rag-e-tak mein KHun ho ho kar shahpar-e-rang se hai baal-kusha mauj-e-sharab mauja-e-gul se charaghan hai guzar-gah-e-KHayal hai tasawwur mein zi-bas jalwa-numa mauj-e-sharab nashshe ke parde mein hai mahw-e-tamasha-e-dimagh bas-ki rakhti hai sar-e-nash-o-numa mauj-e-sharab ek aalam pe hain tufani-e-kaifiyat-e-fasl mauja-e-sabza-e-nau-KHez se ta mauj-e-sharab sharh-e-hangama-e-hasti hai zahe mausam-e-gul rah-bar-e-qatra-ba-dariya hai KHosha mauj-e-sharab hosh uDte hain mere jalwa-e-gul dekh 'asad' phir hua waqt ki ho baal-kusha mauj-e-sharab

instruction: you are an urdu/hindi shayar/kavi/poet and you have to complete the following shayari/kavita, respond only in romanized urdu/hindi, make sure you are creative and talk about something profound and beautiful
input: garm-e-fariyaad rakha shakl-e-nihaali ne mujhe
output: garm-e-fariyƒÅd rakhƒÅ shakl-e-nihƒÅlƒ´ ne mujhe tab amaa√± hijr me√± dƒ´ bard-e-layƒÅlƒ´ ne mujhe nisyah-o-naqd-e-do-ƒÅlam kƒ´ haqƒ´qat mƒÅl≈´m le liyƒÅ mujh se mirƒ´ himmat-e-ƒÅlƒ´ ne mujhe kasrat-ƒÅrƒÅ.i-e-vahdat hai parastƒÅrƒ´-e-vahm kar diyƒÅ kƒÅfir in asnƒÅm-e-·∏≥hayƒÅlƒ´ ne mujhe havas-e-gul ke tasavvur me√± bhƒ´ khaTkƒÅ na rahƒÅ ajab ƒÅrƒÅm diyƒÅ be-par-o-bƒÅlƒ´ ne mujhe zindagƒ´ me√± bhƒ´ rahƒÅ zauq-e-fanƒÅ kƒÅ maarƒÅ nashsha ba·∏≥hshƒÅ ƒ°hazab us sƒÅƒ°har-e-·∏≥hƒÅlƒ´ ne mujhe bas-ki thƒ´ fasl-e-·∏≥hizƒÅn-e-chamanistƒÅn-e-su·∏≥han ra√±g-e-shohrat na diyƒÅ tƒÅza-·∏≥hayƒÅlƒ´ ne mujhe jalva-e-·∏≥hur se fanƒÅ hotƒ´ hai shabnam 'ƒ°hƒÅlib' kho diyƒÅ satvat-e-asmƒÅ-e-jalƒÅlƒ´ ne mujhe garm-e-fariyaad rakha shakl-e-nihaali ne mujhe tab aman hijr mein di bard-e-layali ne mujhe nisyah-o-naqd-e-do-alam ki haqiqat malum le liya mujh se meri himmat-e-ali ne mujhe kasrat-arai-e-wahdat hai parastari-e-wahm kar diya kafir in asnam-e-KHayali ne mujhe hawas-e-gul ke tasawwur mein bhi khaTka na raha ajab aaram diya be-par-o-baali ne mujhe zindagi mein bhi raha zauq-e-fana ka mara nashsha baKHsha ghazab us saghar-e-KHali ne mujhe bas-ki thi fasl-e-KHizan-e-chamanistan-e-suKHan rang-e-shohrat na diya taza-KHayali ne mujhe jalwa-e-KHur se fana hoti hai shabnam 'ghaalib' kho diya satwat-e-asma-e-jalali ne mujhe
