input: muzhda ai zauq-e-asiri ki nazar aata hai
output: muzhda ai zauq-e-asƒ´rƒ´ ki nazar aatƒÅ hai dƒÅm-e-·∏≥hƒÅlƒ´ qafas-e-murƒ°h-e-giraftƒÅr ke paas jigar-e-tishna-e-ƒÅzƒÅr tasallƒ´ na huƒÅ j≈´-e-·∏≥h≈´√± ham ne bahƒÅ.ƒ´ bun-e-har ·∏≥haar ke paas mu√±d ga.ii√± kholte hƒ´ kholte ƒÅ√±khe√± hai hai ·∏≥huub vaqt aa.e tum is ƒÅshiq-e-bƒ´mƒÅr ke paas mai√± bhƒ´ ruk ruk ke na martƒÅ jo zabƒÅ√± ke badle dashna ik tez sƒÅ hotƒÅ mire ƒ°ham-·∏≥hvƒÅr ke paas dahan-e-sher me√± jƒÅ baiThe lekin ai dil na kha·∏åe ho jiye ·∏≥h≈´bƒÅn-e-dil-ƒÅzƒÅr ke paas dekh kar tujh ko chaman bas-ki num≈´ kartƒÅ hai ·∏≥hud-ba-·∏≥hud pahu√±che hai gul gosha-e-dastƒÅr ke paas mar gayƒÅ pho·∏å ke sar 'ƒ°hƒÅlib'-e-vahshƒ´ hai hai baiThnƒÅ us kƒÅ vo aa kar tirƒ´ dƒ´vƒÅr ke paas muzhda ai zauq-e-asiri ki nazar aata hai dam-e-KHali qafas-e-murgh-e-giraftar ke pas jigar-e-tishna-e-azar tasalli na hua ju-e-KHun hum ne bahai bun-e-har KHar ke pas mund gain kholte hi kholte aankhen hai hai KHub waqt aae tum is aashiq-e-bimar ke pas main bhi ruk ruk ke na marta jo zaban ke badle dashna ek tez sa hota mere gham-KHwar ke pas dahan-e-sher mein ja baiThe lekin ai dil na khaDe ho jiye KHuban-e-dil-azar ke pas dekh kar tujh ko chaman bas-ki numu karta hai KHud-ba-KHud pahunche hai gul gosha-e-dastar ke pas mar gaya phoD ke sar 'ghaalib'-e-wahshi hai hai baiThna us ka wo aa kar teri diwar ke pas

instruction: you are an urdu/hindi shayar/kavi/poet and you have to complete the following shayari/kavita, respond only in romanized urdu/hindi, make sure you are creative and talk about something profound and beautiful
input: hai kis qadar halak-e-fareb-e-wafa-e-gul
output: hai kis qadar halƒÅk-e-fareb-e-vafƒÅ-e-gul bulbul ke kƒÅrobƒÅr pe hai√± ·∏≥handa-hƒÅ-e-gul ƒÅzƒÅdƒ´-e-nasƒ´m mubƒÅrak ki har taraf TuuTe pa·∏åe hai√± halqa-e-dƒÅm-e-havƒÅ-e-gul jo thƒÅ so mauj-e-ra√±g ke dhoke me√± mar gayƒÅ ai vaa.e nƒÅla-e-lab-e-·∏≥h≈´nƒ´√±-navƒÅ-e-gul ·∏≥hush-hƒÅl us harƒ´f-e-siyah-mast kƒÅ ki jo rakhtƒÅ ho misl-e-sƒÅya-e-gul sar-ba-pƒÅ-e-gul ƒ´jƒÅd kartƒ´ hai use tere liye bahƒÅr merƒÅ raqƒ´b hai nafas-e-itr-sƒÅ-e-gul sharminda rakhte hai√± mujhe bƒÅd-e-bahƒÅr se mƒ´nƒÅ-e-be-sharƒÅb o dil-e-be-havƒÅ-e-gul satvat se tere jalva-e-husn-e-ƒ°huy≈´r kƒ´ ·∏≥huu√± hai mirƒ´ nigƒÅh me√± ra√±g-e-adƒÅ-e-gul tere hƒ´ jalve kƒÅ hai ye dhokƒÅ ki aaj tak be-i·∏≥htiyƒÅr dau·∏åe hai gul dar-qafƒÅ-e-gul 'ƒ°hƒÅlib' mujhe hai us se ham-ƒÅƒ°hoshƒ´ aarz≈´ jis kƒÅ ·∏≥hayƒÅl hai gul-e-jeb-e-qabƒÅ-e-gul dƒ´vƒÅnagƒÅ√± kƒÅ chƒÅra faroƒ°h-e-bahƒÅr hai hai shƒÅ·∏≥h-e-gul me√± panja-e-·∏≥h≈´bƒÅ√± bajƒÅ.e gul mizhgƒÅ√± talak rasƒÅ.ƒ´-e-la·∏≥ht-e-jigar kahƒÅ√± ai vaa.e gar nigƒÅh na ho ƒÅshnƒÅ-e-gul hai kis qadar halak-e-fareb-e-wafa-e-gul bulbul ke karobar pe hain KHanda-ha-e-gul aazadi-e-nasim mubarak ki har taraf TuTe paDe hain halqa-e-dam-e-hawa-e-gul jo tha so mauj-e-rang ke dhoke mein mar gaya ai wae nala-e-lab-e-KHunin-nawa-e-gul KHush-haal us harif-e-siyah-mast ka ki jo rakhta ho misl-e-saya-e-gul sar-ba-pa-e-gul ijad karti hai use tere liye bahaar mera raqib hai nafas-e-itr-sa-e-gul sharminda rakhte hain mujhe baad-e-bahaar se mina-e-be-sharab o dil-e-be-hawa-e-gul satwat se tere jalwa-e-husn-e-ghuyur ki KHun hai meri nigah mein rang-e-ada-e-gul tere hi jalwe ka hai ye dhoka ki aaj tak be-iKHtiyar dauDe hai gul dar-qafa-e-gul 'ghaalib' mujhe hai us se ham-aghoshi aarzu jis ka KHayal hai gul-e-jeb-e-qaba-e-gul diwanagan ka chaara farogh-e-bahaar hai hai shaKH-e-gul mein panja-e-KHuban bajae gul mizhgan talak rasai-e-laKHt-e-jigar kahan ai wae gar nigah na ho aashna-e-gul

instruction: you are an urdu/hindi shayar/kavi/poet and you have to complete the following shayari/kavita, respond only in romanized urdu/hindi, make sure you are creative and talk about something profound and beautiful
input: raha gar koi ta-qayamat salamat
output: rahƒÅ gar koƒ´ tƒÅ-qayƒÅmat salƒÅmat phir ik roz marnƒÅ hai hazrat-salƒÅmat jigar ko mire ishq-e-·∏≥h≈´√±-nƒÅba-mashrab likhe hai ·∏≥hudƒÅvand-e-nemat salƒÅmat alarraƒ°hm-e-dushamn shahƒ´d-e-vafƒÅ huu√± mubƒÅrak mubƒÅrak salƒÅmat salƒÅmat nahƒ´√± gar sar-o-barg-e-idrƒÅk-e-ma.anƒ´ tamƒÅshƒÅ-e-naira√±g-e-s≈´rat salƒÅmat do-ƒÅlam kƒ´ hastƒ´ pe ·∏≥hatt-e-fanƒÅ khƒ´√±ch dil-o-dast-e-arbƒÅb-e-himmat salƒÅmat Interestingnahƒ´√± gar ba-kƒÅm-e-dil-e-·∏≥hasta gard≈´√± jigar-·∏≥hƒÅƒ´-e-josh-e-hasrat salƒÅmat na auro√± kƒ´ suntƒÅ na kahtƒÅ huu√± apnƒ´ sar-e-·∏≥hasta dushvƒÅr-e-vahshat salƒÅmat vaf≈´r-e-balƒÅ hai huj≈´m-e-vafƒÅ hai salƒÅmat malƒÅmat malƒÅmat salƒÅmat na fikr-e-salƒÅmat na bƒ´m-e-malƒÅmat ze-·∏≥hud-raftagƒ´-hƒÅ-e-hairat salƒÅmat rahe 'ƒ°hƒÅlib'-e-·∏≥hasta maƒ°hl≈´b-e-gard≈´√± ye kyƒÅ be-niyƒÅzƒ´ hai hazrat-salƒÅmat raha gar koi ta-qayamat salamat phir ek roz marna hai hazrat-salamat jigar ko mere ishq-e-KHun-naba-mashrab likhe hai KHudawand-e-nemat salamat alarraghm-e-dushamn shahid-e-wafa hun mubarak mubarak salamat salamat nahin gar sar-o-barg-e-idrak-e-mani tamasha-e-nairang-e-surat salamat do-alam ki hasti pe KHatt-e-fana khinch dil-o-dast-e-arbab-e-himmat salamat Interestingnahin gar ba-kaam-e-dil-e-KHasta gardun jigar-KHai-e-josh-e-hasrat salamat na auron ki sunta na kahta hun apni sar-e-KHasta dushwar-e-wahshat salamat wafur-e-bala hai hujum-e-wafa hai salamat malamat malamat salamat na fikr-e-salamat na bim-e-malamat ze-KHud-raftagi-ha-e-hairat salamat rahe 'ghaalib'-e-KHasta maghlub-e-gardun ye kya be-niyazi hai hazrat-salamat

instruction: you are an urdu/hindi shayar/kavi/poet and you have to complete the following shayari/kavita, respond only in romanized urdu/hindi, make sure you are creative and talk about something profound and beautiful
input: mahram nahin hai tu hi nawa-ha-e-raaz ka
output: mahram nahƒ´√± hai t≈´ hƒ´ navƒÅ-hƒÅ-e-rƒÅz kƒÅ yaa√± varna jo hijƒÅb hai parda hai saaz kƒÅ ra√±g-e-shikasta sub.h-e-bahƒÅr-e-nazƒÅra hai ye vaqt hai shaguftan-e-gul-hƒÅ-e-nƒÅz kƒÅ t≈´ aur s≈´-e-ƒ°hair nazar-hƒÅ-e-tez tez mai√± aur dukh tirƒ´ mizha-hƒÅ-e-darƒÅz kƒÅ sarfa hai zabt-e-ƒÅh me√± merƒÅ vagarna me√± to.ama huu√± ek hƒ´ nafas-e-jƒÅ√±-gudƒÅz kƒÅ hai√± bas-ki josh-e-bƒÅda se shƒ´she uchhal rahe har gosha-e-bisƒÅt hai sar shƒ´sha-bƒÅz kƒÅ kƒÅvish kƒÅ dil kare hai taqƒÅzƒÅ ki hai hun≈´z nƒÅ·∏≥hun pe qarz is girah-e-nƒ´m-bƒÅz kƒÅ tƒÅrƒÅj-e-kƒÅvish-e-ƒ°ham-e-hijrƒÅ√± huƒÅ 'asad' siina ki thƒÅ dafƒ´na gohar-hƒÅ-e-rƒÅz kƒÅ mahram nahin hai tu hi nawa-ha-e-raaz ka yan warna jo hijab hai parda hai saz ka rang-e-shikasta subh-e-bahaar-e-nazara hai ye waqt hai shaguftan-e-gul-ha-e-naz ka tu aur su-e-ghair nazar-ha-e-tez tez main aur dukh teri mizha-ha-e-daraaz ka sarfa hai zabt-e-ah mein mera wagarna mein toama hun ek hi nafas-e-jaan-gudaz ka hain bas-ki josh-e-baada se shishe uchhal rahe har gosha-e-bisat hai sar shisha-baz ka kawish ka dil kare hai taqaza ki hai hunuz naKHun pe qarz is girah-e-nim-baz ka taraj-e-kawish-e-gham-e-hijran hua 'asad' sina ki tha dafina gohar-ha-e-raaz ka

instruction: you are an urdu/hindi shayar/kavi/poet and you have to complete the following shayari/kavita, respond only in romanized urdu/hindi, make sure you are creative and talk about something profound and beautiful
input: mana-e-dasht-nawardi koi tadbir nahin
output: mƒÅna-e-dasht-navardƒ´ koƒ´ tadbƒ´r nahƒ´√± ek chakkar hai mire paa√±v me√± zanjƒ´r nahƒ´√± shauq us dasht me√± dau·∏åƒÅye hai mujh ko ki jahƒÅ√± jaada ƒ°hair az nigah-e-dƒ´da-e-tasvƒ´r nahƒ´√± hasrat-e-lazzat-e-ƒÅzƒÅr rahƒ´ jaatƒ´ hai jƒÅda-e-rƒÅh-e-vafƒÅ juz dam-e-shamshƒ´r nahƒ´√± ra√±j-e-naumƒ´di-e-jƒÅved gavƒÅrƒÅ rahiyo ·∏≥hush huu√± gar nƒÅla-zab≈´nƒ´ kash-e-tƒÅsƒ´r nahƒ´√± sar khujƒÅtƒÅ hai jahƒÅ√± za·∏≥hm-e-sar achchhƒÅ ho jaa.e lazzat-e-sa√±g ba-andƒÅza-e-taqrƒ´r nahƒ´√± jab karam ru·∏≥hsat-e-bebƒÅkƒ´-o-gustƒÅ·∏≥hƒ´ de koƒ´ taqsƒ´r ba-juz ·∏≥hajlat-e-taqsƒ´r nahƒ´√± 'ƒ°hƒÅlib' apnƒÅ ye aqƒ´da hai ba-qaul-e-'nƒÅsi·∏≥h' aap be-bahra hai jo mo'taqid-e-'mƒ´r' nahƒ´√± Interesting'mƒ´r' ke sher kƒÅ ahvƒÅl kah≈´√± kyƒÅ 'ƒ°hƒÅlib' jis kƒÅ dƒ´vƒÅn kam-az-gulshan-e-kashmƒ´r nahƒ´√± ƒÅ.ƒ´na daam ko parde me√± chhupƒÅtƒÅ hai abas ki parƒ´-zƒÅd-e-nazar qƒÅbil-e-tas·∏≥hƒ´r nahƒ´√± misl-e-gul za·∏≥hm hai merƒÅ bhƒ´ sinƒÅ√± se tavvƒÅm terƒÅ tarkash hƒ´ kuchh ƒÅbistanƒ´-e-tƒ´r nahƒ´√± mana-e-dasht-nawardi koi tadbir nahin ek chakkar hai mere panw mein zanjir nahin shauq us dasht mein dauDaye hai mujh ko ki jahan jada ghair az nigah-e-dida-e-taswir nahin hasrat-e-lazzat-e-azar rahi jati hai jada-e-rah-e-wafa juz dam-e-shamshir nahin ranj-e-naumidi-e-jawed gawara rahiyo KHush hun gar nala-zabuni kash-e-tasir nahin sar khujata hai jahan zaKHm-e-sar achchha ho jae lazzat-e-sang ba-andaza-e-taqrir nahin jab karam ruKHsat-e-bebaki-o-gustaKHi de koi taqsir ba-juz KHajlat-e-taqsir nahin 'ghaalib' apna ye aqida hai ba-qaul-e-'nasiKH' aap be-bahra hai jo mo'taqid-e-'mir' nahin Interesting'mir' ke sher ka ahwal kahun kya 'ghaalib' jis ka diwan kam-az-gulshan-e-kashmir nahin aaina dam ko parde mein chhupata hai abas ki pari-zad-e-nazar qabil-e-tasKHir nahin misl-e-gul zaKHm hai mera bhi sinan se tawwam tera tarkash hi kuchh aabistani-e-tir nahin

instruction: you are an urdu/hindi shayar/kavi/poet and you have to complete the following shayari/kavita, respond only in romanized urdu/hindi, make sure you are creative and talk about something profound and beautiful
input: masjid ke zer-e-saya KHarabaat chahiye
output: masjid ke zer-e-sƒÅya ·∏≥harƒÅbƒÅt chƒÅhiye bhau√± paas aa√±kh qibla-e-hƒÅjƒÅt chƒÅhiye ƒÅshiq hue hai√± aap bhƒ´ ek aur sha·∏≥hs par ƒÅ·∏≥hir sitam kƒ´ kuchh to mukƒÅfƒÅt chƒÅhiye de daad ai falak dil-e-hasrat-parast kƒ´ haa√± kuchh na kuchh talƒÅfƒ´-e-mƒÅfƒÅt chƒÅhiye sƒ´khe hai√± mah-ru·∏≥ho√± ke liye ham musavvarƒ´ taqrƒ´b kuchh to bahr-e-mulƒÅqƒÅt chƒÅhiye mai se ƒ°haraz nashƒÅt hai kis r≈´-siyƒÅh ko ik-g≈´na be-·∏≥hudƒ´ mujhe din raat chƒÅhiye nashv-o-numƒÅ hai asl se 'ƒ°hƒÅlib' fur≈´a ko ·∏≥hƒÅmoshƒ´ hƒ´ se nikle hai jo baat chƒÅhiye hai ra√±g-e-lƒÅla-o-gul-o-nasrƒ´√± judƒÅ judƒÅ har ra√±g me√± bahƒÅr kƒÅ isbƒÅt chƒÅhiye sar pƒÅ-e-·∏≥hum pe chƒÅhiye ha√±gƒÅm-e-be-·∏≥hudƒ´ r≈´ s≈´-e-qibla vaqt-e-munƒÅjƒÅt chƒÅhiye ya.anƒ´ ba-hasb-e-gardish-e-paimƒÅna-e-sifƒÅt aarif hamesha mast-e-mai-e-zƒÅt chƒÅhiye masjid ke zer-e-saya KHarabaat chahiye bhaun pas aankh qibla-e-hajat chahiye aashiq hue hain aap bhi ek aur shaKHs par aaKHir sitam ki kuchh to mukafat chahiye de dad ai falak dil-e-hasrat-parast ki han kuchh na kuchh talafi-e-mafat chahiye sikhe hain mah-ruKHon ke liye hum musawwari taqrib kuchh to bahr-e-mulaqat chahiye mai se gharaz nashat hai kis ru-siyah ko ik-guna be-KHudi mujhe din raat chahiye nashw-o-numa hai asl se 'ghaalib' furua ko KHamoshi hi se nikle hai jo baat chahiye hai rang-e-lala-o-gul-o-nasrin juda juda har rang mein bahaar ka isbaat chahiye sar pa-e-KHum pe chahiye hangam-e-be-KHudi ru su-e-qibla waqt-e-munajat chahiye yani ba-hasb-e-gardish-e-paimana-e-sifat aarif hamesha mast-e-mai-e-zat chahiye

instruction: you are an urdu/hindi shayar/kavi/poet and you have to complete the following shayari/kavita, respond only in romanized urdu/hindi, make sure you are creative and talk about something profound and beautiful
input: dhamki mein mar gaya jo na bab-e-nabard tha
output: dhamkƒ´ me√± mar gayƒÅ jo na bƒÅb-e-nabard thƒÅ ishq-e-nabard-pesha talabgƒÅr-e-mard thƒÅ thƒÅ zindagƒ´ me√± marg kƒÅ khaTkƒÅ lagƒÅ huƒÅ u·∏åne se pesh-tar bhƒ´ mirƒÅ ra√±g zard thƒÅ tƒÅlƒ´f nus·∏≥ha-hƒÅ-e-vafƒÅ kar rahƒÅ thƒÅ mai√± majm≈´a-e-·∏≥hayƒÅl abhƒ´ fard fard thƒÅ dil tƒÅ jigar ki sƒÅhil-e-dariyƒÅ-e-·∏≥h≈´√± hai ab is rahguzar me√± jalva-e-gul aage gard thƒÅ jaatƒ´ hai koƒ´ kashmakash andoh-e-ishq kƒ´ dil bhƒ´ agar gayƒÅ to vahƒ´ dil kƒÅ dard thƒÅ ahbƒÅb chƒÅrasƒÅzi-e-vahshat na kar sake zindƒÅ√± me√± bhƒ´ ·∏≥hayƒÅl bayƒÅbƒÅ√±-navard thƒÅ ye lƒÅsh-e-be-kafan 'asad'-e-·∏≥hasta-jƒÅ√± kƒ´ hai haq maƒ°hfirat kare ajab ƒÅzƒÅd mard thƒÅ dhamki mein mar gaya jo na bab-e-nabard tha ishq-e-nabard-pesha talabgar-e-mard tha tha zindagi mein marg ka khaTka laga hua uDne se pesh-tar bhi mera rang zard tha talif nusKHa-ha-e-wafa kar raha tha main majmua-e-KHayal abhi fard fard tha dil ta jigar ki sahil-e-dariya-e-KHun hai ab is rahguzar mein jalwa-e-gul aage gard tha jati hai koi kashmakash andoh-e-ishq ki dil bhi agar gaya to wahi dil ka dard tha ahbab chaarasazi-e-wahshat na kar sake zindan mein bhi KHayal bayaban-naward tha ye lash-e-be-kafan 'asad'-e-KHasta-jaan ki hai haq maghfirat kare ajab aazad mard tha

instruction: you are an urdu/hindi shayar/kavi/poet and you have to complete the following shayari/kavita, respond only in romanized urdu/hindi, make sure you are creative and talk about something profound and beautiful
input: dekhna qismat ki aap apne pe rashk aa jae hai
output: dekhnƒÅ qismat ki aap apne pe rashk aa jaa.e hai mai√± use dekh≈´√± bhalƒÅ kab mujh se dekhƒÅ jaa.e hai haath dho dil se yahƒ´ garmƒ´ gar andeshe me√± hai ƒÅbgƒ´na tundi-e-sahbƒÅ se pighlƒÅ jaa.e hai ƒ°hair ko yƒÅ rab vo ky≈´√±kar mana-e-gustƒÅ·∏≥hƒ´ kare gar hayƒÅ bhƒ´ us ko aatƒ´ hai to sharmƒÅ jaa.e hai shauq ko ye lat ki har dam naala khƒ´√±che jƒÅ.iye dil kƒ´ vo hƒÅlat ki dam lene se ghabrƒÅ jaa.e hai duur chashm-e-bad tirƒ´ bazm-e-tarab se vaah vaah naƒ°hma ho jaatƒÅ hai vaa√± gar naala merƒÅ jaa.e hai garche hai tarz-e-taƒ°hƒÅful parda-dƒÅr-e-rƒÅz-e-ishq par ham aise kho.e jaate hai√± ki vo pƒÅ jaa.e hai us kƒ´ bazm-ƒÅrƒÅ.iyƒÅ√± sun kar dil-e-ranj≈´r yaa√± misl-e-naqsh-e-mudda.ƒÅ-e-ƒ°hair baiThƒÅ jaa.e hai ho ke ƒÅshiq vo parƒ´-ru·∏≥h aur nƒÅzuk ban gayƒÅ ra√±g khultƒÅ jaa.e hai jitnƒÅ ki u·∏åtƒÅ jaa.e hai naqsh ko us ke musavvir par bhƒ´ kyƒÅ kyƒÅ naaz hai√± khƒ´√±chtƒÅ hai jis qadar utnƒÅ hƒ´ khi√±chtƒÅ jaa.e hai saaya merƒÅ mujh se misl-e-d≈´d bhƒÅge hai 'asad' paas mujh ƒÅtish-ba-jƒÅ√± ke kis se ThahrƒÅ jaa.e hai dekhna qismat ki aap apne pe rashk aa jae hai main use dekhun bhala kab mujh se dekha jae hai hath dho dil se yahi garmi gar andeshe mein hai aabgina tundi-e-sahba se pighla jae hai ghair ko ya rab wo kyunkar mana-e-gustaKHi kare gar haya bhi us ko aati hai to sharma jae hai shauq ko ye lat ki har dam nala khinche jaiye dil ki wo haalat ki dam lene se ghabra jae hai dur chashm-e-bad teri bazm-e-tarab se wah wah naghma ho jata hai wan gar nala mera jae hai garche hai tarz-e-taghaful parda-dar-e-raaz-e-ishq par hum aise khoe jate hain ki wo pa jae hai us ki bazm-araiyan sun kar dil-e-ranjur yan misl-e-naqsh-e-muddaa-e-ghair baiTha jae hai ho ke aashiq wo pari-ruKH aur nazuk ban gaya rang khulta jae hai jitna ki uDta jae hai naqsh ko us ke musawwir par bhi kya kya naz hain khinchta hai jis qadar utna hi khinchta jae hai saya mera mujh se misl-e-dud bhage hai 'asad' pas mujh aatish-ba-jaan ke kis se Thahra jae hai

instruction: you are an urdu/hindi shayar/kavi/poet and you have to complete the following shayari/kavita, respond only in romanized urdu/hindi, make sure you are creative and talk about something profound and beautiful
input: ishrat-e-qatra hai dariya mein fana ho jaana
output: ishrat-e-qatra hai dariyƒÅ me√± fanƒÅ ho jaanƒÅ dard kƒÅ had se guzarnƒÅ hai davƒÅ ho jaanƒÅ tujh se qismat me√± mirƒ´ s≈´rat-e-qufl-e-abjad thƒÅ likhƒÅ baat ke bante hƒ´ judƒÅ ho jaanƒÅ dil huƒÅ kasmakash-e-chƒÅra-e-zehmat me√± tamƒÅm miT gayƒÅ ghisne me√± is uqde kƒÅ vƒÅ ho jaanƒÅ ab jafƒÅ se bhƒ´ hai√± mahr≈´m ham allƒÅh allƒÅh is qadar dushman-e-arbƒÅb-e-vafƒÅ ho jaanƒÅ zo.af se girya mubaddal ba-dam-e-sard huƒÅ bƒÅvar aayƒÅ hame√± paanƒ´ kƒÅ havƒÅ ho jaanƒÅ dil se miTnƒÅ tirƒ´ a√±gusht-e-hinƒÅ.ƒ´ kƒÅ ·∏≥hayƒÅl ho gayƒÅ gosht se nƒÅ·∏≥hun kƒÅ judƒÅ ho jaanƒÅ hai mujhe abr-e-bahƒÅrƒ´ kƒÅ baras kar khulnƒÅ rote rote ƒ°ham-e-furqat me√± fanƒÅ ho jaanƒÅ gar nahƒ´√± nik.hat-e-gul ko tire k≈´che kƒ´ havas kyuu√± hai gard-e-rah-e-jaulƒÅn-e-sabƒÅ ho jaanƒÅ ba·∏≥hshe hai jalva-e-gul zauq-e-tamƒÅshƒÅ 'ƒ°hƒÅlib' chashm ko chƒÅhiye har ra√±g me√± vƒÅ ho jaanƒÅ tƒÅ ki tujh par khule ejƒÅz-e-havƒÅ-e-saiqal dekh barsƒÅt me√± sabz aa.ine kƒÅ ho jaanƒÅ ishrat-e-qatra hai dariya mein fana ho jaana dard ka had se guzarna hai dawa ho jaana tujh se qismat mein meri surat-e-qufl-e-abjad tha likha baat ke bante hi juda ho jaana dil hua kasmakash-e-chaara-e-zehmat mein tamam miT gaya ghisne mein is uqde ka wa ho jaana ab jafa se bhi hain mahrum hum allah allah is qadar dushman-e-arbab-e-wafa ho jaana zoaf se girya mubaddal ba-dam-e-sard hua bawar aaya hamein pani ka hawa ho jaana dil se miTna teri angusht-e-hinai ka KHayal ho gaya gosht se naKHun ka juda ho jaana hai mujhe abr-e-bahaari ka baras kar khulna rote rote gham-e-furqat mein fana ho jaana gar nahin nikhat-e-gul ko tere kuche ki hawas kyun hai gard-e-rah-e-jaulan-e-saba ho jaana baKHshe hai jalwa-e-gul zauq-e-tamasha 'ghaalib' chashm ko chahiye har rang mein wa ho jaana ta ki tujh par khule ejaz-e-hawa-e-saiqal dekh barsat mein sabz aaine ka ho jaana

output: dekh kar dar-parda garm-e-dƒÅman-afshƒÅnƒ´ mujhe kar ga.ƒ´ vƒÅbasta-e-tan merƒ´ uryƒÅnƒ´ mujhe ban gayƒÅ teƒ°h-e-nigƒÅh-e-yƒÅr kƒÅ sa√±g-e-fasƒÅ√± marhabƒÅ mai√± kyƒÅ mubƒÅrak hai girƒÅ√±-jƒÅnƒ´ mujhe kyuu√± na ho be-iltifƒÅtƒ´ us kƒ´ ·∏≥hƒÅtir jam.a hai jƒÅntƒÅ hai mahv-e-pursish-hƒÅ-e-pinhƒÅnƒ´ mujhe mere ƒ°ham-·∏≥hƒÅne kƒ´ qismat jab raqam hone lagƒ´ likh diyƒÅ min-jumla-e-asbƒÅb-e-vƒ´rƒÅnƒ´ mujhe bad-gumƒÅ√± hotƒÅ hai vo kƒÅfir na hotƒÅ kaash ke is qadar zauq-e-navƒÅ-e-murƒ°h-e-bustƒÅnƒ´ mujhe vaa.e vaa√± bhƒ´ shor-e-mahshar ne na dam lene diyƒÅ le gayƒÅ thƒÅ gor me√± zauq-e-tan-ƒÅsƒÅnƒ´ mujhe va.ada aane kƒÅ vafƒÅ kiije ye kyƒÅ andƒÅz hai tum ne kyuu√± sau√±pƒ´ hai mere ghar kƒ´ darbƒÅnƒ´ mujhe haa√± nashƒÅt-e-ƒÅmad-e-fasl-e-bahƒÅrƒ´ vaah vaah phir huƒÅ hai taaza saudƒÅ-e-ƒ°hazal-·∏≥hvƒÅnƒ´ mujhe dƒ´ mire bhaa.ƒ´ ko haq ne az-sar-e-nau zindagƒ´ mƒ´rzƒÅ y≈´suf hai 'ƒ°hƒÅlib' y≈´suf-e-sƒÅnƒ´ mujhe dekh kar dar-parda garm-e-daman-afshani mujhe kar gai wabasta-e-tan meri uryani mujhe ban gaya tegh-e-nigah-e-yar ka sang-e-fasan marhaba main kya mubarak hai giran-jaani mujhe kyun na ho be-iltifati us ki KHatir jama hai jaanta hai mahw-e-pursish-ha-e-pinhani mujhe mere gham-KHane ki qismat jab raqam hone lagi likh diya min-jumla-e-asbab-e-virani mujhe bad-guman hota hai wo kafir na hota kash ke is qadar zauq-e-nawa-e-murgh-e-bustani mujhe wae wan bhi shor-e-mahshar ne na dam lene diya le gaya tha gor mein zauq-e-tan-asani mujhe wada aane ka wafa kije ye kya andaz hai tum ne kyun saunpi hai mere ghar ki darbani mujhe han nashat-e-amad-e-fasl-e-bahaari wah wah phir hua hai taza sauda-e-ghazal-KHwani mujhe di mere bhai ko haq ne az-sar-e-nau zindagi mirza yusuf hai 'ghaalib' yusuf-e-sani mujhe

input: maze jahan ke apni nazar mein KHak nahin
output: maze jahƒÅn ke apnƒ´ nazar me√± ·∏≥haak nahƒ´√± sivƒÅ.e ·∏≥h≈´n-e-jigar so jigar me√± ·∏≥haak nahƒ´√± magar ƒ°hubƒÅr hue par havƒÅ u·∏åƒÅ le jaa.e vagarna taab o tavƒÅ√± bƒÅl-o-par me√± ·∏≥haak nahƒ´√± ye kis bahƒ´sht-shamƒÅ.il kƒ´ aamad aamad hai ki ƒ°hair-e-jalva-e-gul rahguzar me√± ·∏≥haak nahƒ´√± bhalƒÅ use na sahƒ´ kuchh mujhƒ´ ko rahm aatƒÅ asar mire nafas-e-be-asar me√± ·∏≥haak nahƒ´√± ·∏≥hayƒÅl-e-jalva-e-gul se ·∏≥harƒÅb hai√± mai-kash sharƒÅb-·∏≥hƒÅne ke dƒ´vƒÅr-o-dar me√± ·∏≥haak nahƒ´√± huƒÅ huu√± ishq kƒ´ ƒ°hƒÅrat-garƒ´ se sharminda sivƒÅ.e hasrat-e-tƒÅmƒ´r ghar me√± ·∏≥haak nahƒ´√± hamƒÅre sher hai√± ab sirf dil-lagƒ´ ke 'asad' khulƒÅ ki fƒÅ.eda arz-e-hunar me√± ·∏≥haak nahƒ´√± maze jahan ke apni nazar mein KHak nahin siwae KHun-e-jigar so jigar mein KHak nahin magar ghubar hue par hawa uDa le jae wagarna tab o tawan baal-o-par mein KHak nahin ye kis bahisht-shamail ki aamad aamad hai ki ghair-e-jalwa-e-gul rahguzar mein KHak nahin bhala use na sahi kuchh mujhi ko rahm aata asar mere nafas-e-be-asar mein KHak nahin KHayal-e-jalwa-e-gul se KHarab hain mai-kash sharab-KHane ke diwar-o-dar mein KHak nahin hua hun ishq ki ghaarat-gari se sharminda siwae hasrat-e-tamir ghar mein KHak nahin hamare sher hain ab sirf dil-lagi ke 'asad' khula ki faeda arz-e-hunar mein KHak nahin

instruction: you are an urdu/hindi shayar/kavi/poet and you have to complete the following shayari/kavita, respond only in romanized urdu/hindi, make sure you are creative and talk about something profound and beautiful
input: ishq tasir se naumed nahin

instruction: you are an urdu/hindi shayar/kavi/poet and you have to complete the following shayari/kavita, respond only in romanized urdu/hindi, make sure you are creative and talk about something profound and beautiful
input: ajab nashat se jallad ke chale hain hum aage
output: ajab nashƒÅt se jallƒÅd ke chale hai√± ham aage ki apne saa.e se sar paa√±v se hai do qadam aage qazƒÅ ne thƒÅ mujhe chƒÅhƒÅ ·∏≥harƒÅb-e-bƒÅda-e-ulfat faqat ·∏≥harƒÅb likhƒÅ bas na chal sakƒÅ qalam aage ƒ°ham-e-zamƒÅna ne jhƒÅ·∏åƒ´ nashƒÅt-e-ishq kƒ´ mastƒ´ vagarna ham bhƒ´ uThƒÅte the lazzat-e-alam aage ·∏≥hudƒÅ ke vƒÅste daad us jun≈´n-e-shauq kƒ´ denƒÅ ki us ke dar pe pahu√±chte hai√± nƒÅma-bar se ham aage ye umr bhar jo pareshƒÅniyƒÅ√± uThƒÅ.ƒ´ hai√± ham ne tumhƒÅre aa.iyo ai turrah-hƒÅ-e-·∏≥ham-ba-·∏≥ham aage dil o jigar me√± pur-afshƒÅ√± jo ek mauja-e-·∏≥h≈´√± hai ham apne zom me√± samjhe hue the us ko dam aage qasam janƒÅze pe aane kƒ´ mere khƒÅte hai√± 'ƒ°hƒÅlib' hamesha khƒÅte the jo merƒ´ jaan kƒ´ qasam aage ajab nashat se jallad ke chale hain hum aage ki apne sae se sar panw se hai do qadam aage qaza ne tha mujhe chaha KHarab-e-baada-e-ulfat faqat KHarab likha bas na chal saka qalam aage gham-e-zamana ne jhaDi nashat-e-ishq ki masti wagarna hum bhi uThate the lazzat-e-alam aage KHuda ke waste dad us junun-e-shauq ki dena ki us ke dar pe pahunchte hain nama-bar se hum aage ye umr bhar jo pareshaniyan uThai hain hum ne tumhaare aaiyo ai turrah-ha-e-KHam-ba-KHam aage dil o jigar mein pur-afshan jo ek mauja-e-KHun hai hum apne zom mein samjhe hue the us ko dam aage qasam janaze pe aane ki mere khate hain 'ghaalib' hamesha khate the jo meri jaan ki qasam aage

output: dƒ´vƒÅngƒ´ se dosh pe zunnƒÅr bhƒ´ nahƒ´√± ya.anƒ´ hamƒÅre jeb me√± ik taar bhƒ´ nahƒ´√± dil ko niyƒÅz-e-hasrat-e-dƒ´dƒÅr kar chuke dekhƒÅ to ham me√± tƒÅqat-e-dƒ´dƒÅr bhƒ´ nahƒ´√± milnƒÅ tirƒÅ agar nahƒ´√± ƒÅsƒÅ√± to sahl hai dushvƒÅr to yahƒ´ hai ki dushvƒÅr bhƒ´ nahƒ´√± be-ishq umr kaT nahƒ´√± saktƒ´ hai aur yaa√± tƒÅqat ba-qadr-e-lazzat-e-ƒÅzƒÅr bhƒ´ nahƒ´√± shorƒ´dgƒ´ ke haath se hai sar vabƒÅl-e-dosh sahrƒÅ me√± ai ·∏≥hudƒÅ koƒ´ dƒ´vƒÅr bhƒ´ nahƒ´√± gunjƒÅ.ish-e-adƒÅvat-e-aƒ°hyƒÅr yak taraf yaa√± dil me√± zo.af se havas-e-yƒÅr bhƒ´ nahƒ´√± Dar nƒÅla-hƒÅ-e-zƒÅr se mere ·∏≥hudƒÅ ko maan ƒÅ·∏≥hir navƒÅ-e-murƒ°h-e-giraftƒÅr bhƒ´ nahƒ´√± dil me√± hai yaar kƒ´ saf-e-mizhgƒÅ√± se r≈´-kashƒ´ hƒÅlƒÅ√±ki tƒÅqat-e-·∏≥halish-e-·∏≥hƒÅr bhƒ´ nahƒ´√± is sƒÅdgƒ´ pe kaun na mar jaa.e ai ·∏≥hudƒÅ la·∏åte hai√± aur haath me√± talvƒÅr bhƒ´ nahƒ´√± dekhƒÅ 'asad' ko ·∏≥halvat-o-jalvat me√± bƒÅr-hƒÅ dƒ´vƒÅna gar nahƒ´√± hai to hushyƒÅr bhƒ´ nahƒ´√± diwangi se dosh pe zunnar bhi nahin yani hamare jeb mein ek tar bhi nahin dil ko niyaz-e-hasrat-e-didar kar chuke dekha to hum mein taqat-e-didar bhi nahin milna tera agar nahin aasan to sahl hai dushwar to yahi hai ki dushwar bhi nahin be-ishq umr kaT nahin sakti hai aur yan taqat ba-qadr-e-lazzat-e-azar bhi nahin shoridgi ke hath se hai sar wabaal-e-dosh sahra mein ai KHuda koi diwar bhi nahin gunjaish-e-adawat-e-aghyar yak taraf yan dil mein zoaf se hawas-e-yar bhi nahin Dar nala-ha-e-zar se mere KHuda ko man aaKHir nawa-e-murgh-e-giraftar bhi nahin dil mein hai yar ki saf-e-mizhgan se ru-kashi haalanki taqat-e-KHalish-e-KHar bhi nahin is sadgi pe kaun na mar jae ai KHuda laDte hain aur hath mein talwar bhi nahin dekha 'asad' ko KHalwat-o-jalwat mein bar-ha diwana gar nahin hai to hushyar bhi nahin

output: naala juz husn-e-talab ai sitam-ƒ´jƒÅd nahƒ´√± hai taqƒÅzƒÅ-e-jafƒÅ shikva-e-bedƒÅd nahƒ´√± ishq-o-mazd≈´ri-e-ishrat-gah-e-·∏≥husruv kyƒÅ ·∏≥huub ham ko taslƒ´m niko-nƒÅmi-e-farhƒÅd nahƒ´√± kam nahƒ´√± vo bhƒ´ ·∏≥harƒÅbƒ´ me√± pa vus.at mƒÅl≈´m dasht me√± hai mujhe vo aish ki ghar yaad nahƒ´√± ahl-e-bƒ´nash ko hai t≈´fƒÅn-e-havƒÅdis maktab lutma-e-mauj kam-az saili-e-ustƒÅd nahƒ´√± vaa.e mahr≈´mi-e-taslƒ´m-o-badƒÅ hƒÅl-e-vafƒÅ jƒÅntƒÅ hai ki hame√± tƒÅqat-e-faryƒÅd nahƒ´√± ra√±g-e-tamkƒ´n-e-gul-o-lƒÅlƒÅ pareshƒÅ√± kyuu√± hai gar charƒÅƒ°hƒÅn-e-sar-e-rah-guzar-e-bƒÅd nahƒ´√± sabad-e-gul ke tale band kare hai gulchƒ´√± muzhda ai murƒ°h ki gulzƒÅr me√± sayyƒÅd nahƒ´√± nafi se kartƒ´ hai isbƒÅt tarƒÅvish goyƒÅ dƒ´ hai jƒÅ-e-dahn us ko dam-e-ƒ´jƒÅd nahƒ´√± kam nahƒ´√± jalvagarƒ´ me√± tire k≈´che se bahisht yahƒ´ naqsha hai vale is qadar ƒÅbƒÅd nahƒ´√± karte kis mu√±h se ho ƒ°hurbat kƒ´ shikƒÅyat 'ƒ°hƒÅlib' tum ko be-mehri-e-yƒÅrƒÅn-e-vatan yaad nahƒ´√± nala juz husn-e-talab ai sitam-ijad nahin hai taqaza-e-jafa shikwa-e-bedad nahin ishq-o-mazduri-e-ishrat-gah-e-KHusruw kya KHub hum ko taslim niko-nami-e-farhad nahin kam nahin wo bhi KHarabi mein pa wusat malum dasht mein hai mujhe wo aish ki ghar yaad nahin ahl-e-binash ko hai tufan-e-hawadis maktab lutma-e-mauj kam-az saili-e-ustad nahin wae mahrumi-e-taslim-o-bada haal-e-wafa jaanta hai ki hamein taqat-e-faryaad nahin rang-e-tamkin-e-gul-o-lala pareshan kyun hai gar charaghan-e-sar-e-rah-guzar-e-baad nahin sabad-e-gul ke tale band kare hai gulchin muzhda ai murgh ki gulzar mein sayyaad nahin nafi se karti hai isbaat tarawish goya di hai ja-e-dahn us ko dam-e-ijad nahin kam nahin jalwagari mein tere kuche se bahisht yahi naqsha hai wale is qadar aabaad nahin karte kis munh se ho ghurbat ki shikayat 'ghaalib' tum ko be-mehri-e-yaran-e-watan yaad nahin

output: zikr merƒÅ ba-badƒ´ bhƒ´ use manz≈´r nahƒ´√± ƒ°hair kƒ´ baat biga·∏å jaa.e to kuchh duur nahƒ´√± vada-e-sair-e-gulistƒÅ√± hai ·∏≥hushƒÅ tƒÅle-e-shauq muzhda-e-qatl muqaddar hai jo mazk≈´r nahƒ´√± shƒÅhid-e-hastƒ´-e-mutlaq kƒ´ kamar hai aalam log kahte hai√± ki hai par hame√± manz≈´r nahƒ´√± qatra apnƒÅ bhƒ´ haqƒ´qat me√± hai dariyƒÅ lekin ham ko taqlƒ´d-e-tunuk-zarfi-e-mans≈´r nahƒ´√± hasrat ai zauq-e-·∏≥harƒÅbƒ´ ki vo tƒÅqat na rahƒ´ ishq-e-pur-arbada kƒ´ guu√± tan-e-ranj≈´r nahƒ´√± mai√± jo kahtƒÅ huu√± ki ham le√±ge qayƒÅmat me√± tumhe√± kis ra.≈´nat se vo kahte hai√± ki ham huur nahƒ´√± zulm kar zulm agar lutf dareƒ°h aatƒÅ ho t≈´ taƒ°hƒÅful me√± kisƒ´ ra√±g se ma.az≈´r nahƒ´√± saaf durdi-kash-e-paimƒÅna-e-jam hai√± ham log vaa.e vo baada ki afsharda-e-a√±g≈´r nahƒ´√± huu√± zuh≈´rƒ´ ke muqƒÅbil me√± ·∏≥hifƒÅ.ƒ´ 'ƒ°hƒÅlib' mere da.ave pe ye hujjat hai ki mash.h≈´r nahƒ´√± zikr mera ba-badi bhi use manzur nahin ghair ki baat bigaD jae to kuchh dur nahin wada-e-sair-e-gulistan hai KHusha tale-e-shauq muzhda-e-qatl muqaddar hai jo mazkur nahin shahid-e-hasti-e-mutlaq ki kamar hai aalam log kahte hain ki hai par hamein manzur nahin qatra apna bhi haqiqat mein hai dariya lekin hum ko taqlid-e-tunuk-zarfi-e-mansur nahin hasrat ai zauq-e-KHarabi ki wo taqat na rahi ishq-e-pur-arbada ki gun tan-e-ranjur nahin main jo kahta hun ki hum lenge qayamat mein tumhein kis raunat se wo kahte hain ki hum hur nahin zulm kar zulm agar lutf daregh aata ho tu taghaful mein kisi rang se mazur nahin saf durdi-kash-e-paimana-e-jam hain hum log wae wo baada ki afsharda-e-angur nahin hun zuhuri ke muqabil mein KHifai 'ghaalib' mere dawe pe ye hujjat hai ki mashhur nahin

instruction: you are an urdu/hindi shayar/kavi/poet and you have to complete the following shayari/kavita, respond only in romanized urdu/hindi, make sure you are creative and talk about something profound and beautiful
input: wan pahunch kar jo ghash aata pae-ham hai hum ko
output: vaa√± pahu√±ch kar jo ƒ°hash aatƒÅ pa.e-ham hai ham ko sad-rah ƒÅha√±g-e-zamƒ´√± bos-e-qadam hai ham ko dil ko mai√± aur mujhe dil mahv-e-vafƒÅ rakhtƒÅ hai kis qadar zauq-e-giriftƒÅri-e-ham hai ham ko zof se naqsh-e-pa-e-mor hai tauq-e-gardan tire k≈´che se kahƒÅ√± tƒÅqat-e-ram hai ham ko jaan kar kiije taƒ°hƒÅful ki kuchh ummƒ´d bhƒ´ ho ye nigƒÅh-e-ƒ°halat-andƒÅz to sam hai ham ko rashk-e-ham-tarhi o dard-e-asar-e-bƒÅ√±g-e-hazƒ´√± nƒÅla-e-murƒ°h-e-sahar teƒ°h-e-do-dam hai ham ko sar u·∏åƒÅne ke jo vaade ko mukarrar chƒÅhƒÅ ha√±s ke bole ki tire sar kƒ´ qasam hai ham ko dil ke ·∏≥huu√± karne kƒ´ kyƒÅ vaj.h va-lekin nƒÅ-chƒÅr pƒÅs-e-be-raunaqi-e-dƒ´da aham hai ham ko tum vo nƒÅzuk ki ·∏≥hamoshƒ´ ko fuƒ°hƒÅ√± kahte ho ham vo aajiz ki taƒ°hƒÅful bhƒ´ sitam hai ham ko lucknow aane kƒÅ baa.is nahƒ´√± khultƒÅ yaanƒ´ havas-e-sair-o-tamƒÅshƒÅ so vo kam hai ham ko maqta-e-silsila-e-shauq nahƒ´√± hai ye shahr azm-e-sair-e-najaf-o-tauf-e-haram hai ham ko liye jaatƒ´ hai kahƒ´√± ek tavaqqo 'ƒ°hƒÅlib' jƒÅda-e-rah kashish-e-kƒÅf-e-karam hai ham ko abr rotƒÅ hai ki bazm-e-tarab ƒÅmƒÅda karo barq ha√±stƒ´ hai ki fursat koƒ´ dam hai ham ko wan pahunch kar jo ghash aata pae-ham hai hum ko sad-rah aahang-e-zamin bos-e-qadam hai hum ko dil ko main aur mujhe dil mahw-e-wafa rakhta hai kis qadar zauq-e-giriftari-e-ham hai hum ko zof se naqsh-e-pa-e-mor hai tauq-e-gardan tere kuche se kahan taqat-e-ram hai hum ko jaan kar kije taghaful ki kuchh ummid bhi ho ye nigah-e-ghalat-andaz to sam hai hum ko rashk-e-ham-tarhi o dard-e-asar-e-bang-e-hazin nala-e-murgh-e-sahar tegh-e-do-dam hai hum ko sar uDane ke jo wade ko mukarrar chaha hans ke bole ki tere sar ki qasam hai hum ko dil ke KHun karne ki kya wajh wa-lekin na-chaar pas-e-be-raunaqi-e-dida aham hai hum ko tum wo nazuk ki KHamoshi ko fughan kahte ho hum wo aajiz ki taghaful bhi sitam hai hum ko lucknow aane ka bais nahin khulta yani hawas-e-sair-o-tamasha so wo kam hai hum ko maqta-e-silsila-e-shauq nahin hai ye shahr azm-e-sair-e-najaf-o-tauf-e-haram hai hum ko liye jati hai kahin ek tawaqqo 'ghaalib' jada-e-rah kashish-e-kaf-e-karam hai hum ko abr rota hai ki bazm-e-tarab aamada karo barq hansti hai ki fursat koi dam hai hum ko

output: satƒÅ.ish-gar hai zƒÅhid is qadar jis bƒÅƒ°h-e-rizvƒÅ√± kƒÅ vo ik guldasta hai ham be-·∏≥hudo√± ke tƒÅq-e-nisyƒÅ√± kƒÅ bayƒÅ√± kyƒÅ kƒ´jiye be-dƒÅd-e-kƒÅvish-hƒÅ-e-mizhgƒÅ√± kƒÅ ki har yak qatra-e-·∏≥h≈´√± daana hai tasbƒ´h-e-marjƒÅ√± kƒÅ na aa.ƒ´ satvat-e-qƒÅtil bhƒ´ maane mere nƒÅlo√± ko liyƒÅ dƒÅ√±to√± me√± jo tinkƒÅ huƒÅ resha niyastƒÅ√± kƒÅ dikhƒÅ.≈´√±gƒÅ tamƒÅshƒÅ dƒ´ agar fursat zamƒÅne ne mirƒÅ har dƒÅƒ°h-e-dil ik tu·∏≥hm hai sarv-e-charƒÅƒ°hƒÅ√± kƒÅ kiyƒÅ ƒÅ.ƒ´na-·∏≥hƒÅne kƒÅ vo naqsha tere jalve ne kare jo partav-e-·∏≥hurshƒ´d aalam shabnamistƒÅ√± kƒÅ mirƒ´ ta.amƒ´r me√± muzmar hai ik s≈´rat ·∏≥harƒÅbƒ´ kƒ´ hay≈´lƒÅ barq-e-·∏≥hirman kƒÅ hai ·∏≥h≈´n-e-garm dahqƒÅ√± kƒÅ ugƒÅ hai ghar me√± har s≈´ sabza vƒ´rƒÅnƒ´ tamƒÅshƒÅ kar madƒÅr ab khodne par ghaas ke hai mere darbƒÅ√± kƒÅ ·∏≥hamoshƒ´ me√± nihƒÅ√± ·∏≥h≈´√±-gashta lƒÅkho√± ƒÅrz≈´e√± hai√± charƒÅƒ°h-e-murdƒÅ huu√± mai√± be-zabƒÅ√± gor-e-ƒ°harƒ´bƒÅ√± kƒÅ han≈´z ik partav-e-naqsh-e-·∏≥hayƒÅl-e-yƒÅr baaqƒ´ hai dil-e-afsurda goyƒÅ hujra hai y≈´suf ke zindƒÅ√± kƒÅ baƒ°hal me√± ƒ°hair kƒ´ aaj aap sote hai√± kahƒ´√± varna sabab kyƒÅ ·∏≥hvƒÅb me√± aa kar tabassum-hƒÅ-e-pinhƒÅ√± kƒÅ nahƒ´√± ma.al≈´m kis kis kƒÅ lah≈´ paanƒ´ huƒÅ hogƒÅ qayƒÅmat hai sarishk-ƒÅl≈´da honƒÅ terƒ´ mizhgƒÅ√± kƒÅ nazar me√± hai hamƒÅrƒ´ jƒÅda-e-rƒÅh-e-fanƒÅ 'ƒ°hƒÅlib' ki ye shƒ´rƒÅza hai aalam ke ajzƒÅ-e-pareshƒÅ√± kƒÅ sataish-gar hai zahid is qadar jis bagh-e-rizwan ka wo ek guldasta hai hum be-KHudon ke taq-e-nisyan ka bayan kya kijiye be-dad-e-kawish-ha-e-mizhgan ka ki har yak qatra-e-KHun dana hai tasbih-e-marjaan ka na aai satwat-e-qatil bhi mane mere nalon ko liya danton mein jo tinka hua resha niyastan ka dikhaunga tamasha di agar fursat zamane ne mera har dagh-e-dil ek tuKHm hai sarw-e-charaghan ka kiya aaina-KHane ka wo naqsha tere jalwe ne kare jo partaw-e-KHurshid aalam shabnamistan ka meri tamir mein muzmar hai ek surat KHarabi ki hayula barq-e-KHirman ka hai KHun-e-garm dahqan ka uga hai ghar mein har su sabza virani tamasha kar madar ab khodne par ghas ke hai mere darban ka KHamoshi mein nihan KHun-gashta lakhon aarzuen hain charagh-e-murda hun main be-zaban gor-e-ghariban ka hanuz ek partaw-e-naqsh-e-KHayal-e-yar baqi hai dil-e-afsurda goya hujra hai yusuf ke zindan ka baghal mein ghair ki aaj aap sote hain kahin warna sabab kya KHwab mein aa kar tabassum-ha-e-pinhan ka nahin malum kis kis ka lahu pani hua hoga qayamat hai sarishk-aluda hona teri mizhgan ka nazar mein hai hamari jada-e-rah-e-fana 'ghaalib' ki ye shiraaza hai aalam ke ajza-e-pareshan ka

input: hawas ko hai nashat-e-kar kya kya
output: havas ko hai nashƒÅt-e-kƒÅr kyƒÅ kyƒÅ na ho marnƒÅ to jiine kƒÅ mazƒÅ kyƒÅ tajƒÅhul-peshgƒ´ se mudda.ƒÅ kyƒÅ kahƒÅ√± tak ai sarƒÅpƒÅ naaz kyƒÅ kyƒÅ navƒÅzish-hƒÅ-e-bejƒÅ dekhtƒÅ huu√± shikƒÅyat-hƒÅ-e-ra√±gƒ´√± kƒÅ gila kyƒÅ nigƒÅh-e-be-mahƒÅbƒÅ chƒÅhtƒÅ huu√± taƒ°hƒÅful-hƒÅ-e-tamkƒ´√±-ƒÅzmƒÅ kyƒÅ faroƒ°h-e-shola-e-·∏≥has yak-nafas hai havas ko pƒÅs-e-nƒÅm≈´s-e-vafƒÅ kyƒÅ nafas mauj-e-muhƒ´t-e-be-·∏≥hudƒ´ hai taƒ°hƒÅful-hƒÅ-e-sƒÅqƒ´ kƒÅ gila kyƒÅ dimƒÅƒ°h-e-itr-e-pairƒÅhan nahƒ´√± hai ƒ°ham-e-ƒÅvƒÅrgƒ´-hƒÅ-e-sabƒÅ kyƒÅ dil-e-har-qatra hai sƒÅz-e-anal-bahar ham us ke hai√± hamƒÅrƒÅ p≈´chhnƒÅ kyƒÅ muhƒÅbƒÅ kyƒÅ hai mai√± zƒÅmin idhar dekh shahƒ´dƒÅn-e-nigah kƒÅ ·∏≥h≈´√±-bahƒÅ kyƒÅ sun ai ƒ°hƒÅrat-gar-e-jins-e-vafƒÅ sun shikast-e-shƒ´sha-e-dil kƒ´ sadƒÅ kyƒÅ kiyƒÅ kis ne jigar-dƒÅrƒ´ kƒÅ da.avƒÅ shakeb-e-·∏≥hatir-e-ƒÅshiq bhalƒÅ kyƒÅ ye qƒÅtil vƒÅda-e-sabr-ƒÅzmƒÅ kyuu√± ye kƒÅfir fitna-e-tƒÅqat-rubƒÅ kyƒÅ balƒÅ-e-jƒÅ√± hai 'ƒ°hƒÅlib' us kƒ´ har baat ibƒÅrat kyƒÅ ishƒÅrat kyƒÅ adƒÅ kyƒÅ hawas ko hai nashat-e-kar kya kya na ho marna to jine ka maza kya tajahul-peshgi se muddaa kya kahan tak ai sarapa naz kya kya nawazish-ha-e-beja dekhta hun shikayat-ha-e-rangin ka gila kya nigah-e-be-mahaba chahta hun taghaful-ha-e-tamkin-azma kya farogh-e-shola-e-KHas yak-nafas hai hawas ko pas-e-namus-e-wafa kya nafas mauj-e-muhit-e-be-KHudi hai taghaful-ha-e-saqi ka gila kya dimagh-e-itr-e-pairahan nahin hai gham-e-awargi-ha-e-saba kya dil-e-har-qatra hai saz-e-anal-bahar hum us ke hain hamara puchhna kya muhaba kya hai main zamin idhar dekh shahidan-e-nigah ka KHun-baha kya sun ai ghaarat-gar-e-jins-e-wafa sun shikast-e-shisha-e-dil ki sada kya kiya kis ne jigar-dari ka dawa shakeb-e-KHatir-e-ashiq bhala kya ye qatil wada-e-sabr-azma kyun ye kafir fitna-e-taqat-ruba kya bala-e-jaan hai 'ghaalib' us ki har baat ibarat kya ishaarat kya ada kya

ke liye vo zinda ham hai√± ki hai√± r≈´-shanƒÅs-e-·∏≥halq ai ·∏≥hizr na tum ki chor bane umr-e-jƒÅvedƒÅ√± ke liye rahƒÅ balƒÅ me√± bhƒ´ mai√± mubtala-e-ƒÅfat-e-rashk balƒÅ-e-jƒÅ√± hai adƒÅ terƒ´ ik jahƒÅ√± ke liye falak na duur rakh us se mujhe ki mai√± hƒ´ nahƒ´√± darƒÅz-dasti-e-qƒÅtil ke imtihƒÅ√± ke liye misƒÅl ye mirƒ´ koshish kƒ´ hai ki murƒ°h-e-asƒ´r kare qafas me√± farƒÅham ·∏≥has ƒÅshiyƒÅ√± ke liye gadƒÅ samajh ke vo chup thƒÅ mirƒ´ jo shƒÅmat aa.ƒ´ uThƒÅ aur uTh ke qadam mai√± ne pƒÅsbƒÅ√± ke liye ba-qadr-e-shauq nahƒ´√± zarf-e-tangnƒÅ-e-ƒ°hazal kuchh aur chƒÅhiye vus.at mire bayƒÅ√± ke liye diyƒÅ hai ·∏≥halq ko bhƒ´ tƒÅ use nazar na lage banƒÅ hai aish tajammul husain ·∏≥haa√± ke liye zabƒÅ√± pe bƒÅr-e-·∏≥hudƒÅyƒÅ ye kis kƒÅ naam aayƒÅ ki mere nutq ne bose mirƒ´ zabƒÅ√± ke liye nasƒ´r-e-daulat-o-dƒ´√± aur muƒ´n-e-millat-o-mulk banƒÅ hai char·∏≥h-e-barƒ´√± jis ke ƒÅstƒÅ√± ke liye zamƒÅna ahd me√± us ke hai mahv-e-ƒÅrƒÅ.ish bane√±ge aur sitƒÅre ab ƒÅsmƒÅ√± ke liye varaq tamƒÅm huƒÅ aur mad.h baaqƒ´ hai safƒ´na chƒÅhiye is bahr-e-be-karƒÅ√± ke liye adƒÅ-e-·∏≥hƒÅs se 'ƒ°hƒÅlib' huƒÅ hai nukta-sarƒÅ salƒÅ-e-ƒÅm hai yƒÅrƒÅn-e-nukta-dƒÅ√± ke liye nawed-e-amn hai bedad-e-dost jaan ke liye rahi na tarz-e-sitam koi aasman ke liye bala se gar mizha-e-yar tishna-e-KHun hai rakhun kuchh apni bhi mizhgan-e-KHun fishan ke liye wo zinda hum hain ki hain ru-shanas-e-KHalq ai KHizr na tum ki chor bane umr-e-jawedan ke liye raha bala mein bhi main mubtala-e-afat-e-rashk bala-e-jaan hai ada teri ek jahan ke liye falak na dur rakh us se mujhe ki main hi qadam main ne pasban ke liye ba-qadr-e-shauq nahin zarf-e-tangna-e-ghazal kuchh aur chahiye wusat mere bayan ke liye diya hai KHalq ko bhi ta use nazar na lage bana hai aish tajammul husain KHan ke liye zaban pe bar-e-KHudaya ye kis ka nam aaya ki mere nutq ne bose meri zaban ke liye nasir-e-daulat-o-din aur muin-e-millat-o-mulk bana hai charKH-e-barin jis ke aastan ke liye zamana ahd mein us ke yaran-e-nukta-dan ke liye

instruction: you are an urdu/hindi shayar/kavi/poet and you have to complete the following shayari/kavita, respond only in romanized urdu/hindi, make sure you are creative and talk about something profound and beautiful
input: tum jaano tumko ghair se jo rasm-o-rah ho
output: tum jaano tum ko ƒ°hair se jo rasm-o-rƒÅh ho mujh ko bhƒ´ p≈´chhte raho to kyƒÅ gunƒÅh ho bachte nahƒ´√± muvƒÅ·∏≥haza-e-roz-e-hashr se qƒÅtil agar raqƒ´b hai to tum gavƒÅh ho kyƒÅ vo bhƒ´ be-gunah-kush o haq-nƒÅ-shanƒÅs hai√± maanƒÅ ki tum bashar nahƒ´√± ·∏≥hurshƒ´d o maah ho ubhrƒÅ huƒÅ naqƒÅb me√± hai un ke ek taar martƒÅ huu√± mai√± ki ye na kisƒ´ kƒ´ nigƒÅh ho jab mai-kada chhuTƒÅ to phir ab kyƒÅ jagah kƒ´ qaid masjid ho madrasa ho koƒ´ ·∏≥hƒÅnqƒÅh ho sunte hai√± jo bahisht kƒ´ tƒÅrƒ´f sab durust lekin ·∏≥hudƒÅ kare vo tirƒÅ jalva-gƒÅh ho 'ƒ°hƒÅlib' bhƒ´ gar na ho to kuchh aisƒÅ zarar nahƒ´√± duniyƒÅ ho yƒÅ rab aur mirƒÅ bƒÅdshƒÅh ho tum jaano tum ko ghair se jo rasm-o-rah ho mujh ko bhi puchhte raho to kya gunah ho bachte nahin muwaKHaza-e-roz-e-hashr se qatil agar raqib hai to tum gawah ho kya wo bhi be-gunah-kush o haq-na-shanas hain mana ki tum bashar nahin KHurshid o mah ho ubhra hua naqab mein hai un ke ek tar marta hun main ki ye na kisi ki nigah ho jab mai-kada chhuTa to phir ab kya jagah ki qaid masjid ho madrasa ho koi KHanqah ho sunte hain jo bahisht ki tarif sab durust lekin KHuda kare wo tera jalwa-gah ho 'ghaalib' bhi gar na ho to kuchh aisa zarar nahin duniya ho ya rab aur mera baadshah ho

instruction: you are an urdu/hindi shayar/kavi/poet and you have to complete the following shayari/kavita, respond only in romanized urdu/hindi, make sure you are creative and talk about something profound and beautiful
input: ghar jab bana liya tere dar par kahe baghair
output: ghar jab banƒÅ liyƒÅ tire dar par kahe baƒ°hair jƒÅnegƒÅ ab bhƒ´ t≈´ na mirƒÅ ghar kahe baƒ°hair kahte hai√± jab rahƒ´ na mujhe tƒÅqat-e-su·∏≥han jƒÅn≈´√± kisƒ´ ke dil kƒ´ mai√± ky≈´√±kar kahe baƒ°hair kaam us se aa pa·∏åƒÅ hai ki jis kƒÅ jahƒÅn me√± leve na koƒ´ naam sitamgar kahe baƒ°hair jƒ´ me√± hƒ´ kuchh nahƒ´√± hai hamƒÅre vagarna ham sar jaa.e yƒÅ rahe na rahe√± par kahe baƒ°hair chho·∏å≈´√±gƒÅ mai√± na us but-e-kƒÅfir kƒÅ p≈´jnƒÅ chho·∏åe na ·∏≥halq go mujhe kƒÅfar kahe baƒ°hair maqsad hai nƒÅz-o-ƒ°hamza vale guftug≈´ me√± kaam chaltƒÅ nahƒ´√± hai dashna-o-·∏≥hanjar kahe baƒ°hair har chand ho mushƒÅhida-e-haq kƒ´ guftug≈´ bantƒ´ nahƒ´√± hai bƒÅda-o-sƒÅƒ°har kahe baƒ°hair bahrƒÅ huu√± mai√± to chƒÅhiye duunƒÅ ho iltifƒÅt suntƒÅ nahƒ´√± huu√± baat mukarrar kahe baƒ°hair 'ƒ°hƒÅlib' na kar huz≈´r me√± t≈´ baar baar arz zƒÅhir hai terƒÅ haal sab un par kahe baƒ°hair ghar jab bana liya tere dar par kahe baghair jaanega ab bhi tu na mera ghar kahe baghair kahte hain jab rahi na mujhe taqat-e-suKHan jaanun kisi ke dil ki main kyunkar kahe baghair kaam us se aa paDa hai ki jis ka jahan mein lewe na koi nam sitamgar kahe baghair ji mein hi kuchh nahin hai hamare wagarna hum sar jae ya rahe na rahen par kahe baghair chhoDunga main na us but-e-kafir ka pujna chhoDe na KHalq go mujhe kafar kahe baghair maqsad hai naz-o-ghamza wale guftugu mein kaam chalta nahin hai dashna-o-KHanjar kahe baghair har chand ho mushahida-e-haq ki guftugu banti nahin hai baada-o-saghar kahe baghair bahra hun main to chahiye duna ho iltifat sunta nahin hun baat mukarrar kahe baghair 'ghaalib' na kar huzur mein tu bar bar arz zahir hai tera haal sab un par kahe baghair

instruction: you are an urdu/hindi shayar/kavi/poet and you have to complete the following shayari/kavita, respond only in romanized urdu/hindi, make sure you are creative and talk about something profound and beautiful

output: huƒ´ tƒÅ·∏≥hƒ´r to kuchh bƒÅ.is-e-tƒÅ·∏≥hƒ´r bhƒ´ thƒÅ aap aate the magar koƒ´ inƒÅ√±-gƒ´r bhƒ´ thƒÅ tum se bejƒÅ hai mujhe apnƒ´ tabƒÅhƒ´ kƒÅ gila us me√± kuchh shƒÅ.iba-e-·∏≥h≈´bi-e-taqdƒ´r bhƒ´ thƒÅ t≈´ mujhe bhuul gayƒÅ ho to patƒÅ batlƒÅ duu√± kabhƒ´ fitrƒÅk me√± tere koƒ´ na·∏≥hchƒ´r bhƒ´ thƒÅ qaid me√± hai tire vahshƒ´ ko vahƒ´ zulf kƒ´ yaad haa√± kuchh ik ranj-e-girƒÅ√±-bƒÅri-e-zanjƒ´r bhƒ´ thƒÅ bijlƒ´ ik kau√±d ga.ƒ´ ƒÅ√±kho√± ke aage to kyƒÅ baat karte ki mai√± lab-tishna-e-taqrƒ´r bhƒ´ thƒÅ y≈´suf us ko kah≈´√± aur kuchh na kahe ·∏≥hair huƒ´ gar biga·∏å baiThe to mai√± lƒÅ.iq-e-tƒÅzƒ´r bhƒ´ thƒÅ dekh kar ƒ°hair ko ho kyuu√± na kalejƒÅ ThanDƒÅ naala kartƒÅ thƒÅ vale tƒÅlib-e-tƒÅsƒ´r bhƒ´ thƒÅ peshe me√± aib nahƒ´√± rakhiye na farhƒÅd ko naam ham hƒ´ ƒÅshufta-saro√± me√± vo javƒÅ√±-mƒ´r bhƒ´ thƒÅ ham the marne ko kha·∏åe paas na aayƒÅ na sahƒ´ ƒÅ·∏≥hir us sho·∏≥h ke tarkash me√± koƒ´ tiir bhƒ´ thƒÅ pak·∏åe jaate hai√± farishto√± ke likhe par nƒÅ-haq aadmƒ´ koƒ´ hamƒÅrƒÅ dam-e-tahrƒ´r bhƒ´ thƒÅ re·∏≥hte ke tumhƒ´√± ustƒÅd nahƒ´√± ho 'ƒ°hƒÅlib' kahte hai√± agle zamƒÅne me√± koƒ´ 'mƒ´r' bhƒ´ thƒÅ hui taKHir to kuchh bais-e-taKHir bhi tha aap aate the magar koi inan-gir bhi tha tum se beja hai mujhe apni tabahi ka gila us mein kuchh shaiba-e-KHubi-e-taqdir bhi tha tu mujhe bhul gaya ho to pata batla dun kabhi fitrak mein tere koi naKHchir bhi tha qaid mein hai tere wahshi ko wahi zulf ki yaad han kuchh ek ranj-e-giran-bari-e-zanjir bhi tha bijli ek kaund gai aankhon ke aage to kya baat karte ki main lab-tishna-e-taqrir bhi tha par na-haq aadmi koi hamara dam-e-tahrir bhi tha reKHte ke tumhin ustad nahin ho 'ghaalib' kahte hain agle zamane mein koi 'mir' bhi tha

output: taskƒ´√± ko ham na ro.e√± jo zauq-e-nazar mile h≈´rƒÅn-e-·∏≥huld me√± tirƒ´ s≈´rat magar mile apnƒ´ galƒ´ me√± mujh ko na kar dafn bƒÅd-e-qatl mere pate se ·∏≥halq ko kyuu√± terƒÅ ghar mile sƒÅqƒ´-garƒ´ kƒ´ sharm karo aaj varna ham har shab piyƒÅ hƒ´ karte hai√± mai jis qadar mile tujh se to kuchh kalƒÅm nahƒ´√± lekin ai nadƒ´m merƒÅ salƒÅm kahiyo agar nƒÅma-bar mile tum ko bhƒ´ ham dikhƒÅ.e√± ki majn≈´√± ne kyƒÅ kiyƒÅ fursat kashƒÅkash-e-ƒ°ham-e-pinhƒÅ√± se gar mile lƒÅzim nahƒ´√± ki ·∏≥hizr kƒ´ ham pairvƒ´ kare√± jaanƒÅ ki ik buzurg hame√± ham-safar mile ai sƒÅkinƒÅn-e-kucha-e-dildƒÅr dekhnƒÅ tum ko kahƒ´√± jo 'ƒ°hƒÅlib'-e-ƒÅshufta-sar mile taskin ko hum na roen jo zauq-e-nazar mile huran-e-KHuld mein teri surat magar mile apni gali mein mujh ko na kar dafn baad-e-qatl mere pate se KHalq ko kyun tera ghar mile saqi-gari ki sharm karo aaj warna hum har shab piya hi karte hain mai jis qadar mile tujh se to kuchh kalam nahin lekin ai nadim mera salam kahiyo agar nama-bar mile tum ko bhi hum dikhaen ki majnun ne kya kiya fursat kashakash-e-gham-e-pinhan se gar mile lazim nahin ki KHizr ki hum pairwi karen jaana ki ek buzurg hamein ham-safar mile ai sakinan-e-kucha-e-dildar dekhna tum ko kahin jo 'ghaalib'-e-ashufta-sar mile

instruction: you are an urdu/hindi shayar/kavi/poet and you have to complete the following shayari/kavita, respond only in romanized urdu/hindi, make sure you are creative and talk about something profound and beautiful
input: main unhen chheDun aur kuchh na kahen

instruction: you are an urdu/hindi shayar/kavi/poet and you have to complete the following shayari/kavita, respond only in romanized urdu/hindi, make sure you are creative and talk about something profound and beautiful
input: koi din gar zindagani aur hai
output: koƒ´ din gar zindagƒÅnƒ´ aur hai apne jƒ´ me√± ham ne ThƒÅnƒ´ aur hai ƒÅtish-e-doza·∏≥h me√± ye garmƒ´ kahƒÅ√± soz-e-ƒ°ham-hƒÅ-e-nihƒÅnƒ´ aur hai bƒÅr-hƒÅ dekhƒ´ hai√± un kƒ´ ranjishe√± par kuchh ab ke sargirƒÅnƒ´ aur hai de ke ·∏≥hat mu√±h dekhtƒÅ hai nƒÅma-bar kuchh to paiƒ°hƒÅm-e-zabƒÅnƒ´ aur hai qƒÅta-e-emƒÅr hai aksar nuj≈´m vo balƒÅ-e-ƒÅsmƒÅnƒ´ aur hai ho chukƒ´√± 'ƒ°hƒÅlib' balƒÅ.e√± sab tamƒÅm ek marg-e-nƒÅ-gahƒÅnƒ´ aur hai koi din gar zindagani aur hai apne ji mein hum ne Thani aur hai aatish-e-dozaKH mein ye garmi kahan soz-e-gham-ha-e-nihani aur hai bar-ha dekhi hain un ki ranjishen par kuchh ab ke sargirani aur hai de ke KHat munh dekhta hai nama-bar kuchh to paigham-e-zabani aur hai qata-e-emar hai aksar nujum wo bala-e-asmani aur hai ho chukin 'ghaalib' balaen sab tamam ek marg-e-na-gahani aur hai

instruction: you are an urdu/hindi shayar/kavi/poet and you have to complete the following shayari/kavita, respond only in romanized urdu/hindi, make sure you are creative and talk about something profound and beautiful
input: ibn-e-mariyam hua kare koi
output: ibn-e-mariyam huƒÅ kare koƒ´ mere dukh kƒ´ davƒÅ kare koƒ´ shar.a o aa.iin par madƒÅr sahƒ´ aise qƒÅtil kƒÅ kyƒÅ kare koƒ´ chaal jaise ka·∏åƒ´ kamƒÅn kƒÅ tiir dil me√± aise ke jƒÅ kare koƒ´ baat par vaa√± zabƒÅn kaTtƒ´ hai vo kahe√± aur sunƒÅ kare koƒ´ bak rahƒÅ huu√± jun≈´√± me√± kyƒÅ kyƒÅ kuchh kuchh na samjhe ·∏≥hudƒÅ kare koƒ´ na suno gar burƒÅ kahe koƒ´ na kaho gar burƒÅ kare koƒ´ rok lo gar ƒ°halat chale koƒ´ ba·∏≥hsh do gar ·∏≥hatƒÅ kare koƒ´ kaun hai jo nahƒ´√± hai hƒÅjat-mand kis kƒ´ hƒÅjat ravƒÅ kare koƒ´ kyƒÅ kiyƒÅ ·∏≥hizr ne sikandar se ab kise rahnumƒÅ kare koƒ´ jab tavaqqo' hƒ´ uTh ga.ƒ´ 'ƒ°hƒÅlib' kyuu√± kisƒ´ kƒÅ gila kare koƒ´ ibn-e-mariyam hua kare koi mere dukh ki dawa kare koi shara o aain par madar sahi aise qatil ka kya kare koi chaal jaise kaDi kaman ka tir dil mein aise ke ja kare koi baat par wan zaban kaTti hai wo kahen aur suna kare koi bak raha hun junun mein kya kya kuchh kuchh na samjhe KHuda kare koi na suno gar bura kahe koi na kaho gar bura kare koi rok lo gar ghalat chale koi baKHsh do gar KHata kare koi kaun hai jo nahin hai hajat-mand kis ki hajat rawa kare koi kya kiya KHizr ne sikandar se ab kise rahnuma kare koi jab tawaqqo' hi uTh gai 'ghaalib' kyun kisi ka gila kare koi

instruction: you are an urdu/hindi shayar/kavi/poet and you have to complete the following shayari/kavita, respond only in romanized urdu/hindi, make sure you are creative and talk about something profound and beautiful
input: husn-e-mah garche ba-hangam-e-kamal achchha hai
output: husn-e-mah garche ba-ha√±gƒÅm-e-kamƒÅl achchhƒÅ hai us se merƒÅ mah-e-·∏≥hurshƒ´d-jamƒÅl achchhƒÅ hai bosa dete nahƒ´√± aur dil pe hai har lahza nigƒÅh jƒ´ me√± kahte hai√± ki muft aa.e to maal achchhƒÅ hai aur bƒÅzƒÅr se le aa.e agar TuuT gayƒÅ sƒÅƒ°har-e-jam se mirƒÅ jƒÅm-e-sifƒÅl achchhƒÅ hai be-talab de√± to mazƒÅ us me√± sivƒÅ miltƒÅ hai vo gadƒÅ jis ko na ho ·∏≥h≈´-e-savƒÅl achchhƒÅ hai un ke dekhe se jo aa jaatƒ´ hai mu√±h par raunaq vo samajhte hai√± ki bƒ´mƒÅr kƒÅ haal achchhƒÅ hai dekhiye paate hai√± ushshƒÅq buto√± se kyƒÅ faiz ik barhaman ne kahƒÅ hai ki ye saal achchhƒÅ hai ham-su·∏≥han tesha ne farhƒÅd ko shƒ´rƒ´√± se kiyƒÅ jis tarah kƒÅ ki kisƒ´ me√± ho kamƒÅl achchhƒÅ hai qatra dariyƒÅ me√± jo mil jaa.e to dariyƒÅ ho jaa.e kaam achchhƒÅ hai vo jis kƒÅ ki ma.aal achchhƒÅ hai ·∏≥hizr-sultƒÅ√± ko rakhe ·∏≥hƒÅliq-e-akbar sarsabz shaah ke baaƒ°h me√± ye taaza nihƒÅl achchhƒÅ hai ham ko ma.al≈´m hai jannat kƒ´ haqƒ´qat lekin dil ke ·∏≥hush rakhne ko 'ƒ°hƒÅlib' ye ·∏≥hayƒÅl achchhƒÅ hai husn-e-mah garche ba-hangam-e-kamal achchha hai us se mera mah-e-KHurshid-jamal achchha hai bosa dete nahin aur dil pe hai har lahza nigah ji mein kahte hain ki muft aae to mal achchha hai aur bazar se le aae agar TuT gaya saghar-e-jam se mera jam-e-sifal achchha hai be-talab den to maza us mein siwa milta hai wo gada jis ko na ho KHu-e-sawal achchha hai un ke dekhe se jo aa jati hai munh par raunaq wo samajhte hain ki bimar ka haal achchha hai dekhiye pate hain ushshaq buton se kya faiz ek barhaman ne kaha hai ki ye sal achchha hai ham-suKHan tesha ne farhad ko shirin se kiya jis tarah ka ki kisi mein ho kamal achchha hai qatra dariya mein jo mil jae to dariya ho jae kaam achchha hai wo jis ka ki maal achchha hai KHizr-sultan ko rakhe KHaliq-e-akbar sarsabz shah ke bagh mein ye taza nihaal achchha hai hum ko malum hai jannat ki haqiqat lekin dil ke KHush rakhne ko 'ghaalib' ye KHayal achchha hai

input: har ek baat pe kahte ho tum ki tu kya hai
output: har ek baat pe kahte ho tum ki t≈´ kyƒÅ hai tumhƒ´√± kaho ki ye andƒÅz-e-guftug≈´ kyƒÅ hai na sho.ale me√± ye karishma na barq me√± ye adƒÅ koƒ´ batƒÅo ki vo sho·∏≥h-e-tund-·∏≥h≈´ kyƒÅ hai ye rashk hai ki vo hotƒÅ hai ham-su·∏≥han tum se vagarna ·∏≥hauf-e-bad-ƒÅmozi-e-ad≈´ kyƒÅ hai chipak rahƒÅ hai badan par lah≈´ se pairƒÅhan hamƒÅre jaib ko ab hƒÅjat-e-raf≈´ kyƒÅ hai jalƒÅ hai jism jahƒÅ√± dil bhƒ´ jal gayƒÅ hogƒÅ kuredte ho jo ab raakh justuj≈´ kyƒÅ hai rago√± me√± dau·∏åte phirne ke ham nahƒ´√± qaa.il jab aa√±kh hƒ´ se na TapkƒÅ to phir lah≈´ kyƒÅ hai vo chiiz jis ke liye ham ko ho bahisht aziiz sivƒÅ.e bƒÅda-e-gulfƒÅm-e-mushk-b≈´ kyƒÅ hai piy≈´√± sharƒÅb agar ·∏≥hum bhƒ´ dekh luu√± do-chƒÅr ye shƒ´sha o qadah o kuuza o sub≈´ kyƒÅ hai rahƒ´ na tƒÅqat-e-guftƒÅr aur agar ho bhƒ´ to kis umiid pe kahiye ki aarz≈´ kyƒÅ hai huƒÅ hai shah kƒÅ musƒÅhib phire hai itrƒÅtƒÅ vagarna shahr me√± 'ƒ°hƒÅlib' kƒ´ aabr≈´ kyƒÅ hai har ek baat pe kahte ho tum ki tu kya hai tumhin kaho ki ye andaz-e-guftugu kya hai na shoale mein ye karishma na barq mein ye ada koi batao ki wo shoKH-e-tund-KHu kya hai ye rashk hai ki wo hota hai ham-suKHan tum se wagarna KHauf-e-bad-amozi-e-adu kya hai chipak raha hai badan par lahu se pairahan hamare jaib ko ab hajat-e-rafu kya hai jala hai jism jahan dil bhi jal gaya hoga kuredte ho jo ab rakh justuju kya hai ragon mein dauDte phirne ke hum nahin qail jab aankh hi se na Tapka to phir lahu kya hai wo chiz jis ke liye hum ko ho bahisht aziz siwae baada-e-gulfam-e-mushk-bu kya hai piyun sharab agar KHum bhi dekh lun do-chaar ye shisha o qadah o kuza o subu kya hai rahi na taqat-e-guftar aur agar ho bhi to kis umid pe kahiye ki aarzu kya hai hua hai shah ka musahib phire hai itraata wagarna shahr mein 'ghaalib' ki aabru kya hai

output: ye na thƒ´ hamƒÅrƒ´ qismat ki visƒÅl-e-yƒÅr hotƒÅ agar aur jiite rahte yahƒ´ intizƒÅr hotƒÅ tire va.ade par jiye ham to ye jaan jhuuT jaanƒÅ ki ·∏≥hushƒ´ se mar na jaate agar e'tibƒÅr hotƒÅ tirƒ´ nƒÅzukƒ´ se jaanƒÅ ki ba√±dhƒÅ thƒÅ ahd bodƒÅ kabhƒ´ t≈´ na to·∏å saktƒÅ agar ustuvƒÅr hotƒÅ koƒ´ mere dil se p≈´chhe tire tƒ´r-e-nƒ´m-kash ko ye ·∏≥halish kahƒÅ√± se hotƒ´ jo jigar ke paar hotƒÅ ye kahƒÅ√± kƒ´ dostƒ´ hai ki bane hai√± dost nƒÅseh koƒ´ chƒÅrasƒÅz hotƒÅ koƒ´ ƒ°ham-gusƒÅr hotƒÅ rag-e-sa√±g se TapaktƒÅ vo lah≈´ ki phir na thamtƒÅ jise ƒ°ham samajh rahe ho ye agar sharƒÅr hotƒÅ ƒ°ham agarche jƒÅ√±-gusil hai pa kahƒÅ√± bache√± ki dil hai ƒ°ham-e-ishq gar na hotƒÅ ƒ°ham-e-rozgƒÅr hotƒÅ kah≈´√± kis se mai√± ki kyƒÅ hai shab-e-ƒ°ham burƒ´ balƒÅ hai mujhe kyƒÅ burƒÅ thƒÅ marnƒÅ agar ek baar hotƒÅ hue mar ke ham jo rusvƒÅ hue kyuu√± na ƒ°harq-e-dariyƒÅ na kabhƒ´ janƒÅza uThtƒÅ na kahƒ´√± mazƒÅr hotƒÅ Interestinguse kaun dekh saktƒÅ ki yagƒÅna hai vo yaktƒÅ jo duƒ´ kƒ´ b≈´ bhƒ´ hotƒ´ to kahƒ´√± do-chƒÅr hotƒÅ ye masƒÅ.il-e-tasavvuf ye tirƒÅ bayƒÅn 'ƒ°hƒÅlib' tujhe ham valƒ´ samajhte jo na bƒÅda-·∏≥hvƒÅr hotƒÅ ye na thi hamari qismat ki visal-e-yar hota agar aur jite rahte yahi intizar hota tere wade par jiye hum to ye jaan jhuT jaana ki KHushi se mar na jate agar e'tibar hota teri nazuki se jaana ki bandha tha ahd boda kabhi tu na toD sakta agar ustuwar hota koi mere dil se puchhe tere tir-e-nim-kash ko ye KHalish kahan se hoti jo jigar ke par hota ye kahan ki dosti hai ki bane hain dost naseh koi chaarasaz hota koi gham-gusar hota rag-e-sang se Tapakta wo lahu ki phir na thamta jise gham samajh rahe ho ye agar sharar hota gham agarche jaan-gusil hai pa kahan bachen ki dil hai gham-e-ishq gar na hota gham-e-rozgar hota kahun kis se main ki kya hai shab-e-gham buri bala hai mujhe kya bura tha marna agar ek bar hota hue mar ke hum jo ruswa hue kyun na gharq-e-dariya na kabhi janaza uThta na kahin mazar hota Interestinguse kaun dekh sakta ki yagana hai wo yakta jo dui ki bu bhi hoti to kahin do-chaar hota ye masail-e-tasawwuf ye tera bayan 'ghaalib' tujhe hum wali samajhte jo na baada-KHwar hota

input: koi ummid bar nahin aati
output: koƒ´ ummƒ´d bar nahƒ´√± aatƒ´ koƒ´ s≈´rat nazar nahƒ´√± aatƒ´ maut kƒÅ ek din muayyan hai niind kyuu√± raat bhar nahƒ´√± aatƒ´ aage aatƒ´ thƒ´ hƒÅl-e-dil pe ha√±sƒ´ ab kisƒ´ baat par nahƒ´√± aatƒ´ jƒÅntƒÅ huu√± savƒÅb-e-tƒÅ.at-o-zohd par tabƒ´.at idhar nahƒ´√± aatƒ´ hai kuchh aisƒ´ hƒ´ baat jo chup huu√± varna kyƒÅ baat kar nahƒ´√± aatƒ´ kyuu√± na chƒ´·∏≥h≈´√± ki yaad karte hai√± merƒ´ ƒÅvƒÅz gar nahƒ´√± aatƒ´ dƒÅƒ°h-e-dil gar nazar nahƒ´√± aatƒÅ b≈´ bhƒ´ ai chƒÅrƒÅgar nahƒ´√± aatƒ´ ham vahƒÅ√± hai√± jahƒÅ√± se ham ko bhƒ´ kuchh hamƒÅrƒ´ ·∏≥habar nahƒ´√± aatƒ´ marte hai√± aarz≈´ me√± marne kƒ´ maut aatƒ´ hai par nahƒ´√± aatƒ´ kaaba kis mu√±h se jƒÅoge 'ƒ°hƒÅlib' sharm tum ko magar nahƒ´√± aatƒ´ koi ummid bar nahin aati koi surat nazar nahin aati maut ka ek din muayyan hai nind kyun raat bhar nahin aati aage aati thi haal-e-dil pe hansi ab kisi baat par nahin aati jaanta hun sawab-e-taat-o-zohd par tabiat idhar nahin aati hai kuchh aisi hi baat jo chup hun warna kya baat kar nahin aati kyun na chiKHun ki yaad karte hain meri aawaz gar nahin aati dagh-e-dil gar nazar nahin aata bu bhi ai chaaragar nahin aati hum wahan hain jahan se hum ko bhi kuchh hamari KHabar nahin aati marte hain aarzu mein marne ki maut aati hai par nahin aati kaba kis munh se jaoge 'ghaalib' sharm tum ko magar nahin aati

instruction: you are an urdu/hindi shayar/kavi/poet and you have to complete the following shayari/kavita, respond only in romanized urdu/hindi, make sure you are creative and talk about something profound and beautiful
input: dil-e-nadan tujhe hua kya hai
output: dil-e-nƒÅdƒÅ√± tujhe huƒÅ kyƒÅ hai ƒÅ·∏≥hir is dard kƒ´ davƒÅ kyƒÅ hai ham hai√± mushtƒÅq aur vo be-zƒÅr yƒÅ ilƒÅhƒ´ ye mƒÅjrƒÅ kyƒÅ hai mai√± bhƒ´ mu√±h me√± zabƒÅn rakhtƒÅ huu√± kaash p≈´chho ki mudda.ƒÅ kyƒÅ hai jab ki tujh bin nahƒ´√± koƒ´ mauj≈´d phir ye ha√±gƒÅma ai ·∏≥hudƒÅ kyƒÅ hai ye parƒ´-chehra log kaise hai√± ƒ°hamza o ishva o adƒÅ kyƒÅ hai shikan-e-zulf-e-ambarƒ´√± kyuu√± hai nigah-e-chashm-e-surma sƒÅ kyƒÅ hai sabza o gul kahƒÅ√± se aa.e hai√± abr kyƒÅ chiiz hai havƒÅ kyƒÅ hai ham ko un se vafƒÅ kƒ´ hai ummƒ´d jo nahƒ´√± jƒÅnte vafƒÅ kyƒÅ hai haa√± bhalƒÅ kar tirƒÅ bhalƒÅ hogƒÅ aur darvesh kƒ´ sadƒÅ kyƒÅ hai jaan tum par nisƒÅr kartƒÅ huu√± mai√± nahƒ´√± jƒÅntƒÅ duƒÅ kyƒÅ hai mai√± ne maanƒÅ ki kuchh nahƒ´√± 'ƒ°hƒÅlib' muft haath aa.e to burƒÅ kyƒÅ hai dil-e-nadan tujhe hua kya hai aaKHir is dard ki dawa kya hai hum hain mushtaq aur wo be-zar ya ilahi ye majra kya hai main bhi munh mein zaban rakhta hun kash puchho ki muddaa kya hai jab ki tujh bin nahin koi maujud phir ye hangama ai KHuda kya hai ye pari-chehra log kaise hain ghamza o ishwa o ada kya hai shikan-e-zulf-e-ambarin kyun hai nigah-e-chashm-e-surma sa kya hai sabza o gul kahan se aae hain abr kya chiz hai hawa kya hai hum ko un se wafa ki hai ummid jo nahin jaante wafa kya hai han bhala kar tera bhala hoga aur darwesh ki sada kya hai jaan tum par nisar karta hun main nahin jaanta dua kya hai main ne mana ki kuchh nahin 'ghaalib' muft hath aae to bura kya hai

instruction: you are an urdu/hindi shayar/kavi/poet and you have to complete the following shayari/kavita, respond only in romanized urdu/hindi, make sure you are creative and talk about something profound and beautiful
input: hairan hun dil ko roun ki piTun jigar ko main
output: hairƒÅ√± huu√± dil ko ro.uu√± ki pƒ´T≈´√± jigar ko mai√± maqd≈´r ho to saath rakh≈´√± nauhagar ko mai√± chho·∏åƒÅ na rashk ne ki tire ghar kƒÅ naam luu√± har ik se p≈´chhtƒÅ huu√± ki jƒÅ.≈´√± kidhar ko mai√± jaanƒÅ pa·∏åƒÅ raqƒ´b ke dar par hazƒÅr baar ai kaash jƒÅntƒÅ na tire rah-guzar ko mai√± hai kyƒÅ jo kas ke bƒÅ√±dhiye merƒ´ balƒÅ Dare kyƒÅ jƒÅntƒÅ nahƒ´√± huu√± tumhƒÅrƒ´ kamar ko mai√± lo vo bhƒ´ kahte hai√± ki ye be-na√±g-o-nƒÅm hai ye jƒÅntƒÅ agar to luTƒÅtƒÅ na ghar ko mai√± chaltƒÅ huu√± tho·∏åƒ´ duur har ik tez-rau ke saath pahchƒÅntƒÅ nahƒ´√± huu√± abhƒ´ rƒÅhbar ko mai√± ·∏≥hvƒÅhish ko ahmaqo√± ne parastish diyƒÅ qarƒÅr kyƒÅ p≈´jtƒÅ huu√± us but-e-bedƒÅd-gar ko mai√± phir be-·∏≥hudƒ´ me√± bhuul gayƒÅ rƒÅh-e-k≈´-e-yƒÅr jaatƒÅ vagarna ek din apnƒ´ ·∏≥habar ko mai√± apne pe kar rahƒÅ huu√± qayƒÅs ahl-e-dahr kƒÅ samjhƒÅ huu√± dil-pazƒ´r mata-e-hunar ko mai√± 'ƒ°hƒÅlib' ·∏≥hudƒÅ kare ki savƒÅr-e-samand-e-nƒÅz dekh≈´√± alƒ´ bahƒÅdur-e-ƒÅlƒ´-guhar ko mai√± hairan hun dil ko roun ki piTun jigar ko main maqdur ho to sath rakhun nauhagar ko main chhoDa na rashk ne ki tere ghar ka nam lun har ek se puchhta hun ki jaun kidhar ko main jaana paDa raqib ke dar par hazar bar ai kash jaanta na tere rah-guzar ko main hai kya jo kas ke bandhiye meri bala Dare kya jaanta nahin hun tumhaari kamar ko main lo wo bhi kahte hain ki ye be-nang-o-nam hai ye jaanta agar to luTata na ghar ko main chalta hun thoDi dur har ek tez-rau ke sath pahchanta nahin hun abhi rahbar ko main KHwahish ko ahmaqon ne parastish diya qarar kya pujta hun us but-e-bedad-gar ko main phir be-KHudi mein bhul gaya rah-e-ku-e-yar jata wagarna ek din apni KHabar ko main apne pe kar raha hun qayas ahl-e-dahr ka samjha hun dil-pazir mata-e-hunar ko main 'ghaalib' KHuda kare ki sawar-e-samand-e-naz dekhun ali bahadur-e-ali-guhar ko main

input: daim paDa hua tere dar par nahin hun main
output: daa.im pa·∏åƒÅ huƒÅ tire dar par nahƒ´√± huu√± mai√± ·∏≥haak aisƒ´ zindagƒ´ pe ki patthar nahƒ´√± huu√± mai√± kyuu√± gardish-e-mudƒÅm se ghabrƒÅ na jaa.e dil insƒÅn huu√± piyƒÅla o sƒÅƒ°har nahƒ´√± huu√± mai√± yƒÅ-rab zamƒÅna mujh ko miTƒÅtƒÅ hai kis liye lauh-e-jahƒÅ√± pe harf-e-mukarrar nahƒ´√± huu√± mai√± had chƒÅhiye sazƒÅ me√± uq≈´bat ke vƒÅste ƒÅ·∏≥hir gunƒÅhgƒÅr huu√± kƒÅfar nahƒ´√± huu√± mai√± kis vƒÅste aziiz nahƒ´√± jƒÅnte mujhe la.al o zamurrad o zar o gauhar nahƒ´√± huu√± mai√± rakhte ho tum qadam mirƒ´ ƒÅ√±kho√± se kyuu√± dareƒ°h rutbe me√± mahr-o-mƒÅh se kam-tar nahƒ´√± huu√± mai√± karte ho mujh ko man.a-e-qadam-bos kis liye kyƒÅ ƒÅsmƒÅn ke bhƒ´ barƒÅbar nahƒ´√± huu√± mai√± 'ƒ°hƒÅlib' vazƒ´fa-·∏≥hvƒÅr ho do shaah ko duƒÅ vo din ga.e ki kahte the naukar nahƒ´√± huu√± mai√± daim paDa hua tere dar par nahin hun main KHak aisi zindagi pe ki patthar nahin hun main kyun gardish-e-mudam se ghabra na jae dil insan hun piyala o saghar nahin hun main ya-rab zamana mujh ko miTata hai kis liye lauh-e-jahan pe harf-e-mukarrar nahin hun main had chahiye saza mein uqubat ke waste aaKHir gunahgar hun kafar nahin hun main kis waste aziz nahin jaante mujhe lal o zamurrad o zar o gauhar nahin hun main rakhte ho tum qadam meri aankhon se kyun daregh rutbe mein mahr-o-mah se kam-tar nahin hun main karte ho mujh ko mana-e-qadam-bos kis liye kya aasman ke bhi barabar nahin hun main 'ghaalib' wazifa-KHwar ho do shah ko dua wo din gae ki kahte the naukar nahin hun main

output: kahte to ho tum sab ki but-e-ƒ°hƒÅliyƒÅ-m≈´ aa.e yak martaba ghabrƒÅ ke kaho koƒ´ ki vo aa.e huu√± kashmakash-e-naz.a me√± haa√± jazb-e-mohabbat kuchh kah na sak≈´√± par vo mire p≈´chhne ko aa.e hai sƒÅ.iqa o sho.ala o sƒ´mƒÅb kƒÅ aalam aanƒÅ hƒ´ samajh me√± mirƒ´ aatƒÅ nahƒ´√± go aa.e zƒÅhir hai ki ghabrƒÅ ke na bhƒÅge√±ge nakƒ´rain haa√± mu√±h se magar bƒÅda-e-doshƒ´nƒÅ kƒ´ b≈´ aa.e jallƒÅd se Darte hai√± na vaa.iz se jhaga·∏åte ham samjhe hue hai√± use jis bhes me√± jo aa.e haa√± ahl-e-talab kaun sune tƒÅna-e-nƒÅ-yƒÅft dekhƒÅ ki vo miltƒÅ nahƒ´√± apne hƒ´ ko kho aa.e apnƒÅ nahƒ´√± ye sheva ki ƒÅrƒÅm se baiThe√± us dar pe nahƒ´√± baar to ka.abe hƒ´ ko ho aa.e kƒ´ ham-nafaso√± ne asar-e-giryƒÅ me√± taqrƒ´r achchhe rahe aap is se magar mujh ko Dubo aa.e us anjuman-e-nƒÅz kƒ´ kyƒÅ baat hai 'ƒ°hƒÅlib' ham bhƒ´ ga.e vaa√± aur tirƒ´ taqdƒ´r ko ro aa.e kahte to ho tum sab ki but-e-ghaaliya-mu aae yak martaba ghabra ke kaho koi ki wo aae hun kashmakash-e-naza mein han jazb-e-mohabbat kuchh kah na sakun par wo mere puchhne ko aae hai saiqa o shoala o simab ka aalam aana hi samajh mein meri aata nahin go aae zahir hai ki ghabra ke na bhagenge nakirain han munh se magar baada-e-doshina ki bu aae jallad se Darte hain na waiz se jhagaDte hum samjhe hue hain use jis bhes mein jo aae han ahl-e-talab kaun sune tana-e-na-yaft dekha ki wo milta nahin apne hi ko kho aae apna nahin ye shewa ki aaram se baiThen us dar pe nahin bar to kabe hi ko ho aae ki ham-nafason ne asar-e-girya mein taqrir achchhe rahe aap is se magar mujh ko Dubo aae us anjuman-e-naz ki kya baat hai 'ghaalib' hum bhi gae wan aur teri taqdir ko ro aae

mere ghar wada kaisa dekhna 'ghaalib' nae fitnon mein ab charKH-e-kuhan ki aazmaish hai
